column3: The Government Technology Agency (GovTech) aims to transform the delivery of Government digital services by taking an ""outside-in"" view, putting citizens and businesses at the heart of everything we do. We also develop the Smart Nation infrastructure and applications, and facilitate collaboration with citizens and businesses to co-develop technologies.
Join us as we support Singapore’s vision of building a Smart Nation - a nation of possibilities empowered through info-communications technology and related engineering.

column1:
","

The Government Technology Agency (GovTech) aims to transform the delivery of Government digital services by taking an ""outside-in"" view, putting citizens and businesses at the heart of everything we do. We also develop the Smart Nation infrastructure and applications, and facilitate collaboration with citizens and businesses to co-develop technologies.

Join us as we support Singapore’s vision of building a Smart Nation - a nation of possibilities empowered through info-communications technology and related engineering.Government Infrastructure Group (GIG)

The Government Infrastructure Group (GIG) is responsible for digital infrastructure that supports the Whole-of-Government (WOG). We are the infrastructure architects and engineers who architect, design and deliver an agile, secure and sustainable infrastructure which enables a digital government for Singapore

How we work

Aside from formulating the infrastructure strategy and roadmap at WOG level, we also develop prototypes using new technologies and establish standards and best practices to guide the design and implementation of information systems that support the enterprise infrastructure.

We examine factors such as people, culture, policies and processes to provide a secure, predictive and always-on platform, enabling public officers to work anywhere and anytime.

By leveraging on innovative Cloud and SaaS technologies, we architect, design, build and deliver Cloud and Datacenter hosting environments and common services which support government agencies in accelerating and developing modern applications and services.

Transforming ICT infrastructure through modernization and automation is also our key focus. Using latest technology and best practices, we deliver secure and utility-based services to WOG, so that government agencies can function efficiently and seamlessly.

We are also passionate about building and uplifting ICT engineering know-how for the WOG in critical infrastructure domains, which we advance through experimentation, prototype development, consultancy and training.

Job Overview

Senior Project Manager / Manager will be part of the team to manage Whole of Government (WOG) Infrastructure services at an enterprise level. One key focus area is providing a suite of mail and collaboration tools to support public officers’ work productivity by leveraging on the latest technologies and cloud adoption. ​ As a Project Manager in GovTech, you will work with the Solution Architect and Infrastructure Engineers to ensure projects are delivered on time, within budget, meet business requirements and comply with IT governance framework, (including security and resilience) and stakeholder engagement.

What you will be working on:

  • Engage stakeholder(s) to recommend and justify new initiatives, and work on the conceptualisation, design, procurement, implementation, deployment of the initiatives.
  • Plan and lead the development of the business case as well as the budget for the project.
  • Manage and execute the procurement of IT systems in a timely manner.
  • Ensure that projects are executed based on the project plan to meet identified business needs and outcome, within agreed parameters of cost, duration and quality.
  • Assess and apply the right project management methodologies, including Agile practices, to ensure project success.
  • Identify potential project risks and the implications to the organisation and to recommend mitigating measures so as to manage the risks.
  • Effectively engage and manage the vendors to deliver digital solutions and services.
  • Understand the IT management policy, quality management policy and security guidelines to ensure the development processes, procedures and systems are designed to comply with these policies and guidelines.

What we are looking for:

  • Relevant working experience as a Project Manager in at least 2 full project development life cycles, with at least one using agile methodology.
  • Strong vendor and stakeholder management.
  • Able to work independently and as a good team player with analytical, management and planning skills.
  • Experience in tender calls or presentations will be an added advantage.
  • Candidates with experience in handling projects involving Cloud, Design Thinking, Data Analytics or Product-Centric Development will be strongly preferred.
  • Project Management related certifications such as CITPM, COMIT or PMI.
  • Agile related certification such as Certified Scrum Master.
  • Pro-active, dynamic and with good analytical/conceptual thinking and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent written, verbal communication, presentation and negotiation skills.

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company as we believe that diversity is meaningful to innovation. Our employee benefits are based on a total rewards approach, offering a holistic and market-competitive suite of perks. This includes generous leave benefits to meet your work-life needs. We trust that you will get the job done wherever you are, and whatever works best for you – so work from home or take a break to exercise if you need to*. We also believe it’s important for you to keep honing your craft in the constantly-evolving tech landscape, so we provide and support a plethora of in-house and external learning and development opportunities all year round.

*Subject to the nature of your job role that might require you to be onsite during fixed hours

1,tech project manager,/en/job/junior-project-manager-%243k-3.5k-9384049,9384049,Junior Project Manager ($3k - 3.5k),False,False,3000,3500,SGD,EPOS Pte. Ltd.,11 hours ago,False,,2 days,201529028W,,,51 - 200 Employees,,Thye Hong Centre,"

EPOS, founded in 2009, is a leading software developer. We aim to provide SMEs comprehensive, powerful and cost-effective IT solutions. EPOS is the best Point of Sales company in Singapore and an Enterprise Singapore pre-approved POS vendor.

Our systems are used in over 60 different industries, including major Singapore government agencies and MNCs. We have an active and strong team capable of flexible customisation requirements and handling of major projects (e.g. major clients will have 20-30 outlets, with more than 50 POS terminals).

Our clients include LTA, KKH, NTU, SMU, Temasek Poly, UMart, Killiney, Magnum and SONG brothers.

","

EPOS is hiring a Junior Project Manager for our Product Management team.

As Junior Project Manager, you will assist in planning the product strategy, driving technical requirements, and delivering our product to business users. You will work closely with our software development, design, operations and sales teams to build an internationally competitive product for users to set up and run their business.

Role & Responsibilities:

  • Liaise with internal sales team for project initialization and execution
  • Liaise with internal support team & development team for project execution and maintenance
  • Research, draft and design product requirements
  • Communicate with development teams in technical detail, understand the implications of choices and make trade-offs in complexity, depth or timeline
  • Test and verify completed functions
  • Update training manuals
  • Update SG team on new functions
  • Support tech team as needed
  • Meet with clients and manage their expectations
  • Miscellaneous / administrative tasks

Requirements:

  • Reliable
  • Team player
  • Hungry, motivated and self-driven with a strong desire to learn
  • Strong leadership qualities
  • Able to motivate programmers and produce high product standards
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills
  • Ability to work across multiple projects, align on goals and output good results
  • Ability to make critical decisions under pressure
  • Ability to work based on deadlines with limited supervision
  • Ability to prioritize and plan features based on stakeholder priorities and business values
  • Ability to distill technical concepts to business users
  • Able to manage expectations of clients and internal staff
  • ﻿Communication: Multilingual (English and Chinese) is an advantage
  • Have an entrepreneurial mindset - you must be comfortable rolling up your sleeves, thriving in ambiguity, and getting work done
  • No working experience required

Other information:

Working hours: Mondays to Fridays, 9am - 6pm

Location: 2 Leng Kee Road

This position is all about communication. While there will be others in the company with deeper knowledge in various areas, the PM is the piece that is most involved in every single aspect of the company. Their priority is to ensure every single piece in the company is on the same page.

Individuals who are prepared to step out of your comfort zone, please click on “APPLY NOW”!

2,tech project manager,/en/job/information-secuirty-compliance-manager-9319249,9319249,Information Secuirty Compliance Manager,False,False,6000,12000,SGD,Xiaomi Technologies Singapore Pte. Ltd.,25-Mar-22,False,,,202127014Z,,,,,,"

Xiaomi Corporation, registered in Asia as Xiaomi Inc., is a Chinese designer and manufacturer of consumer electronics and related software, home appliances, and household items. Behind Samsung, it is the second largest manufacturer of smartphones, all of which run the MIUI operating system, a fork of Android. In 2020, the company sold 146.3 million smartphones and, as of August 2021, its MIUI operating system had over 450 million monthly active users. It also is a major manufacturer of appliances including televisions, flashlights, unmanned aerial vehicles, and air purifiers using its Internet of Things and Xiaomi Smart Home product ecosystems. The name ""Xiaomi"" literally means millet and rice, and is based on the Buddhist concept of starting from the bottom before aiming for the top.

","

About The Company:

Xiaomi Corporation was founded in April 2010 and listed on the Main Board of the Hong Kong Stock Exchange on July 9, 2018 (1810.HK). Xiaomi is a consumer electronics and smart manufacturing company with smartphones and smart hardware connected by an IoT platform at its core.

Embracing our vision of “Make friends with users and be the coolest company in the users’ hearts”, Xiaomi continuously pursues innovations, high-quality user experience and operational efficiency. The company relentlessly builds amazing products with honest prices to let everyone in the world enjoy a better life through innovative technology.

Xiaomi is one of the world's leading smartphone companies. The company’s market share in terms of smartphone shipments ranked no. 2 globally in the second quarter of 2021.

Job Description:

  • Analyze management and technical controls to ensure that specific security and compliance requirements are met through the verification of documented processes, procedures, and standards to validate maintenance of secure configurations.
  • Track compliance across multiple security frameworks including ISO/IEC27xxx, NIST, GDPR, and CCPA and maintain up-to-date records of requirements and corresponding mitigating controls.
  • Monitor third-party risk assessments and assist in performing internal risk assessments.
  • Collaborate on critical IT projects to ensure that security policy/risk issues are addressed throughout the project life cycle.
  • Develop key performance metrics to track and ensure compliance with established policies and standards.
  • Work out the realistic solution to have security risk issues and requirements fixed or fulfilled

Job Requirement：

  • Bachelor's degree in computer science, with business and IT audit or compliance experience desired.
  • Knowledge and understanding of ISO27xxx, GDPR, NIST, and SOC-2 information security standards and/or frameworks.
  • Familiar with public clouds, like AWS, Azure, etc. understand the particular security/compliance challenge to the IT infrastructure running on public cloud.
  • Ability to maintain security documentation and manuals.
  • Minimum 5 years' experience conducting IT security management.
  • High-level of attention to detail and be a self-starter with the ability to work independently, multi-task, and adjust to shifting priorities
  • Strong oral and written communication skills.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • CISA, CISSP, PMP, CIPM, ISO 27XXX or other compliance certification
  • Strong analytical/problem-solving skills and cross-functional expertise across multiple IT operational and security disciplines
  • Experience executing IT, application development management, data management, incident and problem management processes; ITIL experience a plus
  • Broad and in-depth knowledge in the use of compliance monitoring and reporting platforms
  • Working knowledge of international compliance standards and requirements

column3: PERSOLKELLY is one of the largest recruitment companies in Asia Pacific providing comprehensive end-to-end workforce solutions to clients.
Headquartered in Singapore, the company was established in 2016 and is a joint venture between Kelly Services, Inc. and affiliates of PERSOL HOLDINGS Co. Ltd.

Today, PERSOLKELLY operates more than 45 offices across 13 markets including Australia, China, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Korea, Malaysia, New Zealand, Philippines, Singapore, Taiwan, Thailand, and Vietnam.

Our deep market understanding and industry expertise, honed over four decades of operations in Singapore, gives us an edge in driving business change and empowering your organisation to overcome future HR challenges. We combine our expertise with genuine human insights to provide strategic solutions for your HR needs. Our team will partner with you to enhance your HR practices, so you can confidently achieve more.

Responsibilities:
  • Establish project goals/charter and delivery plans to implement IT infrastructure systems in engaging with business users and tech teams (e.g. IT operation team, IT security team, IT vendors).
  • Review business requirements and IT solutions & design to meet the scope of work and develop a detailed project plan.
  • Manage IT infrastructure implementation projects with regard to scope, schedule, budget, resources, quality, procurement, risk and change management with proper project management methodrogies.
  • As RHQ, play an active supporting role to other Asean region branches’ IT infrastructure system implementation projects.
  • Understand the bank’s IT infrastructure vision, strategies, existing system environments, operations and security rules.
  • Understand the stakeholders’ roles & responsibilities in the bank and close communicate with them.
  • Coordinate WBS with the stakeholders covering overall scope engaging with tech teams as well as business users to ensure all stakeholder's timely resource management.
  • Manage project activities to ensure timely delivery, including identification of critical path, monitoring and driving completion of interdependent activities and adjustment to project schedules to achieve overall completion deadline.
  • Ensure the regular project governance has been in place and following up closely with all project change requests via a proper change management process. Document and track closely on the project scope, changes, issues and risks as project management life cycle.
  • Coordinating project documentations (e.g. system design, test results) as required to ensure successful project completion.
  • Manage Stakeholder’s expectations by reporting all project status and progress regularly and consistently.
  • Conduct post-project assessment as part of the lesson learnt for continuous improvement for future projects.
Requirements:
  • Min. 10 years of Information Technology experience and 7 years of project management experience
  • Experienced in infra and middleware projects (50% infra & 50% app)
  • Windows / UNIX / Linux Knowledge in Messaging Technologies (MQ)(a kind of API) and Websphere knowledge is a plus

4,tech project manager,/en/job/technical-project-manager-shopeepay-9427421,9427421,Technical Project Manager - ShopeePay,False,False,,,SGD,SHOPEE SINGAPORE LITE ADS,30-Mar-22,False,,,201503526N,,,2001 - 5000 Employees,,,"<div>

column3: Shopee is the leading e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan. It is a platform tailored for the region, providing customers with an easy, secure and fast online shopping experience through strong payment and logistical support.

Shopee aims to continually enhance its platform and become the region’s e-commerce destination of choice via ongoing product optimisation and localised user-centered strategies. Shopee, a Sea company, was first launched in Singapore in 2015, and has since expanded its reach to Malaysia, Thailand, Taiwan, Indonesia, Vietnam and the Philippines. Sea is a leader in digital entertainment, e-commerce and digital financial services across Greater Southeast Asia. Sea's mission is to better the lives of consumers and small businesses with technology, and is listed on the NYSE under the symbol SE. The Shopee team comprises over 8,000 employees from across the region, and with our rapid expansion, we are constantly on the lookout for potential talents who have the passion and drive to become part of a fast-moving and dynamic team.

column1:
","

The Engineering and Technology team is at the core of the Shopee platform development. The team is made up of a group of passionate engineers from all over the world, striving to build the best systems with the most suitable technologies. Our engineers do not merely solve problems at hand; We build foundations for a long-lasting future. We don't limit ourselves on what we can or can't do; we take matters into our own hands even if it means drilling down to the bottom layer of the computing platform. Shopee's hyper-growing business scale has transformed most ""innocent"" problems into huge technical challenges, and there is no better place to experience it first-hand if you love technologies as much as we do. Browse our Engineering and Technology team openings to see how you can make an impact with us.

Job Description:

  • Define resource allocation, project scope, roles and responsibilities and project timeline within ShopeePay team
  • Support Tech Leads in the allocation of resources based on the comprehensive understanding of engineers’ capabilities 
  • Drive project direction and actively monitor project status to ensure high quality of project delivery 
  • Facilitate weekly status meetings, review and report to stakeholders regularly on a timely basis 
  • Identify and address problems that arise with the project team 
  • Decide alternatives/work-around in time to ensure that project deliverables meet expectations
  • Work closely in a cross-functional team with product managers and engineers, to resolve issues within the project lifecycle
  • Responsible for internal and external project-related communications, improving and optimising the project processes, and delivering project requirements 
  • Develop project management standards and implement standards within the organisation

Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree or above and has relevant technical experience related to fintech and/or payment 
  • Comfortable working in a variety of delivery methods for example Waterfall, Agile & Hybrid styles
  • Analytical and structured thinking with the ability to break problems down into milestones and deliverables
  • Good discipline in risk control to achieve a high standard in a highly regulated environment
  • Ability to work in a dynamic environment and manage deadlines or unexpected changes in requirements or deliverables 
  • Highly effective in communicating with technical and non-technical stakeholders with the ability to build and foster working relationships
  • Familiar with distributed systems, databases, typical middleware (Nginx, Redis, RabbitMQ, etc.)
  • Participated in the design and development of large-scale distributed systems, and experience in architecture design and development of service-oriented, high-concurrency systems are preferred
  • Possesses technical knowledge in Python and Golang, and/or usage of Jira and Confluence is a plus

Karooooo Management Company Pte Ltd is a leading global provider of data analytic solutions for mobile asset management, asset recovery and workforce optimisation based on a proven Software-as-a-Service platform. Fleet management, Stolen Vehicle Recovery and insurance telematics services remain its core business, with a focus on technology development to enhance customer experience. The company is a service-centric organisation focusing on the in-house design, development and installation of telematics technology and data analytics.

Karooooo Management Company Pte Ltd technology is widely accepted by motor manufacturers and insurers. Its customer telematics web interface provides a comprehensive set of features ensuring the optimisation of both fleet and human resources. As an expansion of its integrated service offering, Karooooo also provides driver risk assessment offerings in the insurance telematics field.

","

Are you curious, innovative and passionate?

Do you take ownership, embrace challenges and love problem-solving?

We’re a world-leading smart mobility SaaS tech company with over 1,500,000 subscribers across 23 countries and we’re looking for a Functional Software Project Manager to join our team. Our teams are collaborative, vibrant and fast-growing, and all team members are empowered with the freedom to influence our business with ideas that drive innovation and efficiency.

Responsibility

  • Work alongside the Group CEO and CTO to deliver world-leading products that fulfil Karooooo’s vision and mission.
  • Ensure that projects are delivered on-time, within cost and of excellent quality.
  • Initiate and drive detailed processes based on internal defined milestones to track progress, increase accountability and ensure projects are kept on track.
  • Communicate to product owners, marketing, engineering and senior leadership on goals, progress, and process efficiencies.
  • Seek improvements to improve the practice of product management at Cartrack to help drive hyper-growth at scale.
  • All other ad-hoc duties as assigned by Group CEO.

Requirements

  • Bachelor Degree in engineering or related area from 1st tier university.
  • 5+ years of project management in software development environment. o Understanding of Agile software development practices.
  • Strong proficiency in Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint. o Jira a plus.
  • Strong organizational, project management and coordination skills to prioritize activities, manage conflicting needs, and deal with many issues at any given time.
  • Experience in the automotive/SaaS industry is a plus.
  • Excellent communication skills to work multiple types of stakeholders.

column1: The company has also invested in providing innovative services to enhance clients’ marketing productivity with innovative software applications and adoption platforms.

We take pride in delivering strong pre-sales support through our well-trained direct sales teams. Over the past years, our team has built strong customer relationship in the government (ministries and GLCs), education institutions, data-centers and top corporate organization. Similarly, our retail channel business has grown as a result of several innovative growth ideas implemented with non-traditional retail partners.

Every client is supported by a team of customer-support officers who ensure seamless after-sales experience together with the sales personnel. Unsatisfied with our success, we are spearheading new customer segments to offer the same high standard of customer experience to the rest of the commercial users.

We partner with world-class US & Japanese manufacturers to deliver exceptional user experience that has won us accolades. We have constantly been part of the SME 500 community and to meet our growing needs, we are looking for committed, highly motivated individuals to join us
","

Project management

  • Coordinate all aspects of project, including scheduling, staffing, coordinate with other trades, coordinate with sales person and customer to ensure project rungs smoothly.
  • Plan and schedule engineering, installation, and subcontracting activities on large and/or complex systems, including site surveys and client needs analysis.
  • Direct and supervise project administration, subs and engineers to establish project guidelines, contract negotiation, staff needs, and project meetings.
  • Work with engineering department on design and drafting phases of jobs and with purchasing for accurate and timely procurement of equipment
  • Manage the project budget, schedule, and scope of work
  • Maintain a safe and secure jobsite, and ensure all permitting and compliance regulations are met.
  • Identify and resolve any changes or issues that may arise during the construction phase, including generating change orders. Detail oriented and capable of daily-weekly follow up on all assigned projects
  • Familiarity with electrical, network, base building, blocking requirements for project implementation
  • Oversee all technical aspects, engineering, and construction activities according to project plans

Cable termination/Rigging/Equipment Installation/Tech Management

Pulling cable to required areas, installing equipment into racks or designated areas, landing cables to equipment, permanently attaching equipment to building structure, managing technician teams doing installation work to ensure schedule is met and work is being performed at the top of their ability.

Testing/Tuning

Test all equipment installed to ensure proper functionality and fix any non- functioning equipment; tune all audio and video equipment and/or prep and test lighting and rigging to maximize functionality and performance.

Training

Train the end user on use of A/V system and/or lighting and rigging, explaining all aspects of system functionality and troubleshooting techniques.

Design and Engineering

  • Design/build: create an audio visual and/or lighting and rigging system that fits client’s needs and examine functional diagrams such as CAD drawings for plan of equipment operation
  • Consultant: review submitted specs and drawings and suggest changes wherever needed.

Programming – Lighting and Rigging Systems and/or DSP

Create and load a signal flow design to a processor that enables an A/V system to function how the system was specified to the client during the design stage;

Control System

Create logic points that are selected using a touch pad or hard buttons from remote locations to control different functions of the system throughout the venue. Ensure that all safety measures are implemented and strictly followed.

Site Survey

Obtain information about prospective job site such as taking measurements, deciding tools needed, loading area, parking, point of contact, site times, etc.

Administrative

Manage and file all paperwork and computer documents pertaining to the job including emails, job expense receipts and PO’s, delivery acknowledgement forms, system acceptance forms, transmittals, faxes, etc. scheduling of site meetings between contractors when needed as well as client meetings

Operation Manuals/Close Out Documents

Assist in compiling, and deliver to the client, an operation manual which explains in detail how to properly operate the installed A/V system and/or lighting and rigging system including pictures when available; closing document signed to system specification and begin system warranty

7,tech project manager,/en/job/project-manager-it-technical-9375999,9375999,Project Manager (IT/Technical),False,False,5500,6500,SGD,X0Pa Ai Pte. Ltd.,27-Mar-22,False,,,201708580N,,,,,81 Ayer Rajah Crescent,,"

X0PA AI is an Artificial Intelligence Software as a Service (SaaS) start-up that aims to digitally transform the hiring process. We aim to save companies significant time and cost in hiring while achieving the highest level of objectivity, ultimately enhancing retention, loyalty and person to job and organization fit. Through our AI and Machine Learning capabilities, we can source, score and rank talent to identify the best talent for each organization. X0PA AI has recently launched X0PA ROOM, an AI enabled hybrid video interviewing and assessment platform.

What We Offer

We are a bunch of fun loving – warm and friendly culture, self-motivated professionals. We offer an inclusive, diverse and motivated work environment with huge learning opportunities, benefits, career growth

Responsibilities

  • Work with cross-functional management in Engineering, Product Management, QA, Customer Support, Operations, etc. to plan and deliver product customizations to market.
  • Provide program management during all phases of an engineering program: ideation, design, development, testing, and release.
  • Lead cross-functional teams to manage the execution of project plans, including feature prioritization and scoping, resource conflicts, scheduling, progress tracking, issue resolution, defect management, managing steering committee .
  • Run cross-functional stand-ups and drive decision-making around schedule adjustments, bug triage, and internal and external partner/customer delivery.
  • Proactively identify and resolve roadblocks/challenges affecting projects.
  • Apply Software development lifecycle (SDLC) methods and other process disciplines to ensure predictable, consistent, timely program execution in spite of a large, distributed organization.
  • Leverage your expertise to identify and define the most critical priorities and establish best practices for the program team.
  • Regularly assess risks, drive process improvements, and find new ways of operating, with a focus on simplification and productivity.
  • Help define metrics and project success criteria. 

Job Requirements

  • Good understanding of web, cloud, online payment technologies and API technology is a plus
  • Ensures effective, to-the-point and coherent communication with all stakeholders of the project – clients, designers, management team, 3rd party vendors, tech team, etc.
  • Coordinates with various in-house teams to ensure seamless execution of the project across functional teams like design team, UI developers, backend developers, data team etc.
  • Identifies business development and “add-on” sales opportunities as they relate to a specific project
  • Creates and maintains project artifacts – Requirement document, Functional solution document, Dependencies tracker, Project timeline, Project UI / UX Definitions, UAT Test Plan etc.
  • Handles multiple projects at a time, and prioritizes activities based on financial goals for the project, thus taking optimal decisions
  • Preferably Singaporeans

Skills

  • 5+ years of engineering program or project management experience
  • Previous experience as a SCRUM Master / Agile Coach / Tech Program Manager
  • Software product development and release management experience.
  • Proven track record of managing large-scale, complex, cross functional technical projects
  • Hands-on experience with Jira
  • Bachelor’s degree or above in engineering or another technical field
  • Experience in managing projects using waterfall and agile methodologies
  • Experience in a high growth business environment
  • Experience in fast paced Start ups is a plus

Experience in handling projects with multiple team members, handled SAAS projects would be added advantage

Desired Skills and Experience: software-as-a-service, Machine Learning, AI, Integration, Organisation, start-up, Scrum, Software Project Management, Agile Methodologies, Requirements Analysis, Atlassian JIRA, Software Development, Capability, Management

Our Vision 

Ensure workplace happiness through objective and best match between an employee and employer. 

Our Mission 

Maximise objectivity in hiring 

Our Core Values 

Respect 

Honesty 

Collaboration 

Ownership 

Humility 

We founded X0PA AI to tackle the most strategic challenge that organisations face: how to maximise objectivity in hiring. In the pursuit of that mission, we inject the values we respect – respect, honesty, collaboration, ownership, as well as humility. We shape the AI talent management structure of corporate and enterprise-level organisations, changing the way they think about growth: with talent and teamwork at the centre. We partner with our clients to provide them with the expertise, tools and technology they need.

column2:
Ascenz provides remote fuel consumption and bunkering monitoring system to shipping companies that are looking for fuel savings and efficiency management. Our vision is to be the world's most dynamic technology company, using our pioneering spirit to create value for our clients through the advanced use of technology. Ascenz will build long-term shareholder value through competitive returns and profitable growth. We strive to build long-term clients and suppliers' relationship based on mutual trust and respect. We are also dedicated to creating a workplace that respects and values people.","

Reporting to the Head of Operations, the Technician will work closely with the Project Manager and will be responsible for preparations and execution of customers’ projects from Project Initiation to release to Operations including coordination, system assembly, testing, implementation, execution, control and completion of specific projects ensuring consistency with company's strategy, commitments and goals. The Technician will work closely with the various teams to ensure successful implementation of the projects from contract award to system commissioning and delivery to our customers.

Duties

  • Work with the PM to ensure all deliverables within the projects, meet required quality levels, budgets and timescale
  • Generate Bill of Material based on the order requirements.
  • System Assembly, Testing, Shipment, Warehouse and Stock Management
  • Coordinate with various departments to resolve customers’ queries.
  • Provide remote support
  • Attend to assignment according to requirement locally and overseas
  • Carry out in house testing on new products
  • Liaise with contractors and customers to ensure on time delivery of projects
  • Attend Local or Overseas Site Survey
  • Attend Local or Overseas Commissioning onboard vessels
  • Prepare report according to Site Survey requirement and post commissioning
  • Prepare Schematic and Termination Drawing in accordance to requirement
  • Provide technical support to customers
  • Troubleshoot / isolate faults and repair faults

Knowledge/Skills/Qualification:

  • Nitec/Higher Nitec/Diploma in Electrical, Electronics, Mechanical or equivalent
  • Customer oriented and a team player with ability to work independently
  • Effective communication skills

column2: Founded in 1908, Great Eastern is a market leader and a well-established trusted brand in Singapore and Malaysia. With S$82.5 billion in assets and over 4 million policyholders, the Group also operates in Indonesia and Brunei and has a presence in China as well as a representative office in Myanmar.

The Great Eastern Life Assurance Company Limited and Great Eastern General Limited have been assigned the financial strength and counterparty credit ratings of ""AA-"" by Standard and Poor's since 2010, one of the highest among Asian life insurance companies.

We are a LIFE company and our purpose is to empower generations to live healthier and better so that they can live life to the fullest. Be it celebrating life’s simple moments or commemorating life’s major milestones, every day, in many ways, we inspire those around us to live great and celebrate life.

Please note that our career opportunities are only posted on our Career Website (http://grp.gelife.co/findacareer) and on our authorised job platforms which are specifically LinkedIn, JobStreet and eFinancialCareers. We do not initiate any unsolicited calls and all official emails from Great Eastern will be sent from email addresses ending with “@greateasternlife.com”. Should you receive any communications outside from these channels listed, please do not provide any personal information and do reach out to us at GreatCareers@GreatEasternLife.com or at 6248 2990 for us to assist you and confirm the legitimacy of the content.","
Job Purpose
Work collaboratively with stakeholders to manage change and implement projects and ongoing enhancements that ensure the product strategy will accommodate business needs
The Job
  • Performs Project Management activities such as managing deliverables, managing defects, prioritisation, develop action items, monitor resource allocations and track delivery of outcomes.
  • Documentation and communication of timelines, priorities, status updates, issues and progress.
  • Work with Business  Representatives and IT to gather business requirements, determine solutions, assess impact, define scope, estimate effort and coordinate testing
  • Perform business related studies on the upcoming requirements / enhancements in terms of business costs and customer adoption rate, customer experience, and operational efficiencies.
  • Provide user related inputs to PRA (Project Risks Assessment).
  • Create BRD (Business Requirements Document), that outlines the As-Is Process, To-Be Process, problem statements, goals/metrics to be achieved in the new module, detailed use cases with all happy flows and exceptional flows.
  • Be the representative of users for any user-related decision making during development and SIT phases.
  • Identify key risks and issues faced by the users and resolve the issues in time.
  • Create UAT test plan and test cases, based on all scenarios in BRD and coordinate with all relevant users on the UAT matters.
  • Monitor the progress of UAT and be the decision makers in prioritizing the defects to be fixed. In some cases, to come up with process workarounds with relevant users to close the UAT successfully.
  • Create training and briefing materials and conduct trainings to users / stakeholders.
  • Conduct Production Verifications upon deployments.
  • Maintain the backlog list of defects / change requests / enhancements and prioritize them for fixing and deployment.
  • Manages other project migrations / interface changes that impact system.
  • Facilitate and participate in detailed quality assurance of defects / enhancements ready for production releases.
  • Create and design communications materials to promote the Great Digital Advantage platforms to users and stakeholders.
  • Oversee the day-to-day helpdesk support for all end users and maintain tracking of issues and feedback.
  • Oversee the maintenance of FAQs.
  • Takes accountability in considering business and regulatory compliance risks and takes appropriate steps to mitigate the risks.
  • Maintains awareness of industry trends on regulatory compliance, emerging threats and technologies in order to understand the risk and better safeguard the company.
  • Highlights any potential concerns /risks and proactively shares best risk management practices.
Our Requirements
  • A degree in Computer Science or Business Information System or related discipline with relevant experience is preferred
  • Minimum 3-4 years of working experience in Info Tech and Life-Insurance space with some knowledge of Project management concepts
  • Ability to work proactively, under own initiative with minimal supervision
  • Proactive problem solver with good communication, organizational and people skills
  • Highly organized and detail orientated is a must
  • Must be able to document and present work in a clear and concise manner
  • Strong computer skills with Microsoft Word, Excel and Power point
  • High level of integrity, takes accountability of work and good attitude over teamwork.
  • Takes initiative to improve current state of things and adaptable to embrace new changes.
About Great Eastern
Established in 1908, Great Eastern places customers at the heart of everything we do. Our legacy extends beyond our products and services to our culture, which is defined by our core values and how we work. As champions of Integrity, Initiative and Involvement, our core values act as a compass, guiding and inspiring us to embrace the behaviours associated with each value, upholding our promise to our customers - to continue doing our best for them in a sustainable manner. We work collaboratively with our stakeholders to look for candidates who exhibit or have the potential to embrace our core values and associated behaviours, as these are the key traits that we expect from our employees as they develop their careers with us. We embrace inclusivity, giving all employees an equal opportunity to shine and play their role in exploring possibilities to deliver innovative insurance solutions.Since 2018, Great Eastern has been a signatory to the United Nations (UN) Principles of Sustainable Insurance. Our sustainability approach around environmental, social, and governance (ESG) considerations play a key role in every business decision we make. We are committed to being a sustainability-driven company to achieve a low-carbon economy by managing the environmental footprint of our operations and incorporating ESG considerations in our investment portfolios; improving people's lives by actively helping customers live healthier, better and longer; and drive responsible business practices through material ESG risk management.
To all recruitment agencies:
Great Eastern does not accept unsolicited agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to our email or our employees. We will not be responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

column2: United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices.

column3: In 1935, amid the economic uncertainties following the Great Depression, UOB opened its doors to offer banking services for the merchant community in Singapore.

Since then, UOB has grown organically and through a series of strategic acquisitions. Today, UOB is rated among the world’s top banks: ‘Aa1’ by Moody’s and ‘AA-’ by Standard & Poor’s and Fitch Ratings.

Generations of UOB employees for the past 80 years have carried through the entrepreneurial spirit, focus on long-term value creation and an unwavering commitment to do what is right for our customers and our colleagues.
At UOB, we believe in being a responsible financial services provider and we are committed to making a difference in the lives of our stakeholders and in the communities in which we operate.

Just as we are dedicated to helping our customers manage their finances wisely and grow their businesses, UOB is steadfast in our support of social development, particularly in the areas of art, children and education.

About UOB
United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices. Our history spans more than 80 . Over this time, we have been guided by our values — Honorable, Enterprising, United and Committed. This means we always strive to do what is right, build for the future, work as one team and pursue long-term success. It is how we work, consistently, be it towards the company, our colleagues or our customers.
About the Department
The Technology and Operations function is comprised of five teams of specialists with distinct capabilities: business partnership, technology, operations, risk governance and planning support and services. We work closely together to harness the power of technology to support our and digital banking services and operations. This includes developing, centralising and standardising technology systems as well as banking operations in Singapore and overseas branches.
Job Responsibilities
  • Lead the discussions at the project working and steering committee
  • Plan and man budget, technical deliverables as per plan
  • Work with the Functional Business Analyst to ensure that functional requirements are well defined and delivered
  • Work with the Architects and Solution Architects to ensure solution designs are delivered
  • Work with the Tech Delivery manrs to deliver detailed estimates for the build and test phases of the program.
  • Ensure the deliveries are as per plan. Pro-actively highlight risks and develop mitigation strategies
  • End-to-end responsibility for multiple projects in the region
Job Requirements
  • Project Manr with at least 12 ' experience in Banking, Consulting, IT services with proven track record
  • Experience should include working on transformation initiatives within the APAC region related to retail credit decision processes, data analytics and credit scoring models.
  • Demonstrate a good mix of technical and functional skills and be cognizant of market practices, regulations and regional nuances.
  • Demonstrate excellent project manment capabilities evidenced by successful project delivery
  • Possess excellent communication skills
  • Understanding of Origination systems and tools such as Experian (Strategy Manr as well as Customer manment), FICO (TRIAD) or equivalent will be an added advant.
Be a part of UOB Family
UOB is an equal opportunity employer. UOB does not discriminate on the basis of a candidate's , race, gender, color, religion, sexual orientation, or mental disability, or other non-merit factors. All employment decisions at UOB are based on business needs, job requirements and qualifications. If you require any assistance or accommodations to be made for the recruitment process, please inform us when you submit your online application.

Apply now and make a difference.

column4: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column5: The future is being built today, and Johnson Controls is making that future more productive, more secure and more sustainable. We create intelligent buildings, efficient energy solutions and integrated infrastructure that work seamlessly together to deliver on the promise of smart cities and communities. At its core, that promise is about delivering innovation that make people’s lives – and the world – better.

column4: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column5: Johnson Controls is a global diversified technology and multi industrial leader serving a wide range of customers in more than 150 countries. Our commitment to sustainability dates back to our roots in 1885, with the invention of the first electric room thermostat. We are committed to helping our customers win everywhere, every day and creating greater value for all of our stakeholders through our strategic focus on buildings.

column4: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column5: Johnson Controls Building Technologies and Solutions Singapore is a single source provider of integrated smart green building systems, services and solutions. The comprehensive life-cycle approach to in-building technology and operations includes planning and design, installation, integration, optimization and maintenance. One of Building Construction Authority's term contractors under the Green Mark Incentive Scheme, Johnson Controls is a trusted certified Energy Services Company.

column4: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column5: With the global merger between Johnson Controls and Tyco in 2016, we have an even stronger suite of offerings for our customers, including verticals such as data centers, healthcare and transportation. The company has a good track record for system integration for complex facilities.

column4: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column5: Johnson Controls' products are now installed in more than 40 percent of commercial buildings in Singapore. We have two offices and about 900 employees in Singapore.

column4: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column5: Johnson Controls is fast emerging as a leader in combining its traditional strengths in building technology and system integration with digital innovations. In 2019, Johnson Controls was named “IoT Innovator of the Year” by IoT Breakthrough Awards and won the IBcon Digie Award for its groundbreaking work on an iconic AI-powered smart building.

column4: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column5: Keep in touch with these exciting developments by following us at “Johnson Controls Asia Pacific” on LinkedIn.

column1:
","
Who we are
Johnson Controls is the global leader for smart, healthy and sustainable buildings. At Johnson Controls, we’ve been making buildings smarter since 1885, and our capabilities, depth of innovation experience, and global reach have been growing ever since. Today, we offer the world’s largest portfolio of building products, technologies, software, and services; we put that portfolio to work to transform the environments where people live, work, learn and play.
This is where Johnson Controls comes in, helping drive the outcomes that matter most. Through a full range of systems and digital solutions, we make your buildings smarter. A smarter building is safer, more comfortable, more efficient, and, ultimately, more sustainable. Most important, smarter buildings let you focus more intensely on your unique mission. Better for your people. Better for your bottom line. Better for the planet. We’re helping to create a healthy planet with solutions that decrease energy use, reduce waste and make carbon neutrality a reality.
Sustainability is a top priority for our company. We committed to invest 75 percent of new product development R&D in climate-related innovation to develop sustainable products and services. We take sustainability seriously. Achieving net zero carbon emissions before 2040 is just one of our commitments to making the world a better place.
Please visit and follow Johnson Controls Pacific linkedin for recent exciting activities.
JCI Pacific Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/johnson-controls-australia-pty-ltd/
Career   The Power Behind Your Mission
OpenBlue   OpenBlue: This is How a Space Comes Alive
What you will do
  • Acts as on-site project leader to plan, execute, and complete assigned projects
  • Delegates tasks to execute and fully complete assigned projects
  • Participates in strategic and tactical planning process and assumes ownership of the project planning and progress vs plan
  • Identifies and analyzes risks and project priorities, suggest alternative solutions and monitors their implementation
  • Coordinate and monitor work progress with customer and relevant parties for information to expedite installation
  • Supervision of sub-contractors’ work at site
  • Schedule purchase and deliveries of all materials for the project in a timely manner
  • Check and ensure all installations conform to project specifications
  • Update projects progress regularly to his supervisor
  • Assign task to, and supervise Assistant Project Engineer, Technician, if any
  • System applications, drafting, data base generation and commissioning
  • Identify and secure variation order
  • Cost control. Monitor and ensure delivery of financial commitment as per CIS
  • Ensure that all work completed are filed and invoiced
  • Follow-up on payment from customers and verify payment to our suppliers
  • Train customer and provide first year maintenance warranty schedule visit
  • Hand over project to customer and later to service team
  • Perform regular quality audit for all the suppliers and sub-contractors
What we are looking for
  • Degree, Diploma/ ITC or 5 years’ experience in lieu in BMS/BAS/Controls field with minimum 3 years of supervisory experience
  • Excel, Word and Project essential
  • Require interaction with clients, consultants and sub-contractors, etc.
Diversity & Inclusion
Our dedication to diversity and inclusion starts with our values. We lead with integrity and purpose, focusing on the future and aligning with our customers’ vision for success. Our High-Performance Culture ensures that we have the best talent that is highly engaged and eager to innovate.  Our D&I mission elevates each employee’s responsibility to contribute to our culture. It’s through these contributions that we’ll drive the mindsets and behaviors we need to power our customers’ missions. You have the power. You have the voice. You have the culture in your hands.

column3: Citi is more than a global financial services company. It’s an engine for progress. Join us, and you’ll have the chance to get involved in progress in all its shapes and forms, right across the world. From the micro to the macro, from Australia to Zambia, the work we do has real positive impact. Wherever you are and whatever you do, progress starts here.

Mission: Citi's mission is to serve as a trusted partner to our clients by responsibly providing financial services that enable growth and economic progress. Our core activities are safeguarding assets, lending money, making payments and accessing the capital markets on behalf of our clients. We are Citi, the global bank – an institution connecting millions of people across hundreds of countries and cities.

column1:
","
The IT Project Tech Lead is a strategic professional who stays abreast of developments within own field and contributes to directional strategy by considering their application in own job and the business. Recognized technical authority for an area within the business. Requires basic commercial awareness. There are typically multiple people within the business that provide the same level of subject matter expertise. Developed communication and diplomacy skills are required in order to guide, influence and convince others, in particular colleagues in other areas and occasional external customers. Significant impact on the area through complex deliverables. Provides advice and counsel related to the technology or operations of the business. Work impacts an entire area, which eventually affects the overall performance and effectiveness of the sub-function/job family.
Responsibilities:
  • Develops detailed IT work plans, schedules; project estimates, resource plans and status reports.
  • Interfaces with senior project staff and client senior manment teams regarding status of projects.
  • Recommends and oversees process improvements.
  • Has considerable business impact through in-depth evaluation of complex business processes, system processes and industry standards.
  • Provides expertise in area and an advanced level of understanding of the principles of IT project leadership.
  • Possesses a comprehensive understanding of how own area and others (i.e., architecture or infrastructure) collectively integrate to contribute towards achieving business objectives.
  • Directly impacts the business by influencing strategic functional decisions through advice, counsel or provided services.
  • Acts as advisor or coach to new or lower level analysts; allocates work.
  • Provides in-depth and sophisticated analysis with interpretive thinking to define problems and develop innovative solutions.
  • Persuades and influences others through and comprehensive communication and diplomacy skills.
  • Appropriately assess risk when business decisions are made, demonstrating particular consideration for the firm's reputation and safeguarding Citigroup, its clients and assets, by driving compliance with applicable laws, rules and regulations, adhering to Policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and escalating, managing and reporting control issues with transparency.
Qualifications:
  • 6-10 experience in a related technology role and subject matter expert in overall field
Education:
  • Bachelor’s/University or equivalent experience, potentially Masters
This job description provides a high-level review of the types of work performed. Other job-related duties may be assigned as required.

PROJECT MANAGER (ELECTRICAL/YISHUN)
JOB DESCRIPTION
  • Manage Cost Budget, Planning, Forecast, Schedule, Coordination, Communication, Supervision, Collection and Payment, Cash Flow.
  • To manage unforeseen site situations and take actions accordingly.
  • To work as a Team player, communicator, task taker and take ownership on assignment.
  • To equip with can-do attitude, self-driven, self-discipline, self-motivated, hand-on individual, keen to learn and improve and equipped with business acumen etc.
  • Excellent in reading and understanding construction plan and drawings.
  • To submit weekly report on Project activities, progress, update costing sheet and variation sales order.
  • To ensure works adhere to safety practices and regulations, work schedules, quality and timely.
  • To coordinate closely with Clients, Main Contractors, Sub-Contractors and Internal Team on design, submission, approval, progress of works, documentation and Testing and Commissioning etc.
  • To ensure that the relevant information is well communicated to all support parties to enable them to effectively understand in carrying out their duties and delivery.
  • To establish proper, systematic, complete documentation and store in the Company’s database.
  • To work with Safety Officer/Manager on Risk Assessment, Evaluation, Submission and Approval for projects’ sites to identify on any potential source of risks and danger, recommend and take appropriate and practicable steps to eliminate/avoid possible risks/dangers.
  • Be responsible for the coordination of all site matters with internal and/or external parties.
  • To liaise and clarify with relevant parties on technical/engineering requirements and detailing, including attending site coordination meeting with other Service Providers.
  • To implement Quality Control and Standard of Operations, avoid potential re-work and safety matters on the site.
  • To plan the work schedule accurately and efficiently organize with closed monitoring on sites in-order to meet the project completion timeline.
  • To prepare Method of Statement for the site works and review the Risk Assessment/Evaluation submitted by Sub Contractors. Ensure Company frees from any liability and responsibility.
JOB REQUIREMENTS
  • Degree/Diploma/ITE certification in Electrical Engineering
  • Capable to lead a team of Technician/Engineer with positive leadership and team spirit
  • Good working attitude with high level of professionalism, integrity, and self-discipline.
  • Able to work independently and possess good interpersonal skills.
  • Outgoing character, used to work outdoor environment, like to communicate with others,
    logical sense thinking and willing to travel oversee upon needed

column2: In 1968, at the very outset of the global semiconductor industry, entrepreneur Arthur del Prado established ASM in the Netherlands. Mr Del Prado then served as President, Chief Executive Officer and Chairman of the Management Board of ASM International until his retirement, in 2008. Acclaimed as the ""father of the European semiconductor equipment industry”, his contributions to the industry are legendary. Guided by his unique pioneering vision of how the industry would develop, ASM began to sell its own wafer processing equipment for semiconductor manufacturers. Our long journey as industry pioneers was underway.

column1: <div>

column2: We’re a truly global company. Based ​in 14 countries, we benefit from a wider perspective and the advantages of bringing together the best brains in the world to create new breakthroughs.

column1: <div>

column3: We pioneered important aspects of many established wafer-processing technologies used in industry, including lithography, deposition, ion implant and single-wafer epitaxy. In recent years, we brought Atomic Layer Deposition (ALD) and Plasma Enhanced Atomic Layer Deposition (PEALD) from R&D right through to mainstream production at advanced manufacturers sites.

Our broad portfolio of innovative technologies and products are being used right now by the most advanced semiconductor fabrication plants around the world. Helping them to progress along their technology roadmap. Making integrated circuits or chips smaller, faster and more powerful for everyone. ASM is part of the ASM International NV group that also includes ASM Pacific Technology (ASMPT). ASMPT, in which ASMI holds a substantial ownership of approximately 40%, is a leading supplier of semiconductor process equipment for wafer assembly and packaging, and for surface mount technology.

From the very start of the semiconductor industry to the present day, we've been technology leaders who have pioneered innovation and brought new processes into mainstream manufacturing. We are collaborating, creating, and delivering on our vision - a shared vision to drive innovation with new technologies and delivering excellence with dependable products. By doing this, we'll create new possibilities for everyone to understand, create and share more of what they love.

Be part of our exciting future and join our team today!

SunningdaleTech Ltd is a leading precision tooling, plastics injection moulding and precision assembly company providing a broad spectrum of capabilities that include product & mould designs, mould fabrications, ultra-precision high cavitations toolings, precision injection moulding with finishing processes like spray painting and laser etching, through to precision assembly of complete products.

Boosting a strong presence in Singapore, Malaysia, China, Indonesia and Mexico, Sunningdale Tech has a total factory space of more that 1.6 million sq feet, with more than 550 injection molding machines and a tooling capacity of 2,500 molds per year; we are focusing on serving four key business segments including Automotive, Consumer/IT/Environment, Healthcare and Tooling.

We believe that our employees are our most important asset.  As an employee, you’ll benefit from an environment of engaged colleagues, thought leadership, and opportunities for career advancement and recognition.
Be part of the leading high-precision engineering and manufacturing technologies!

column3: Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.

column1:
","

Responsibilities

About TikTok

TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.

About the team

TikTok and affiliate are developing the next-generation high-performance analytical database, with a mission to enable efficient and real-time data-driven decision-making on PB-level data sets. The initial product was forked from Clickhouse, after which large re-architecture had been taken place. The product now not only improves the efficiency of Clickhouse but also fits into the elastic cloud-native infrastructure with better scalability and resource utilization. With years of polishment in the internal EB-level scenarios, we are now ready to serve our business partners via various cloud vendors.

What you will be doing:

We are looking for an innovative Tech Lead Manager to join the team. As the Tech Lead Manager, you will oversee the company’s technical team and all projects they undertake, analyze briefs, write progress reports, identify risks, and develop work schedules. You should be able to work with your team and inspire them to reach their goals.

You will be leading a team and contributing directly to the database engine, including but not limited to storage, query execution, metadata management, resource management, and performance optimization. By joining this team, you can look forward to a great opportunity to solve hard problems and grow.

  • Be both a highly technical, hands-on coder and effective people manager.
  • Effectively scale the engineering team by attracting and mentoring extraordinary people at various levels of experience to grow a high-performing and diverse team.
  • Work with the product team on product vision and oversee the engineering roadmap.
  • Determining project requirements and developing work schedules for the team.
  • Delegating tasks and achieving daily, weekly, and monthly goals.
  • Identifying risks and forming contingency plans as soon as possible.
  • Contribute to the database engine, by leading technical design, implementation, and verification
  • Ensure code quality, extensibility, and sustainability within the module/project
  • Keeping up-to-date with industry trends and developments.

Qualifications

What you should have:

  • Bachelor’s/Master Degree or Ph.D. in computer science, engineering, or a related field.
  • At least 10 years of relevant software engineering experience with 5 years of team management.
  • Expert with Linux operating system principles, networking, and multi-threading
  • Expert in software development skills in modern C++
  • Expert in working on one or more of these technologies is a plus: ClickHouse, Apache Impala, Prestodb, Trino, Apache Doris, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Greenplum
  • Strong leadership and organizational abilities.
  • Excellent communication, motivational, and interpersonal skills.
  • Contributor/Committer or PMC of the open-source community is a plus

Our commitment to design, technology, strategy and innovation allows us to bring effective and yet innovative web solutions to our clients from large-scale web design projects to interactive web and social media applications. We firmly believe in the win-win principle, and seek to collaborate with our clients to produce simple, effective solutions with high returns on investment.","

column1: 25,tech project manager,/en/job/it-project-associate-9370705,9370705,IT Project Associate,False,False,,,SGD,Hubble.sg,26-Mar-22,False,,,201606906Z,,,1 - 50 Employees,,,"<div>

Hubble is a leading technology company focusing on construction and engineering industry. We are on a mission to build the world’s first autonomous construction sites by automating and trading the 4M (Man, Machine, Material, Money) resources.

Our solutions help digitise all your work processes, and connect all key project stakeholders - developers, consultants, fabricators, contractors, and facility managers - onto an all-in-one platform - The Hubble Platform.

Build faster and cheaper and with the highest quality and safety standards with Hubble’s impactful technologies. Let’s transform the way we build our cities for a better tomorrow. Today. Together. For generations to come.
Visit us at www.hubble.sg to learn more for #bettercitiesoftomorrow

","

Who are we looking for:

We are looking for a IT Project Associate who is decisive and driven. You are the superstar who connects the dots and builds bridges between our clients and our Hubble team.

What you will be doing:

You have a keen passion in project management of software delivery and support projects. Working with our in-house development teams you will help plan and organise the work in collaboration with the team from inception into production and from there into support or BAU mode, ensuring that the software we deliver meets the needs of the customer. You deal with high stake negotiations of project timeline and deliverables with the clients. You ensure that timelines and milestones are met with the highest standards. You are our gatekeeper, ensuring that all the clients’ needs are clearly communicated clearly to the Hubble team including product delivery managers, business development managers, product managers, engineers, and senior management. 

How to succeed:

  • Love to manage time and can have a proven track record in implementing projects successfully in the shortest time possible and without any delay.
  • Skilled communicator and can present, train, provide clear status updates, and create buy-ins from all key stakeholders.
  • Creating and maintaining project timeline and plan.
  • Efficient and automation driven.
  • Meticulous attention to detail and can handle multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Dedicated to ensuring the success of our clients.
  • Be a key link between sales, tech, and the client for technical implementation projects.
  • Be a self-starter with a hands-on approach and the experience to handle technical and business people.
  • Build an understanding of each client's business, organisation and technical objectives.
  • Provide regular status reporting both internally and to the client.
  • Interact with senior management, business and technical stakeholders.
  • Keep up to date with emerging industry practices.
  • Anticipate, manage and resolve issues and act as the point of contact at all times.

What we need from you:

  • Bachelor's degree with good academic results preferred
  • Passion or interest in project management of software delivery and support projects
  • Comfortable in a fast-paced environment with strong time management & organisational skills.
  • A passion for helping clients succeed; you must be dedicated to customer success.
  • Able to gather insightful product feedback from customers to help inform future product roadmap.
  • Ability to successfully deliver projects simultaneously with meticulous attention to detail.
  • Possess effective client-facing communication skills.
  • Strategic thinking, problem-solving, and decision-making capabilities.

About Hubble:

Hubble is a leading technology company focusing on the construction and engineering industry. We are on a mission to build the world’s first autonomous construction sites by automating and trading the 4M (Man, Machine, Material, Money) resources.

Our solutions help digitise all your work processes, and connect all key project stakeholders - developers, consultants, fabricators, contractors, and facility managers - onto an all-in-one platform - The Hubble Platform.

Build faster and cheaper and with the highest quality and safety standards with Hubble’s impactful technologies. Let’s transform the way we build our cities for a better tomorrow. Today. Together. For generations to come.

What Hubble will give you:

Hubble is built by a team of talented, driven, and ambitious individuals. We do not subscribe to conventions. We do not let history and traditions dictate and limit our dreams to shape the world. We adopt the same mindset with our hiring. We are looking for the best and we want to bet on you. 

Who will you be working with:

If you connect with any of the description below, please apply immediately:

  • Purpose driven
  • Hungry, ambitions, and self-motivated
  • Meritocratic, results/performance > age/bureaucracy
  • Resourceful, independent, chart our own destiny
  • Determined, perseverance, and hard working
  • Creative, innovative, out of the box

Yes, the above is everyone of us at Hubble.

Visit us at www.hubble.build to learn more for #bettercitiesoftomorrow

26,tech project manager,/en/job/sgts-%7C-programme-manager-9429273,9429273,SGTS | Programme Manager,False,False,,,SGD,Government Technology Agency of Singapore (GovTech),22 hours ago,False,,,T16GB0002G,,,1001 - 2000 Employees,,,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">

column3: The Government Technology Agency (GovTech) aims to transform the delivery of Government digital services by taking an ""outside-in"" view, putting citizens and businesses at the heart of everything we do. We also develop the Smart Nation infrastructure and applications, and facilitate collaboration with citizens and businesses to co-develop technologies.
Join us as we support Singapore’s vision of building a Smart Nation - a nation of possibilities empowered through info-communications technology and related engineering.

column1:
","
GovTech is seeking a seasoned technical programme manager to support the digital transformation of the Whole of Government (WoG) through the CODEX (Core Operations Development Environment and xChange) platform. CODEX is a strategic national project and the CODEX platform presents a huge opportunity to rationalise and consolidate federated agency hosting and infrastructure, through a modern cloud architecture implementation and the modernisation of Government applications through adoption of agile development practices.  The role is expected to leverage and work closely with engineering teams to deliver new capabilities of Singapore Government Tech Stack (SGTS) to the WoG. Establish deep collaboration with the product management and development groups and play an active role in driving new features roll-out, migration and communications with agencies, in partnership with central functions, such as security, policy, infrastructure, (technical) operations, etc. Particularly, this role will drive delivery of SGTS capabilities across multiple divisions and WoG. Besides working with internal teams, the incumbent is expected to partner with solution providers, vendors, and in some cases, open source communities, to deliver new capabilities of GCC (Government Commercial Cloud), and map out integration plans for the entire GCC eco-system and institutionalise key processes and practices to leverage these new GCC capabilities.
What to Expect:
  • Create and manage an efficient and agile programme roadmap to deliver SGTS capabilities in a progressive manner
  • Focus on shipping capabilities early and fast to seek customer feedback across multiple projects
  • Seek alignment with central function towards the programme vision whilst taking into consideration of central functional goals and objectives
  • Take customer, team and central functions feedback to adjust programme deliverables along the way
  • Manage stakeholders across technical and non-technical domains, especially around setting delivery expectations of quality and scope and communicating progress
  • Facilitate the team for faster delivery velocity, leaving them alone sometimes and leading from the front occasionally
  • Understand risk to programme delivery and manage them to lower the overall risks
  • Acquire and manage financing of the programme to allow delivery to flow seamlessly
  • Keep programme momentum and pace at a sustainable rate
  • Build a culture of excellence and continuous improvement
  • Exercise technical leadership in driving deliveries, and yet keeping open to changes always throughout driving the programme
  • Establish external technology and vendor partnerships
  • Lead scrum of scrum teams
  • Partner with product managers and internal engineering teams such as architects, developers, engineers to ensure product is delivered with an acceptable quality and in a timely manner and mitigate potential risks across functions ahead of time
  • Live the CODEX vision internally and externally, sharing with key stakeholders the vision and drive adoption of the CODEX product with engineers and agencies stakeholders
  • The role offers a unique opportunity to create pathway for success for Singapore, its citizens and residents.
How to Succeed: A proven technical programme manager with a track record of leading large-scale programme involving about thirty stakeholders or more across multiple job functions and business divisions. Possess leadership to direct teams along during periods of uncertainty towards delivery targets, and has the ability to balance proactive, strategic thinking with crisp execution and delivery. Likely to have excellent stakeholder management skills. Critical competencies required but are not limited to:
  • Degree in Computer Science/ Engineering, Information Technology, Electronics Engineering or technical discipline equivalent
  • Experience in leading a large-scale technology programme with significant number of stakeholders across multiple functions and divisions
  • Strong stakeholder management balancing both the analytical aspect and the people aspects
  • Excellent communicator in articulating plan at both the executive level and the working level and is an attentive listener to understand needs and issues
  • Strategic, technical thinker to understand and manage the complexity of people and technology
  • Seasoned practitioner of Agile methodologies with a deep appreciation of the software craft and engineers engaging in the craft.
  • Organised and analytical in mitigating risk, resolving issues, structuring work and outcomes as needed for the different teams depending on their domain of work and expertise
  • Manage vendors, as needed, for delivery outcomes
  • Strong business acumen to understand priorities and the business drivers of the priorities
  • Experience setting high level vision and translating into a plan
  • Consistent ability to rally large, cross-functional team to execute against roadmap to meet objectives
  • In-depth understanding of business and technological decision trade-off to make the right call and to provide advice
  • Enjoy working directly with engineers and dealing with people
  • Broad awareness and experience in software development following Devops principles and production support are preferred
  • Some experience in waterfall project development will be helpful
  • Experience in project accounting and seeking funding and financing for a programme is a plus
We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company as we believe that diversity is meaningful to innovation. Our employee benefits are based on a total rewards approach, offering a holistic and market-competitive suite of perks. This includes generous leave benefits to meet your work-life needs. We trust that you will get the job done wherever you are, and whatever works best for you – so work from home or take a break to exercise if you need to*. We also believe it’s important for you to keep honing your craft in the constantly-evolving tech landscape, so we provide and support a plethora of in-house and external learning and development opportunities all year round *Subject to the nature of your job role that might require you to be onsite during fixed hours
