","
Business Function 

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble, and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels. 
Job Purpose
  • Responsible with the entire development process (technical analysis, design, development, testing and implementation).
  • Team effort coordination, dependencies management.
  • Establish best practices for coding standards and code review process.
  • Key decision maker in frameworks and architecture.
Responsibilities
Key Accountabilities
  • Deliver digital process initiative project in DBS across all countries
  • Strategic Project Governance
    • Work closely with and manage project managers from each domain, team members, tech, and stakeholders to monitoring, develop and execute project plans and associated project content.

    • Track project milestones and deliverables. Implement and track key milestones & relevant KPIs to measure success of projects.

    • Keep management and project sponsors abreast of project developments - set up periodic reviews and prepare relevant documents to communicate progress.
  • Drive project and program delivery
    • Responsible for ensuring project delivery on time on schedule and with quality

    • Effectively communicate with team members and stakeholders in a timely and clear fashion.

    • Identify and resolve issues and conflicts within the program, projects and project management community and with other stakeholders if necessary.

    • Resolve issues at the project or line level and escalate issues which cannot be resolved in a timely and accurate manner.
  • Manage key stakeholders and business and technology leads
    • Manage and communicate effectively with domain leads at senior level and working level teams.

    • Responsible for ensuring project steering committee meetings, cross function meetings and other key project meetings are effective and achieve objectives on a consistent manner.
  • Change management
    • Ability to drive the adoption of agile methodology across teams

    • Able to work with users to drive changes within the organization for projects implementation

    • Develop best practices and tools for project execution and management. Ensure utilization of standards and practices across all projects.
Key Responsibilities
  • To evaluate the user requirement with BA and Development team and come out the schedule and feasibility.
  • To have good understanding of the bank systems and where are the data located when needed
  • Manage the project with the approved cost and agree scheduled
  • Establish best practices for coding standards and code review process.
  • Make collaborative decision on system framework design
Requirements
  • At least 15 years of solid experience working in a banking / financial institution in project management office and financial management.
  • Excellent presentation, analytical and articulation skills
  • Self-starter and extremely hands on in the management of projects
  • Must have implemented large programs using Agile methodology
  • Demonstrated interaction and working with all levels of management.
  • Project management and agile certifications (e.g. PMP, scrum master etc.) will be a plus.
  • Experience in using a project management tool like HP PPM, CA PPM.
  • Knowledge/understanding of latest cloud technologies 
  • Proficiency in Slack, Microsoft Project, Visio, PowerPoint, Excel, SharePoint 2013, JIRA and Confluence
  • Ability to communicate well in English. Regional dialects such as Cantonese, Mandarin and Bahasa Indonesia / Bahasa m\ will be desirable as this position interacts regularly with the regional team
  • Experience in Data projects would be favourable
  • Strong communication skills, able to communicate effectively at all levels, and both internally and externally. Concise and precise.
  • Experience with cloud computing preferred.
Apply Now
 We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

column3: Shopee is the leading e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan. It is a platform tailored for the region, providing customers with an easy, secure and fast online shopping experience through strong payment and logistical support.

Shopee aims to continually enhance its platform and become the region’s e-commerce destination of choice via ongoing product optimisation and localised user-centered strategies. Shopee, a Sea company, was first launched in Singapore in 2015, and has since expanded its reach to Malaysia, Thailand, Taiwan, Indonesia, Vietnam and the Philippines. Sea is a leader in digital entertainment, e-commerce and digital financial services across Greater Southeast Asia. Sea's mission is to better the lives of consumers and small businesses with technology, and is listed on the NYSE under the symbol SE. The Shopee team comprises over 8,000 employees from across the region, and with our rapid expansion, we are constantly on the lookout for potential talents who have the passion and drive to become part of a fast-moving and dynamic team.

column1:
","

The Marketing team at Shopee is responsible for conceptualising and implementing go-to-market activities to achieve increased usage and visibility. The team covers areas including Campaigns Management, Community, Public Relations, Partnerships, Offline Marketing and Design. The Regional Marketing team is responsible for strategising and implementing go-to-market activities and working with local teams to localise marketing for the specific markets. The Brand and Growth Marketing team covers all aspects of online and performance marketing for the region. This team is responsible for data-driven solutions, tracking and measuring data to reach the targeted customers. Browse our Marketing team openings to see how you can make an impact with us.

Job Description:

  • Conceptualise, develop and execute marketing campaigns for a specific Electronics Category (especially Computers & Peripherals, Mobile & Gadget subcategories)
  • Collaborate and coordinate across both internal and external stakeholders, including working with internal key account managers, business intelligence, and other marketing functions (e.g. social media, partnerships, public relations, online marketing, offline marketing, graphic designers) for campaign creation and optimisation
  • Conduct data analysis on campaigns performance (including against order and Gross Merchandise Value targets) and offer ongoing recommendations for campaign optimisation, such as innovative ideas, partnerships and activations that enhance campaigns performance
  • Keep abreast of trends on social media, ecommerce, digital marketing and industry developments, and leverage on such trends and developments to optimise campaigns

Requirements:

  • Excellent English communication and writing skills
  • Excellent stakeholder and project management skills. Ability to handle multiple tasks, manage expectations and coordinate with internal stakeholders (graphic designers, key account managers)
  • Independent and open to taking on new tasks or projects
  • An analytical and structured thinker. Have a good affinity for critical thinking, hands-on execution and problem-solving
  • Reliable and possess strong team spirit. Able to work collaboratively, is patient and has good social skills
  • Prior experience (at least 1 year) in ecommerce, marketing (including agencies) or equivalent roles is a bonus
  • Knowledgeable and excited about all things tech

266,tech project manager,/en/job/ecommerce-anti-fraud-data-analytic-regional-manager-9430396,9430396,Ecommerce Anti-Fraud Data Analytic Regional Manager,False,False,,,SGD,TikTok,9 hours ago,False,,,201719908M,,,51 - 200 Employees,,,"

TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy.

TikTok is a global short-form mobile video platform that allows you to express yourself by creating content. It gives rise to engaging, interactive challenges and trending topics in which anyone can participate. TikTok aims to capture and showcase the world's creativity, knowledge, and moments that matter, directly from your mobile phone. TikTok has global offices in many cities, including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.

","

Responsibilities

Description:

Ecommerce's Governance and Experience is a global team responsible for ensuring our marketplace is safe and trustworthy for not only users but also sellers and creators. We value user satisfaction and work on policies, rules, and systems to ensure quality. In this role, you will be part of the leadership group for Ecommerce's Governance team and be a regional leader for our Antifraud data analytic team. You will lead a team responsible for delivering insights, defining metrics that inform our fraud management strategies, and evaluating trade-offs between risk and customer experience.

Roles & Responsibilities:

  • Own and drive the antifraud data analytic team strategy and OKR;
  • Lead, build, and retain a team of high performing Data Analyst;
  • Mentor and guide the team to solve complex analytical problems in the space of risk and fraud management;
  • Utilise analytics to optimize existing fraud strategies, in order to improve precision and increase fraud detection rates;
  • Collaborate, and influence effectively across the business to ensure business lines, product development, and business partners are considering fraud implications.;
  • Lead large scale and complex analytic projects in a cross-functional team environment, prioritized tasks, and translate business requirements into strategies;
  • Anticipate risk and understand the trends of fraudulent activities in each local market and build intelligence systems to mitigate it;
  • Define and drive the standardization of key performance metrics and build detailed reporting models for effective tracking, reporting, and feedback on measures implemented.

Qualifications

  • At least 5+ years of data related experience in one of the following areas: Antifraud, Risk Management, Trust & Safety, eCommerce or Tech industry in general;
  • Bachelor's degree or above with a background in Computer Science, Business Analytics, Math, Statistics, or related field;
  • At least 3 years of experience in a people management role;
  • Data-driven with strong analytical ability to develop clear insights;
  • Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build relationships and effectively liaise with people at all levels;
  • Excellent data visualization and storytelling skills; able to influence both technical and non-technical stakeholders;
  • Experience with SQL and analytical tools (SAS, R, Python) is a must;
  • Experience with AI and machine learning is a plus;
  • Proficiency in English is required; any second language proficiency is highly preferred but not required.

column3: Shopee is the leading e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan. It is a platform tailored for the region, providing customers with an easy, secure and fast online shopping experience through strong payment and logistical support.

Shopee aims to continually enhance its platform and become the region’s e-commerce destination of choice via ongoing product optimisation and localised user-centered strategies. Shopee, a Sea company, was first launched in Singapore in 2015, and has since expanded its reach to Malaysia, Thailand, Taiwan, Indonesia, Vietnam and the Philippines. Sea is a leader in digital entertainment, e-commerce and digital financial services across Greater Southeast Asia. Sea's mission is to better the lives of consumers and small businesses with technology, and is listed on the NYSE under the symbol SE. The Shopee team comprises over 8,000 employees from across the region, and with our rapid expansion, we are constantly on the lookout for potential talents who have the passion and drive to become part of a fast-moving and dynamic team.

column1:
","

The Engineering and Technology team is at the core of the Shopee platform development. The team is made up of a group of passionate engineers from all over the world, striving to build the best systems with the most suitable technologies. Our engineers do not merely solve problems at hand; We build foundations for a long-lasting future. We don't limit ourselves on what we can or can't do; we take matters into our own hands even if it means drilling down to the bottom layer of the computing platform. Shopee's hyper-growing business scale has transformed most ""innocent"" problems into huge technical challenges, and there is no better place to experience it first-hand if you love technologies as much as we do. Browse our Engineering and Technology team openings to see how you can make an impact with us.

About the Team:

Shopee Paid Ads team was established to provide an e-commerce advertising platform. Our expertise includes data, high performance AI-based online service, distributed system, machine learning algorithms, and ads business strategies. 

Job Description:

  • Responsible for full project delivery life cycle for both business and technical projects.
  • Collaborate and align with project stakeholders and build a project plan by collecting relevant information and breaking down project requirements.   
  • Ensure projects are delivered on a timely basis through identifying task dependencies and project risks and assessing impact on timeline from unexpected bugs or issues.
  • Facilitate weekly status meetings to ensure projects are progressing along with the project plan and record action items.
  • Work closely with project stakeholders to resolve issues and/or unclarities encountered. 
  • Maintain & update the quarterly plan constantly so the stakeholders have a snapshot of the project progress.
  • Work with Tech Leader to ensure effective allocation of resources.
  • Facilitate bug fixes raised by the Local Teams in UAT or Live-testing phases.
  • Develop & configure Jira board & filters for others to easily locate their tasks and/or bugs
  • Recommend the most appropriate approach to deliver a project. 
  • Identify inefficiencies in the project delivery processes and take corrective actions.
  • Generate weekly and monthly project delivery reports.

Requirements:

  • A Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering, Computer Science or related fielsd
  • A resourceful problem solver, with a strong sense of ownership
  • Highly organised and able to prioritise tasks
  • Strong interpersonal communication skills and are able to build relationships with stakeholders
  • Driven and takes initiative at work
  • Have good listening skills and have the ability to turn feedback into action items

column3: ScienTec Personnel focusses on professional/specialist recruitment and general staffing across all industries in key functions such as Administration, Operations, Sales, Marketing, Finance, HR, Technical, and Engineering. A division of ScienTec Consulting Pte Ltd, the group has since its inception in 2001, redefined the standards of HR services by transforming organisations across Asia Pacific with its 4 principal services: Staffing, Executive Search, Outsourcing and Consulting. The group's 20 industry awards and 600+ customer testimonials are the result of its high service standards centered on its core value of 'People First, Always'.

It has 2 other business divisions – ScienTec Search which specialises in senior leadership and specialist search for key industries such as Biotechnology, Pharma, Medical Devices, Consumer Healthcare, FMCG, Technology and Engineering; and ScienTec Consulting, the group’s HR consulting division, which provides services such as Recruitment Process Outsourcing, Social Media Recruitment, Payroll Services, Work Pass Applications, Compliance Framework and Legislation Practices.

Akribis Systems designs and manufactures direct drive motor and precision stages which are used extensively in the most demanding manufacturing environment. We have offices in Singapore, China, Korea, Thailand and USA, supplemented by a wide global sales network. Our products are widely used in the semiconductors; flat panel display; hard disk storage; photonics and communication; biomedical and life science research; and electronics manufacturing. If you are constantly seeking for opportunities to exploit your creativity, we invite you to join our team.
","

At AKB, the human resource (HR) department is actively involved in the journey of digital transformation. It marks a radical rethinking of how an organization is keen on using technology, people and processes to fundamentally improve business. If you’re a people person looking to start a career in the exciting world of HR, this is the best place to dive in.

We’re in search of resourceful HR personnel to support our HR department in ensuring smooth and efficient business operations. The HR role will be far from one-dimensional and will have both administrative and strategic responsibilities, helping us to plan and administer important functions, such as staffing, training and development, and compensation and benefits.

We understand that our business thrives when our personnel thrive, and that starts by hiring the right HR professional to effectively deliver maximum value to the organization as a whole.

Reporting to Assistant HR Manager, you will lead the implementation and execution of timeless and effective strategy on all-employee experience related matters – building stronger work culture which is vital and impacts business performance, maximising satisfaction and productivity, taking workplace experience to greater heights.

What you see is what you get!

Responsibilities:

Your scope will include the following but not limited to:

Onboarding Experience

  • Acclimates new employees to the new work environment with a great orientation.
  • Review and/or design new orientation programs (Traditional orientation, interactive orientation, and reorientation) providing a welcoming experience to the new employees.

Staff Welfare and Benefit

  • Review and/or propose and administer benefits policies and initiatives catering to business and employee needs.
  • Ensure external competitiveness within the tech/manufacturing industry and in compliance with the government legislation and recommendation.
  • Project manage and administer various plans and into execution and tactics, ensuring alignment of staffing needs with business objectives while managing, influencing, and driving change.
  • Be actively involved in Rewards and Benefits systems such as appraisal systems, new initiatives and enhancements, from business requirements, user acceptance testing, employee communication, to seeing through project implementation.
  • Involve in other activities such as health and mental wellbeing, staff welfare, recreational activities (with the support from Recreation Committee) and improving the working environment.

Employee Engagement

  • Shape the day-to-day experience and shape the moments that matter for employees. 
  • Administering employee involvement or engagement programs.
  • Advising and collaborating with business units and corporate functions to drive and implement engagement interventions
  • Identifying and tracking engagement metrics to evaluate the effectiveness of engagement efforts
  • Survey on employees’ needs and promote employee advocacy by generating brand exposure through internal incentives and recognition, and social media advocacy.
  • Analysing culture survey results and formulating engagement programs and initiatives that can be adapted for implementation across the group, with clearly defined intended outcomes.

Grievances Handling and Disciplinary Action

  • Host inquiry, investigation and provide employment dispute resolution and/or mediation.
  • Engaging in conflict resolution practices.

Staff Retention and Offboarding

  • Conduct exit survey and interview to understand and provide invaluable insight into the employee perspective of your company which helps to determine and/or improve employee retention strategies.

Qualification(s):

  • Possess iHRP Certification and/or Degree in Human Resource Management and/or related field will be a plus.
  • Preferably with at least five (5) years of working experience in a similar role and/or any other related field/industry required for this position is a pre-requisite.

Skillset(s) Requirement:

  • Required Knowledge: Key Employment-related/Labour laws and regulations.
  • Required Skill(s): Microsoft Office Suites and outstanding knowledge in LinkedIn Recruiter and/or RecruiterPal will be a plus.
  • Preferably Senior/Mid-level role specialized in Recruitment and/or equivalent.

Personal Attribute(s):

  • Organized and adaptable to a fast-paced environment.
  • Excellent time and project management skills and has the ability to work effectively under tight deadlines and pressure.
  • Ability to prioritize tasks when appropriate.
  • Good interpersonal skills, able to interface professionally and responsively, and attentive to detail.
  • Ability to act with integrity, professionalism, and confidentiality.

The main duties and responsibilities will be subjected to review when there is any change in business requirements and scope of work.

column3: World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF) is one of the world’s largest and most experienced independent conservation organisations.

Established on 29 April 1961, it was the product of a deep concern held by a few eminent gentlemen who were worried by what they saw happening in our world at that time. Since then, WWF has grown up to be one of the largest environmental organisations in the world.
Today, we have more than 5 million supporters worldwide; and we are present in more than 100 countries to conserve and protect our natural environment.

Gland, Switzerland is the home of WWF International, the secretariat for WWF's global organisation. Its role is to lead and coordinate the WWF Network of offices around the world, through developing policies and priorities, fostering global partnerships, coordinating international campaigns, and providing supportive measures in order to help make the global operation run as smoothly as it can.
WWF is governed by a Board of Trustees under an International President, Yolanda Kakabadse. Our President Emeritus is HRH The Duke of Edinburgh.

column1:
","

JOB DESCRIPTION

Position title:                Executive, Communications (Partner Relations)

Reports to:                    Senior Executive, Marketing Communications

Critical Relationships:   Internal – Conservation Team, Fundraising Team, Corporate Partnerships Team, Sustainable Finance Team, Human Resource Team, Operations and Projects Team, Education Team, Market Transformation and Advocacy Teams.

External – Content Partners, Corporate Partners, Creative Agencies, Government Agencies

Location:                       Singapore

Starting Date:                Available immediately

I.  Mission of the Role: To place WWF-Singapore at the forefront of sustainability and conservation in Singapore and the region, by spearheading all integrated communications and marketing duties of the organisation to ensure that WWF is positioned as a locally relevant, globally-oriented brand. The Executive, Communications (Partner Relations) is responsible for supporting the Senior Executive, Marketing Communications to drive awareness and publicity for internal and external partners, growing influence that constantly defines a human-centric, credible WWF brand that safeguards the corporate identity and reputation. The incumbent will be responsible for assisting internal business units to engage stakeholders and businesses. He/She will support thought leadership through successful communications strategies around WWF’s priority themes: Deforestation, Plastic pollution, Climate, Wildlife, Sustainability.

II.  Major Functions: Reporting to the Senior Executive, Marketing Communications this role requires collaborative and resourceful skill sets to effectively work with cross-organisational teams to support strategic directions, developing and achieving the overall communications strategy for WWF-Singapore, internally and externally – aligning with WWF’s global sustainability goals. The incumbent brings experience in Strategic Communications and Marketing Communication and will support the development of marketing communications materials (Social Media Strategy, Influencer and Content Partner Relations, Brand Communications) to ensure impact-driven, breakthrough outcomes for the environment.

III.   Major Duties and Responsibilities:

●     Works closely with internal and external stakeholders to support and achieve WWF-Singapore’s overall communications strategy

●     Strong understanding of WWF-Singapore’s key competencies and advocacy positions locally and internationally

●     Responsible for supporting all marketing communications (Social Media Strategy, Influencer and Content Partner Relations, Brand Communications) by developing and executing integrated communication plans across all WWF-Singapore online and offline channels, ensuring measurable and effective publicity output through key functions:  

Internal Relations

●     First responder in communications & marketing matters for assigned WWF SG departments with communication strategies for partnerships with businesses, communities, members, schools, and volunteers.

●     Assist the Senior Executive, Marketing Communications and Human Resource department in establishing organisational messages

●     Plan, edit and write content for a variety of internal communications mediums - HR weekly updates, internal EDMs, etc.

●     Coordinate communication plans and executions with Strategic Communications and Marketing Communications units

●     Keeping track of projects listed in Editorial calendar

●     Assist the communications department with other related administrative duties

External Relations

●     Focal point for assigned WWF SG external partners by managing the relationship and connecting internally with the relevant departners.

●     Coordinate communication plans and execution with Strategic Communications and Marketing units

●     Project management for the assigned initiatives

IV.  Profile:

Required Qualifications

●     1-2 years of working experience in a related field, preferably in Digital Media, Journalism or Mass Communications

●     Digital background with good understanding of and experience using various social media marketing platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, TikTok)

●     Strong command of graphic design tools and Adobe applications (e.g. Canva, Illustrator, Photoshop, Premiere Pro) is an added advantage  

●     Familiarity with content management and data analysis tools is required

●     Strong visual communication and copywriting skills to support development of all marketing communications materials

●     Knowledge in working with business, philanthropy, community development, conservation or social sector - not limited to government, international NGOs, multilateral institutions, think thanks/universities and the corporate sector

●     General knowledge of and interest in conservation and environmental sustainability issues (and their solutions), especially as they relate to SE Asia

●     Thorough understanding of, and experience in championing and communicating, the benefits of nature, conservation and related financial matters to people and society

Required Skills and Competencies

●     A go-getter with a strong work ethic, great personality, maturity, initiative, soft skills, enthusiasm and ability to work in different social environments and individuals from all walks of life

●     Positive attitude and being a team player is paramount. Must consistently practice ethical behaviour in all dealings consistent with WWF’s values and codes of conduct. 

●     Good knowledge of digital trends, tools and platforms, and keep abreast of current affairs especially in Singapore and S.E.A. Experience in social media content and management, including production process.

●     Genuine interest in and good knowledge of nature conservation, climate change, and sustainable finance, locally and internationally

●     Experience in managing/ executing external communications across commercial, government agencies and managing vendors will be an advantage

●     Excellent oral, written, presentation and communication skills in English

●     Critical thinking and good negotiation skills in managing internal and external stakeholders

●     Highly motivated, organized, able to perform under pressure and within a tight timeline. Project management experience is a definite plus.

●     Tech-savvy and has a pulse on sentiment and data analysis, and is adept at managing online communities

●     Good camera presence and familiar with film, digital, art and/ or video content production. Creative visualisation and design skills

●     Passion for the WWF conservation mission, portfolio and other brand-related activities

This job description covers the main tasks and conveys the spirit of the sort of tasks that are anticipated proactively from staff. Other tasks may be assigned as necessary according to organisational needs.

","
Responsible for effective provisioning, operation, and maintenance
of all assigned systems infrastructure within the Regional HQ Data Centre and in the affiliate office sites. This individual will conduct technical research on the latest trends and technologies to enable continuing innovation
within the region. This individual ensures that system hardware and software, operating systems are strictly adhered to IT Policies and Standards.
The SSA will focus on the following technical aspects of infrastructure: Windows Servers Operating Systems, database systems, Backup and Recovery and Virtual Infrastructures.
The SSA will need to work closely with both internal staffs and external third-party vendors to effectively maintain and improve the information systems of the company.
RESPONSIBILITIES:

1. Provide Effective Business Operation and Support
  • Provide effective ICT support to the Asia Pacific region and achieve system availability targets as per agreed Service Level Agreements (SLAs).
  • Deliver assigned ICT projects and solutions to the region within approved budget, timeline, and scope in accordance with the annual action plans and mid-term plans.
  • Conduct technical feasibility studies and recommend technology solutions.
  • Prepare and update the assigned ICT Policies and Standards.
  • Ensure all ICT infrastructure and systems are fully compliant to all ICT local and international laws, standards, and regulations.
  • Prepare and execute ICT recovery tests in accordance with Company’s requirement.
  • Plan, schedule and execute ICT maintenance and upgrade activities.
  • Assist project teams throughout the entire project life cycle, with activities such as technical research, feasibility studies, cost benefits analysis, risk assessment, management proposal, resource management, project documentation, solution implementation and technical support in testing and go-live preparation.
  • Provide training to regional IT representatives to ensure procedural and technical competencies in their daily activities.
  • Provide monthly updates and status reports to the HOD.
  • Perform other duties as assigned by the HOD.
2. Infrastructure Operations and Maintenance
  • Perform proactive monitoring of Server hardware, storage, and systems. Respond to alerts and initiate corrective action.
  • Maintain of VMware vSphere environment consisting of VMware ESXi server cluster and SAN Storage. Perform Virtual machine deployment and management. Conduct active monitoring of Virtual environment and respond to alerts and errors.
  • Perform installation of new Windows Server Operating System in accordance with the specification provided. Supports and troubleshoot all issues related to Microsoft Windows Server Operating Systems.
  • Perform installation of new SQL Database in accordance with the specification provided. Support and troubleshoot all issues related to Microsoft SQL Databases.
  • Maintain the Regional Active Directory infrastructure spanning across different sites and domains (e.g.: Domain Controllers, Read-only Domain controllers, Group Policy Objects (GPO), DNS, DHCP, LDAP, Active directory replication, Schema, Certificate Authority). Perform installation of new domain controllers or RODC according to the specification provided.
  • Maintain Microsoft Key Management Services to ensure it’s always up to date for Windows Server Operating Systems and Microsoft office product activation.
  • Maintain on-premises Exchange server in Hybrid environment. Troubleshoot and support all issues related to Exchange server.
  • Maintain Azure AD Connect server. Troubleshoot and support all issues related to Azure AD Connect server.
  • Maintain ManageEngine Opmanager Monitoring system to ensure all critical systems uptime, resource and performance are monitored.
  • Maintain ManageEngine ServiceDesk Plus server and Administration (e.g., user and technician account administration, categories creation, SLA, asset management, reporting)
  • Maintain and create PowerShell scripts for operation and reporting purpose (e.g.: Active directory
  • users reporting, user onboarding, user departing, monitoring, bulk deployment)
  • Perform Daily operations of monitoring and management of Veeam backup and replication to ensure Virtual servers are protected according to backup policy. Perform restore request and troubleshoot failed jobs and initiate corrective action.
  • Maintain all servers in the region consisting of physical servers and virtual servers with the latest security and anti-virus updates.
  • Manage, Plan, and execute Regional Office ICT Infrastructure upgrade and expansions.
  • Plan and execute capacity planning for all ICT Infrastructure.
  • Work closely with 3rd Party Vendor to Plan and execute firmware / Version upgrade for all ICT Infrastructure.
  • Support planning and execution for Regional Disaster Recovery Exercises
3. D-Project ICT Operations
  • Implement Post-live Operation.
  • Perform operation of Jump box provisioning.
  • Perform operation of User and device access request.
  • Managed S-User operation on weekly basis.
  • Maintain Azure AD SSO Integration.
  • Maintain Interface integration.
  • Manage RHQ Server provisioning and access.
  • Manage S/4 printing.
  • Perform Annual operation of DR Server Update.
  • Perform Annual HEC DR Server test.
  • Maintain IP Master list.
  • Execute HEC Change Management process.
  • Working closely with Global team on EMS Tickets.
  • Manage request from vendor for server access.
  • IoT Device security operation.
  • Asset Management and Procurement
  • Perform procurement of hardware, software, and services.
  • Ensure up-to-date inventory listing of hardware and software for the region.
  • Preparing, generating, and updating of routine reports/ documentations and SOPs.
REQUIREMENTS:
  • Bachelor’s Degree in computer science / Information Technology (or equivalent proven knowledge with work experience)
  • Min. 4-6 years of IT experience in a technical hands-on capacity in a
  • regional HQ of a MNC, with infrastructure implementation exposure
  • Good experience in project execution and regional technical
  • team leadership.
  • Exposure in preparation of ICT Policy and Standards.
  • Strong technical exposure or professional certifications in the following: Microsoft Servers Operating Systems, Microsoft Active Directory, SQL Server Database, SAP Basis administration, SharePoint, Office365, Exchange, VMware, vSphere and ESXi, HP Blades, EMC SAN, Veeam Backup, and replication.
  • Exposure in Business Continuity and disaster recovery.
  • Sound knowledge in ITIL V3 processes.
  • Good interpersonal communication and coordination skills.
  • Knowledgeable in:
  • Networking (Firewall, VPN, switches)
  • ICT Budget Processes
  • Project Management certification (CITPM, PMP or PRINCE) 
  • Only Singaporeans
Please contact Ranelle Liew at +65 9836 1864 or RanelleL@charterhouse.com.sg for a confidential discussion.
EA License no: 16S8066 | Reg no.: R1874529
Only successful candidates will be notified.

RUWAC is the leading German manufacturer of industrial vacuums and dust extractions equipment for all industries. For our expansion in Singapore and Malaysia we are looking for highly motivated people to join our team.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ","

We are a manufacturer of leading German brand of Industrial Vacuums and Dust Collectors.

Now our business is expanding that we can offer excellent career opportunities. We are looking for a highly qualified Manager of our combined production and technical department. Become a part of our Ruwac-Team.

We’re waiting for you!

Duties & Responsibilities:

  • Handle Machine Service, Repairs and Sales assignments in country and overseas.
  • Carry out repairs, test, maintenance, parts replacements on Machine
  • Handle on-site service assignments in country and overseas.
  • Develop Machine, Service, spare parts and wear parts sales strategies for sales area.
  • Handle customers inquires, quotations, after sales service and other Ad-Hoc duties by company.
  • Develops and maintains relations with customers, respond to customer complaints; evaluates and resolves problems of the customer.
  • Customer relationship management, maintain good communication with customers.
  • Carry out project management, implementation, customer communication and services.
  • Actively explore target customers, establish and maintain new and old customer relationships, and enhance the company's brand influence.
  • Strive to complete the sales targets issued by the company and other tasks assigned by Manager.

Qualifications & Requirements:

  • Certificate, Nitec, Diploma, Bachelor’s degree in mechanical engineering or electrical engineering or related practical technical education.
  • Has a profound education in engineering with knowledge of electrical components and control systems.
  • Has a practical training in assembly and mechanical production methods.
  • Past experience in machine repairs will be an advantage.
  • Past experience in Sales will be an advantage.
  • Strong communication and persuasive skills.
  • Good computer skills (MS Office).
  • Physical work required and willingness to work long working hours when necessary.
  • Able to Prioritize Multi-task, customer oriented with excellent communication & good interpersonal skills.
  • Able to execute independently with minimal supervision, team player.
  • Seeking for long term position and career path.
  • Have a valid driving license.
  • Able to travel overseas for training.       

Benefits:

  • Attractive salary
  • Health insurance
  • Traveling allowance
  • Bonus
  • Training

276,tech project manager,/en/job/project-manager-crypto.com-mobile-app-9347543,9347543,Project Manager - Crypto.com Mobile App,False,False,,,SGD,Crypto.com,4-Mar-22,False,,,201917495R,,,2001 - 5000 Employees,,,"

About Crypto.com

Founded in 2016, Crypto.com today serves over 10 million customers with the world’s fastest growing crypto app, along with the Crypto.com Visa Card — the world’s largest crypto card program — the Crypto.com Exchange and Crypto.com DeFi Wallet. Recently launched, Crypto.com NFT is the premier platform for collecting and trading NFTs, carefully curated from the worlds of art, design, entertainment and sports.

Crypto.com is built on a solid foundation of security, privacy and compliance and is the first cryptocurrency company in the world to have ISO/IEC 27701:2019, CCSS Level 3, ISO27001:2013 and PCI:DSS 3.2.1, Level 1 compliance, and independently assessed at Tier 4, the highest level for both NIST Cybersecurity and Privacy Frameworks.

With over 3,000 people in offices across the Americas, Europe and Asia, Crypto.com is accelerating the world’s transition to cryptocurrency. Find out more: https://crypto.com

","About the Company

Crypto.com was founded in 2016 on a simple belief: it's a basic human right for everyone to control their money, data and identity. With over 5 million users on its platform today, Crypto.com provides a powerful alternative to traditional financial services through the Crypto.com App, the Crypto.com Card, the Crypto.com Exchange and Crypto.com DeFi Wallet, turning its vision of ""cryptocurrency in every wallet"" into reality, one customer at a time.

Crypto.com is built on a solid foundation of security, privacy and compliance and is the first cryptocurrency company in the world to have ISO27001:2013 and PCI:DSS 3.2.1, Level 1 compliance. Crypto.com is headquartered in Singapore with a 3,000+ strong team.

For more information, please visit www.crypto.com.

About the Role

As part of the Crypto.com App team, you will be working closely with Product and Engineering to build the easiest App for users to buy/sell/store and spend Cryptocurrencies. As the number 1 most downloaded Crypto app in many markets globally, your work here will impact millions of users immediately.

The project management team will be the glue that keeps all stakeholders aligned and responsible for the success of delivering projects on time.

As a hyper growth company, we are looking for people who take ownership and embrace changes as the organization evolves.

Responsibilities
  • Manage complex and large-scale cross-team, cross-functional technology initiatives.
  • Interface with development teams to estimate work efforts, define milestones and manage resources.
  • Deliver results by working with cross-functional teams from design to rollout.
  • Track progress, resolve dependencies, evaluate risks and communicate status to management and project stakeholders.
  • Design and track metrics around initiative goals, and make decisions based on data.
  • Orchestrate technology initiatives with business feature deliveries to ensure the coordination between teams balance out tech and business priorities.
  • Facilitate and maintain documentation with developers for different audiences such as production support playbooks and API documentation.
  • Maintain deployment workflow and improve knowledge discovery to empower the team.
Requirements
  • 5+ years of relevant work experience in project and/or program management in a software applications environment. Experience working as a software consultant is a plus.
  • A deep understanding of software development, architecture, and infrastructure.
  • Exposure to Agile and Scrum development methodologies. Experience as Scrum Master is a plus.
  • Experience communicating with technical and non-technical stakeholders across multiple business units.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to align efforts of disparate groups to achieve a common goal.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Mentoring skill is a plus.
  • Excellent skills in facilitating meetings, summarizing documentations.
  • Excellent in setting up process and driving automation.
  • Excellent in discovering the knowledge and guiding the teams to transform the knowledge and present to various audiences.
  • Fluent verbal and written English,
  • Experience in using JIRA/Confluence.
  • PMP, CSM, PSM, ACP certifications are preferred.
Benefits
  • We offer an attractive compensation package working in a cutting-edge field of Fintech.
  • Huge responsibilities from Day 1. Be the owner of your own learning curve. The possibilities are limitless and depend on you
  • You get to work in a very dynamic environment and be part of an international team
  • You will get to have involvement in developing a brand new product from scratch alongside with a talented team

278,tech project manager,/en/job/project-manager-9380247,9380247,Project Manager,False,False,,,SGD,V-Key Pte Ltd,14-Mar-22,False,,,201116226D,,,51 - 200 Employees,,,"

V-Key is one of the world’s leading deep-tech companies in mobile cyber-security. Our patented technology V-OS has been deployed by top banks, mobile payment providers, and governments to secure software solutions and protect more than 100 million users globally.

We are rapidly expanding into new markets and new customer segments. Apart from securing digital transactions for everyone, we are also enabling new generation technology by providing the cyber-security infrastructure for banking, government and smart homes, among many others.

At V-Key, we are building towards a future where technology users can enjoy unprecedented security and convenience.

","

Summary of Role

V-Key is one of the world’s leading deep-tech companies in mobile cyber-security. Our patented technology V-OS has been deployed by top banks, mobile payment providers, and governments to secure software solutions and protect more than 100 million users globally.

We are rapidly expanding into new markets and new customer segments. Apart from securing digital transactions for everyone, we are also enabling new generation technology by providing the cyber-security infrastructure for banking, government and smart homes, among many others.

At V-Key, we are building towards a future where technology users can enjoy unprecedented security and convenience.

We are looking for a Project Manager as part of the Delivery Team. Your primary focus will be to manage implementation of V-Key Product Suite at various client premises and configure the products to be functional within customer environment.

Duties and Responsibilities

  • Managing V-Key team at customer place, making sure that the team follows the customer implementation process and maintain safe work environment of the team
  • Prepare a project plan, dependency register, risk register and implement the project / CR within the committed timeline and with the provided resources
  • Monitoring the progress of the project and escalate to the Project Steering Committee on time for any slippage of the project
  • Keeping track of project milestone and working closely with V-Key finance team for billing
  • Ensure all SOW requirements are met
  • Managing a change control process, submit and track the CR for any additional scope in project identified
  • Work closely with V-Key Product Engineering, Quality Assurance and Customer support team for every new releases and bug fixes
  • Responsible for the support tickets, assign the ticket to the team, monitor the ticket status and close the ticket within SLA during the warranty period
  • Prepare and submit incident report for any severity 1 issue with proper activity sequence, workaround provided, follow-up action, etc. if deployed as a Technical Account Manager for existing accounts
  • Prepare and submit a weekly status report for a new project implementation and monthly status report for a maintenance project with the defect details with the status to customer

Requirements

  • Bachelor degree or diploma in Computer Science or related field
  • Certification in PMP Foundation is preferred
  • Minimum of 3 to 6 years of working experience as a Project Manager with solid understanding of SDLC
  • Maintained good working relationship with customer technical and development team
  • Should have maintained a team size from 3 to 5 either in onsite or offsite with good motivation skills
  • Excellent client facing, team player, written / verbal communication and problem solving skills
  • Woking knowledge in Jira will be an advantage
  • Working experience in banking / financial sector will be a plus
  • A strong self-starter and able to work with minimal supervision
  • Ability to work in a dynamic, fast moving and growing environment
  • Critical thinker and problem-solving skills

column2:
Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.","

About ByteDance

Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.

About the team

Lark Suite is on a mission to deliver innovative and intuitive tools for workplace collaboration and creation. Our team is focused on going beyond standard workplace tools and creating new and innovative experiences to build a more seamless, delightful future of work.

We believe your work is shaped by the tools you use. Lark is the next-gen collaboration suite that integrates messaging, video conferencing, schedule management, collaborative documents, cloud storage, email, and workflow applications to provide a seamless collaboration experience on all your devices. This is a unique opportunity to be at the forefront of creating the foundation for our best-in-class enterprise collaboration suite and influence the make-up of the next generation of leaders that will shape the continued success of the team and company as a whole.

Responsibilities

- Partner with your assigned business unit and ensure a deep understanding of business strategy and implement high-quality HR practices within the team.

- Partner with the Talent Acquisition team to grow the Lark business through interviewing, onboarding, and evaluating candidates.

- Coach and mentor business team-leaders to help build a strong community that will improve the development of the business.

- Collaborate with stakeholders and leadership and provide HR guidance when appropriate; including staffing, talent development, performance management, and employee relations.

- Be the ambassador for the Lark organizational culture as well as plan and implement activities to continue driving employee engagement.

- Manage employee disciplinary issues and provide advice to business leaders on ways to manage each case.

Requirements

The ideal candidate will possess at least 8+ years of experience in HR, have proven track of record working with multi-cultural teams and being able to navigate globally.

- 8+ years of HRBP experience in hi-tech or SaaS industry is preferred.

- Bachelor's degree or above is required.

- Experience of helping global organizations scale.

- Experience in project management, change management, culture transformations and independent program driving.

- Comprehensive HR knowledge, especially hands-on experience in employee relations, performance management and employee development.

- Candidate should have expertise in local labor law and regulations.

- Ability to multi-task and to work through complexities in an ever changing and high growth business environment.

- Self-driven and highly motivated for original thinking as well as continuous improvement.

ByteDance is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At ByteDance, our mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

",[],Manager,,8 years,Not Specified,,Full-Time,,"['Dental', 'Education support', 'Miscellaneous allowance', 'Medical', 'Vision', 'Regular hours, Mondays - Fridays', 'Casual (e.g. T-shirts)']",https://myjobstreet.jobstreet.com.sg/application/online-apply.php?job_id=9392569&advertisement_id=9390940&s=20&AdvertisementSource=1,701712,Downtown Core,sg

[Order Number: 2110-60291]

Responsibilities
The role is for a Technical Project Manager in the R&D department. You will work on multiple products – with a focus on IoT – and will be responsible for initial research, evaluation, proof of concepts and support the technical development of the product. You will work with various members of the R&D team – developers, QA, system engineers – and as well as other business units such as marketing, service delivery and tech support teams in order to ensure a successful delivery of products.
  • Manage the end-to-end project implementation for any products under R&D departments purview
  • Work with hardware design and assembly house, design and develop the required hardware for the products
  • Coordinate beta testing for all new products
  • Own technical issues that are escalated from tech support/customer support team for newly released products and ensure timely resolution
  • Facilitate the creation and maintenance of proper product documentation
  • Facilitate the product certification processes (e.g.: IMDA certification, etc)
  • Support the product manager and business teams by providing relevant analytics and supporting data
  • Carry out research on new products/trends/technologies in the industry that can aid or potentially trigger new product ideas
  • Any other ad-hoc duties assigned
Requirements:
  • Total work experience of 2-4 years with at least 1-2 years in project management support capacity in a technical field
  • Working experience in Linux and IoT
  • Experience in project management methodologies and tools
  • Excellent problem solving skills
  • Experience in IoT product development will be a big plus.
  • Proficiency with at least one programming language such as Python or Java is desirable
  • Understanding of IP networking, Wireless protocols, Cloud, APIs and other concepts relevant to Information Technology

To Apply, please kindly email your updated resume to cv_may@goodjobcreations.com.sg

We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. However, rest assured that all applications will be updated to our resume bank for future opportunities

column1: 281,tech project manager,/en/job/first-vp-project-manager-retail-credit-portfolio-group-technology-9363526,9363526,"First VP, Project Manager (Retail Credit Portfolio), Group Technology",False,False,,,SGD,United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB),9-Mar-22,False,,30 days,193500026Z,,,More than 5000 Employees,,Singapore,"<div>

column2: United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices.

column3: In 1935, amid the economic uncertainties following the Great Depression, UOB opened its doors to offer banking services for the merchant community in Singapore.

Since then, UOB has grown organically and through a series of strategic acquisitions. Today, UOB is rated among the world’s top banks: ‘Aa1’ by Moody’s and ‘AA-’ by Standard & Poor’s and Fitch Ratings.

Generations of UOB employees for the past 80 years have carried through the entrepreneurial spirit, focus on long-term value creation and an unwavering commitment to do what is right for our customers and our colleagues.
At UOB, we believe in being a responsible financial services provider and we are committed to making a difference in the lives of our stakeholders and in the communities in which we operate.

Just as we are dedicated to helping our customers manage their finances wisely and grow their businesses, UOB is steadfast in our support of social development, particularly in the areas of art, children and education.

column1:
","
About UOB
United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices. Our history spans more than 80 years. Over this time, we have been guided by our values — Honorable, Enterprising, United and Committed. This means we always strive to do what is right, build for the future, work as one team and pursue long-term success. It is how we work, consistently, be it towards the company, our colleagues or our customers.
About the Department
The Technology and Operations function is comprised of five teams of specialists with distinct capabilities: business partnership, technology, operations, risk governance and planning support and services. We work closely together to harness the power of technology to support our physical and digital banking services and operations. This includes developing, centralising and standardising technology systems as well as banking operations in Singapore and overseas branches.
Job Responsibilities
  • Lead the discussions at the project working and steering committee
  • Plan and manage budget, technical deliverables as per plan
  • Work with the Functional Business Analyst to ensure that functional requirements are well defined and delivered
  • Work with the Architects and Solution Architects to ensure solution designs are delivered
  • Work with the Tech Delivery managers to deliver detailed estimates for the build and test phases of the program.
  • Ensure the deliveries are as per plan. Pro-actively highlight risks and develop mitigation strategies
  • End-to-end responsibility for multiple projects in the region
Job Requirements
  • Project Manager with at least 12 years' experience in Banking, Consulting, IT services with proven track record
  • Experience should include working on transformation initiatives within the APAC region related to retail credit decision processes, data analytics and credit scoring models.
  • Demonstrate a good mix of technical and functional skills and be cognizant of market practices, regulations and regional nuances.
  • Demonstrate excellent project management capabilities evidenced by successful project delivery
  • Possess excellent communication skills
  • Understanding of Origination systems and tools such as Experian (Strategy Manager as well as Customer management), FICO (TRIAD) or equivalent will be an added advantage.
Be a part of UOB Family
UOB is an equal opportunity employer. UOB does not discriminate on the basis of a candidate's age, race, gender, color, religion, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, or other non-merit factors. All employment decisions at UOB are based on business needs, job requirements and qualifications. If you require any assistance or accommodations to be made for the recruitment process, please inform us when you submit your online application.

Apply now and make a difference.

282,tech project manager,/en/job/programs-and-alliances-manager-asean-9395359,9395359,"Programs and Alliances Manager, ASEAN",False,False,,,SGD,ECLOUDVALLEY TECHNOLOGY PTE. LTD.,27-Mar-22,False,,5 days,201911448G,,,201 - 500 Employees,,,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">
<div>

Founded in 2014 as a born-in-the-cloud partner focused entirely on AWS services, eCloudvalley has grown to 380+ employees with geographic footprints across APAC region, in Taiwan, Hong Kong, China, Philippines, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, and United States. eCloudvalley is the notable vendor in the Asia Pacific regional contextualization of the Magic Quadrant for Public Cloud infrastructure MSP on Gartner.

With a mission to evolve the customer’s business with cloud technology, eCloudvalley has built a professional technical team with over 500 AWS certifications and has served 1,000 enterprises to perform any digital transformation. Our core competencies include Cloud Migration, Managed Services Provider, Data Solution, SAP, DB Freedom, Cloud Training, DevOps, Serverless, and Containers.

Our business has been growing and expanding rapidly and we are looking for new talents to join us. If you are a person with entrepreneur mindset and would like to be a part to disrupt the market, you may be one of the people that we need!
","

Job Description:

  • Manage all AWS-related programs (AWS Partner Programs, POC/POA, MAP, ISV funding related, Windows, Prospecting Day, Webinars, Events, etc.)
  • Be the point of contact for all AWS-specific BU’s (Data Team, SAP Team, Migration Team, etc.)
  • Look for win-win opportunities to extend the relationship by expanding the existing partnership with AWS in ASEAN.
  • Work cross-functionally across eCloudvalley teams (sales, marketing, engineering, operations) to define, develop, and execute GTM program with AWS.
  • Collaborate with sales and marketing teams to qualify, develop, and execute campaigns to generate new business opportunities in ASEAN.
  • Manage all AWS Partner Account information, including the Partner Scorecard, Account Details, and the AWS Partner Solutions Finder Listing.
  • Manage all 3rd Party key partnerships related to the AWS business such as Trend Micro, Crowdstrike, Intel, Druva, and others.
  • Work with country leaders to determine best-fit partnerships to nurture and grow.
  • Establish relationships

Key Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field required
  • Marketing professional with at least 5 years experience managing revenue-generating Marketing programs and strategies within the tech/cloud industry
  • Excellent knowledge of and demonstrable experience in marketing program management and the ability to make impactful decisions
  • Highly motivated, energetic individual who thrives in a fast-paced environment and comes with start-up 'anything and everything' mentality.
  • Exceptional interpersonal skills with the ability to establish positive relationships with team members and senior stakeholders
  • Outstanding written, verbal communication, and presentation skills.

What is in it for you?

  • Attractive remuneration package, benefit & year-end bonus
  • Excellent career development
  • 5-day work with flexible work schedule

Interested candidates are invited to apply online. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Thank you for applying

column2: Established since 1992, Workplus Recruitment has been facilitating successful matches between job seekers and employers for more than 25 years.

We specialize in local and foreign recruitment services for the construction / engineering industry. We also provide advisory services for candidates seeking their dream job, and for employers with the sourcing of the right candidate.

column1: <div>

We strongly believe in long lasting relationships and strive to gain in-depth understanding of your needs to ensure that they are met.

With our expertise and in-depth understanding of the construction and engineering industry, we are able to provide advisory services on interview techniques, salary market trends and career progressions for potential job-seekers.
We have a proven track record of success for the past 25 years for our recruitment services.

column1:
","
• Up to $4.5k
• Leading M&E Engineering Service Provider
• Construction of High Tech facility in Semiconductor
• Work Life Balance
• Excellent Career Progression
Our client is seeking for suitable candidates to join them as QA/QC Engineer.
Responsibilities
  • Report to Project Quality Manager
  • Manage day-to-day QA/QC activities and ensure that the Project Pre-Qualification activities are executed on schedule according to requirements
  • Coordinate with field supervisors and Lead Engineers in relation to Quality related issues
  • Act on the approved ITP for the Project and follow up on the Inspection Requirements
  • Witness Non-destructive Examinations, interpretation of RT films and Review NDE results
  • Attend Off-Site field inspection of Pre-Fabrication of Piping Spools, Blasting & Painting of components & Manufacturing of Pressure Vessels
  • Attest to Surface Preparation, Painting, Pre-Commissioning Activities. Hydro testing, Leak Testing, Purity Testing, Flushing etc
  • Audit approved Welding WPS and its related variables fto ensure compliance
  • Maintain and update Project Piping Quality/Equipment and Documentation
  • Report to manager on Quality related Site observation report (SOR), Engineering observation report (EOR), Non-Conformance Reports (NCR) 
  • Executes Quality-related SOP/Plans/Reports as scheduled
  • Implementation of Mock-up System in Key Project activities
  • Review project specifications with the Engineering team on the technical content, appropriateness, fit for purpose
  • Assist in final testing & commissioning, punch-listing, test pack, O&M and other handover activities.

Job Requirements
  • Diploma / Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering
  • 3 years working experience in QA/QC function 
  • Relevant experience in wafers, pharmaceutical, construction projects, etc
  • Knowledge In ISO 9001-QMS and ISO Internal Audits
  • CSWIP 3.1 / CWI-AWS
  • Certification in NDT Methods Level-II– RT, UT, MT, PT & VT
  • Experienced on High Purity Piping / equipment - Metallic & non-Metallic
  • Familiar with ASME, ASTM, ASNT, AWS, API, SEMI, BS, DVS, DIN, EN & ISO Specifications
     
** We regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates would be notified **

284,tech project manager,/en/job/senior-lead-software-engineer-development-centre-9423300,9423300,"Senior/Lead Software Engineer, Development Centre",False,False,,,SGD,Government Technology Agency of Singapore (GovTech),29-Mar-22,False,,,T16GB0002G,,,1001 - 2000 Employees,,,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">

column3: The Government Technology Agency (GovTech) aims to transform the delivery of Government digital services by taking an ""outside-in"" view, putting citizens and businesses at the heart of everything we do. We also develop the Smart Nation infrastructure and applications, and facilitate collaboration with citizens and businesses to co-develop technologies.
Join us as we support Singapore’s vision of building a Smart Nation - a nation of possibilities empowered through info-communications technology and related engineering.

column1:
","

The Government Technology Agency (GovTech) seeks to transform the delivery of Government Digital Services by taking an ""outside-in"" view, putting citizens and businesses at the heart of everything we do. We also develop the Smart Nation infrastructure and applications, and facilitate collaboration with the public to co-develop technologies.

Join us as we support Singapore’s vision of building a Smart Nation - a nation of possibilities empowered through info-communications technology and related engineering.

As a Senior/Lead Software Engineer, In short, you will be leading and mentoring a small development team within a specific task or project, while staying hands-on.

You will be accountable for delivering and maintaining large-scale projects using AGILE software development methodology.As a Lead Software Engineer, you will tackling a series of exciting and meaningful roles of designing, developing and implementing our new digital service as well as be a tech advisor/ mentor to a multi-disciplinary team comprising of junior engineers, designers and delivery managers building products and services, while staying hands-on, to solve problems that help to create meaningful impact for the people our applications serve. You will be involved in deliverng and maintaining large-scale projects using Agile sofware methodology. Some of the projects includes WINS, CC4.0, MyCareersFuture and MyMoneySense etc.

Our team of developers aim to design and develop software applications incorporating modern technologies like cloud engineering and microservices architecture into our solutions that help government agencies to better serve the needs of the people of Singapore.

What you will be working on:

  • Provide technical leadership to software engineers by coaching and mentoring through end-to-end software development and promote team engagement and motivation.
  • Give recommendations for estimates, resource needs, milestones and risks; ensure effective delegation, monitoring tasks, identifying risks and handling mitigation and critical issues.
  • Perform hands-on technical and functional guidance to design, maintain, build, integrate and test complex software components according to the functional and technical design specifications.
  • Drive adoption of relevant up-to-date technologies, tools and practices in Agile software projects
  • Analyse and assess impact for new features or bug fixes. Make high-level design and establish technical standards.
  • Lead discussions related to product/application/modules/team and build relationships with internal stakeholders.
  • Drive quality processes (such as performing technical root cause analysis and outlining corrective action for given problems), measure them and take corrective actions in case of variances and ensure quality project delivery and results.

What we are looking for:

  • Minimum 5 years of relevant working experience
  • Experience in modern full-stack web application technologies (e.g. Node.js, React.js, Go, MongoDB)
  • Knowledge in cloud technologies such as AWS, Azure, GCP will be advantageous
  • Proven experience in architecting and developing solutions to complex and ambiguous problems
  • Experience in Agile software development

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company as we believe that diversity is meaningful to innovation. Our employee benefits are based on a total rewards approach, offering a holistic and market-competitive suite of perks. This includes generous leave benefits to meet your work-life needs. We trust that you will get the job done wherever you are, and whatever works best for you – so work from home or take a break to exercise if you need to*. We also believe it’s important for you to keep honing your craft in the constantly-evolving tech landscape, so we provide and support a plethora of in-house and external learning and development opportunities all year round.

*Subject to the nature of your job role that might require you to be onsite during fixed hours

",[],Senior Executive,,5 years,"Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree",,Full-Time,,[],https://sggovterp.wd102.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/PublicServiceCareers/job/Singapore/Lead-Software-Engineer--Apps-Development_JR-10000000051,70000,Singapore,sg

285,tech project manager,/en/job/ai-ml-and-full-stack-development-engineer-%5B21337730%5D-9426770,9426770,AI/ML and full stack development Engineer - [21337730],False,False,,,SGD,Citibank N.A.,30-Mar-22,False,,30 days,200309485K,,,More than 5000 Employees,,,"<div>

column3: Citi is more than a global financial services company. It’s an engine for progress. Join us, and you’ll have the chance to get involved in progress in all its shapes and forms, right across the world. From the micro to the macro, from Australia to Zambia, the work we do has real positive impact. Wherever you are and whatever you do, progress starts here.

Mission: Citi's mission is to serve as a trusted partner to our clients by responsibly providing financial services that enable growth and economic progress. Our core activities are safeguarding assets, lending money, making payments and accessing the capital markets on behalf of our clients. We are Citi, the global bank – an institution connecting millions of people across hundreds of countries and cities.

column1:
","
Responsibilities
Description
Citi’s Innovation Labs are a global network of innovation centers focused on delivering cutting edge solutions to Citi’s Institutional Clients Group lines of business.   Our Mission is to create a competitive advantage for our clients, manifested as change in the way they operate, by providing innovative solutions with strong client engagement, from idea to production, and by leveraging the entrepreneurial spirit within the Lab teams. Our Labs Network is a global organization that spans across Dublin, London, New York, Singapore & Tel Aviv, and various other locations globally. We focus on delivering innovative products using cutting-edge technologies in highly complex architectures and with the highest delivery standards. The labs perform research and implementation in many advanced domains spanning across AI, Machine Learning, NLP, Analytics, Distributed Ledger Technologies and many more.
We are currently looking for an excellent technical expert in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Analytics, NLP as well as good experience in full stack development in the Singapore Innovation Lab. The engineer will be working with other engineers and developers, collaborating on the various layers of the application infrastructure for implementation of various proof-of-concepts, pilots, and MVPs across the organization.
The engineer will be responsible for expanding and optimizing our data and data pipeline architecture, as well as optimizing data flow and collection for cross functional teams. The ideal candidate is an experienced data pipeline builder and data wrangler who enjoys optimizing data systems and building them from the ground up and able to develop and deploy the application end to end. 
Responsibilities as AI/ML:
  • Study and transform data science prototypes
  • Set up and manage our AI/ML development and production infrastructure
  • Design and develop machine learning systems according to requirements
  • Research and implement appropriate ML algorithms and tools
  • Select appropriate datasets and data representation methods
  • Run machine learning tests and experiments
  • Perform statistical analysis and fine-tuning using test results
  • Train and retrain systems when necessary
  • Extend existing ML libraries and frameworks
  • Participate in explaining the potential and limitations of AI to product managers and business stakeholders
  • Build data ingestion and data transformation infrastructure
  • Identify transfer learning opportunities and new training datasets
  • Develop AI models from scratch, create APIs, and collaborate with tech and business stakeholders to deploy the models into production
  • Stay current with the latest AI research relevant to the lab’s business domain.
Responsibilities as Full Stack Development:
  • Responsible for building full stack web and mobile applications as part of various work streams within the lab
  • Responsible for building overall architecture of the web / mobile application, converting designs to visual elements and maintain code quality and integrity
  • Understanding and implementation of security and data protection
  • Ability to work closely with TTS business units and clients on problem identification, ideation and solution design
Experience & Qualifications:
  • Bachelor’s degree in computer science, math, engineering, or a related quantitative field
  • Master’s degree or Ph.D. in the relevant field
  • 3+ years of overall experience in Dealing with Data (Analytics/Mining/Engineering) and Full stack development
  • Outstanding analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Demonstrated leadership and project/program management skills
  • Consistently demonstrates clear and concise written and verbal communication
Essential AI/ML skills:
  • Proven experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or similar role
  • Experience building AI models in platforms such as Keras, TensorFlow, or Theano
  • Experience in building AI/ML models for both quantitative and qualitative datasets
  • Experience in building ML models for prediction, classification, recommendation and Natural Language Processing (NLP)
  • Experience in data analysis and data curation
  • Experience in feature engineering and data pre-processing
  • Understanding of data structures, data modeling and software architecture
  • Deep knowledge of math, probability, statistics and algorithms
  • Ability to write robust code in Python
  • Familiarity with machine learning frameworks (like Keras or PyTorch) and libraries (like scikit-learn)
  • Demonstrated proficiency in multiple programming languages with a strong foundation in a statistical platform such as Python, R, SAS, or MatLab.
Essential Full Stack Development:
  • Web fundamentals like HTML, JavaScript, and CSS
  • JavaScript frameworks like Angular, Node.js, React etc.
  • Understanding of RESTful web services
  • Experience in API design and development
  • Server-side languages such as Python, Ruby, Java, JavaScript or equivalent
  • Database technologies such as Elastic DB, MySQL, Oracle, and MongoDB
  • Understanding of networking and infrastructure
We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
",[],Junior Executive,,3 years,"Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Master's Degree, Doctorate (PhD)",,Full-Time,,[],https://jobs.citi.com/job/singapore/ai-ml-and-full-stack-development-engineer/287/12797278880,70140,East,sg
