column2: The Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) is Singapore's lead public sector agency that spearheads economic oriented research to advance scientific discovery and develop innovative technology. Through open innovation, we collaborate with our partners in both the public and private sectors to benefit society.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: As a Science and Technology Organisation, A*STAR bridges the gap between academia and industry. Our research creates economic growth and jobs for Singapore, and enhances lives by contributing to societal benefits such as improving outcomes in healthcare, urban living, and sustainability.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2:
We play a key role in nurturing and developing a diversity of talent and leaders in our Agency and 19 biomedical sciences and physical sciences research institutes, the wider research community and industry.","
﻿
We are looking for a talented indicual to join our dynamic team and be responsible for project development and project life-cycle management in our exciting project to conceptualise and construct a state of the art, modular testbedding facility for emerging Carbon Catpure and Utilisation (CCU) technologies.
Job Description 
  • Formulate development strategies on space management, infrastructure planning, project development and management in ensuring optimal and sustainable design to facilitate world-class scientific research.
  • Translate users’ requirements to design brief & technical specifications, establish project budget for the procurement of consultancy services and construction contracts.
  • Advise and evaluate the technical specifications to ensure sound engineering approach and / or technologies are exploited at reasonable cost.
  • Oversee and control construction timeline to ensure that the projects are completed safely, on schedule, fulfill budget marksmanship and meets the specified (quality) standards.
  • Manage project meetings between project team, users, consultants, contractors for effective execution of project milestones.
  • Overall technical direction and co-ordination of CSA and building infrastructure.
  • Prepare, review, check, and follow up CSA and building infrastructure deliverables.
  • Establish contracts in support of facilities management & maintenance of various infrastructure e.g. ACMV / M&E services, BMS, Gas and Chemical Systems, Security Access Control, Cleaning & Pest Control, Landscaping, General Building services etc.
  • Engage internal stakeholders and various external parties e.g. Landlord, Contractors, Supplier in keeping A*STAR facilities relevant and vibrant.
Job Requirements:
  • Possess at least 8 years of relevant experience in small to middle sized capital investment projects, preferably in the process industry or; possess at least 10 years of relevant project controller experience supporting a main project manager in large capital investment projects
  • Preferable have technical expertise in the construction or tech field. This would include relevant BIM experience in project delivery/facility management.
  • Familiar with Civil, Structural, Architectural and HVAC design.
  • Ability to appreciate and align all related disciplines of process, mechanical, electrical and automation, civil and architecture and understand their interfaces
  • A self-driven and meticulous individual who has the strong ability to multi-task
  • Good time management skills and ability to deliver results under tight timelines
  • Possess strong interpersonal, oral and written communication and organization skills
  • Confident to communicate at all levels and able to think creatively and apply strategic thinking to tasks
The above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. A*STAR may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. These policies may be amended from time to time without notice. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

column3: Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.

About Data Platform Team
In Data Platform Singapore, our mission is to create a PB-level analytical database product that empowers efficient and real-time data-driven decision-making, based on ClickHouse. Our internal use cases have been grown to tens of thousands of click house instances and supporting ByteDance's global customers as well as internal products.
Based on this unique ground, we are building a cloud-native and high-performance enterprise analytical database to better cater for scalability and resource utilization. We vision this database to be the fastest analytical database in the world, and we believe our talented teams are able to enjoy and solve the unprecedented changes along the way.
  • Be responsible for the core functional development of ByteDance's next-generation analytic database
  • Lead a team of talented engineers to build performant and robust cloud-native services
  • Continuously work with the product team to model product requirement into backend concepts
  • Apply industrial best practices in microservice architecture and governance
  • Ensure service quality through the whole software development lifecycle

Qualifications
  • Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or relevant major
  • 5+ years of backend experience, 1+ year of tech leadership experience
  • In-depth understanding of Golang or Java-based backend systems
  • Experienced in building and maintaining mission-critical, large-scale backend systems
  • Good knowledge of server-side technologies: RPC frameworks, MQ, Cache, Config server, Connection Pool, DB sharding, etc
  • Good knowledge of DDD and microservices architecture
  • Knowledge of big data processing systems and OLAP databases is a plus
  • Knowledge of agile project management style is a plus
  • Good communication and interpersonal skills

Brady Corporation is a NYSE listed American Multinational Company headquartered in Milwaukee. We identify and protect premises, products and people with:

•Facility identification, safety and complementary products which help companies comply with safety regulations We also deal with printers and software for safety and facility identification, education and presentation markets.
• Wire identification, including labeling materials and tools for wire and cable marking in the electrical and telecommunication markets.
• High-performance identification, including labels and signs that remain legible and highly-adhesive even in harsh environments as extreme temperatures or chemical exposures.
• Precision die-cut parts, including custom die-cut and silt materials for use in cellular phones, computer disk drives and automotive electronic components.

Brady is a global company with 6,500 employees and operations in 31 countries. Our products are distributed in more than 79 countries through more than 400 distributor partners. We are seeking highly motivated and suitably qualified candidates to join Brady Singapore.
","

Roles & Responsibilities

  • Develop a thorough understanding of our software and printer products
  • Update and execute manual tests
  • Build test suites
  • Build test environments
  • Provide test results
  • Report and verify defects
  • Track issues on through to resolution
  • Identify risks
  • Troubleshoot complex issues
  • Conduct root cause analysis of software, firmware and hardware defects
  • Create Automated Test scripts using Squish Language for UI testing and Python scripts for Firmware testing
  • Interface with product and development teams to address bugs, enhancements and features.
  • Assist in support of complex customer questions or issues
  • Build and maintain relationships with Technical Support technicians
  • Adopt test strategies that will help accelerate product development

Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, or comparable previous experience
  • Minimum of 3 years experience with software development projects
  • Some experience in Agile product development process
  • Some experience with software development projects, preferably in distributed computing environments
  • Some experience with various mobile test platforms (Android, iOS)
  • Ability to collaborate with engineers, project managers, product owners, and/or scrum masters
  • Ability to communicate clearly and effectively

column3: CapitaLand Group (CapitaLand) is one of Asia’s largest diversified real estate groups.  Headquartered in Singapore, CapitaLand’s portfolio spans across diversified real estate classes which include integrated developments, retail, office, lodging, residential and new economy sectors such as business parks, industrial, logistics and data centres. With a presence across more than 250 cities in over 30 countries, the Group focuses on Singapore and China as its core markets, while it continues to expand in markets such as India, Vietnam, Australia, Europe and the USA.

Within its ecosystem, CapitaLand has developed an integrated suite of investment management and operating capabilities that supports its real estate businesses and platforms in building core competencies across the real estate value chain. With this full stack of capabilities, CapitaLand can optimise the strategies of its listed real estate investment management business CapitaLand Investment, and its privately held property development arm CapitaLand Development; to drive competitive advantage for its businesses.

CapitaLand places sustainability at the core of what it does. As a responsible real estate company, CapitaLand contributes to the environmental and social well-being of the communities where it operates, as it delivers long-term economic value to its stakeholders.

column1:
","The Job

You will be part of the Commercial Operations team and reporting to the Centre Manager. 

Responsibilities
People Management

- Lead and supervise a team of Property Executives, Senior Admin Assistants, Senior technicians and/or Technicians
- Supervises maintenance works to ensure that contract service providers perform all contractual obligations under various term contracts

Building Operations

- Carry out routine inspection of mechanical, electrical, fire protection and plumbing and sanitary services
- Plan preventive works schedule, conduct and supervise inspections to building and grounds to identify defects/irregularities and follow-up on rectification works
- Assist in site inspections and provide inputs to the planning and execution of Cyclical Maintenance Works, Building Improvement Works, Annual Building Inspections and Periodic Structural Inspections
- Assist the Centre Manager (CM) in implementation and compliance to ISO 9001, ISO 14001 and OHSAS 18001
- Plan and implement initiatives to achieve the energy and water saving targets for the property

Administration

- Assist the Centre Manager in the preparation of Building Action Plan & operational budget and ensure that expenses are spent within budget
- Upkeep and maintain building operation manual and other records relating to building and its facilities
- Raise work order, monitor repair and maintenance works by contractors and certify work completion for release of payment
- Administer the processing of A & A works, provide technical evaluation, monitor and ensure work completion in accordance with A&A Permits and relevant governmental requirements
- Administer other A & A related issues including the maintenance of proper records of tenants’ A&A submissions, renovation deposits and release of renovation deposits
- Assist the Centre Manager on term contract administration including evaluation of contractors’ performance and review of contract specifications
- Approve monthly overtime and time-off claims

Tenancy Matters

- Attend to tenants’ requests, feedbacks and marketing request promptly
- Conduct inspections for the handing and taking over of tenanted premises
- Assist the CM in liaising with external parties on matters relating to the building

Requirements

- Degree or Diploma in Electrical/ Mechanical/ Building Services Engineering/Estate Management / Project & Facilities Management or equivalent
- Fire Safety Manager Certificate
- Strong building and M&E knowledge and hands-on experience
- Experience in management of commercial building
- Good interpersonal and presentation skills
- Strong leadership
- Able to work independently and to interact with people of all levels

Benefits

- Flexible benefits with comprehensive medical coverage for self and family
- Training and development opportunities
- Subsidised rates at Ascott serviced residences
- Strong advocate of staff volunteerism
- Wellness programmes

Closing Statement

At CapitaLand, we advocate fair employment practices, and recruit talents based on merit and fit with our Corporate values. We provide equal opportunity for all qualified persons and build an inclusive workplace regardless of race, gender, age, religious belief or nationality.

Only shortlisted candiates will be notified. ",[],Manager,,,Bachelor's Degree,,Full-Time,,"['Regular hours, Mondays - Fridays', 'Business (e.g. Shirts)']",https://capitaland.x0pa.ai/public/r/job/1478705?ref=idibu&xrf=brj,70100,Singapore,sg

374,tech project manager,/en/job/assistant-product-marketing-manager-mobile-9347333,9347333,"Assistant Product Marketing Manager, Mobile",False,False,,,SGD,MyRepublic Pte Ltd,19-Mar-22,False,,29 days,201607787Z,,,51 - 200 Employees,,,"

One of the fastest growing telecom operators in the Asia-Pacific, MyRepublic has operations across Singapore, New Zealand, and Australia, and is set to expand further into the region.

Our vision is to be the world’s largest enabler of deep, meaningful and trusted relationships between customers and products through a highly scalable connectivity franchise model.

With our uniquely scalable and centralised framework enabling the seamless delivery of layered services, MyRepublic has become a leader in the digital transformation for the telecom sector, one that is set to play out over the next decade in one of the most exciting regions of the world.

","

The role:

MyRepublic is looking for an outstanding Assistant Product Marketing Manager who will be able to oversee and take charge of MyRepublic Mobile’s product/product marketing strategy and work across teams — Product, IT/Network, Sales, Brand & Marcom, Finance, Operations and Senior Management – to ensure that the company understands and advocate the compelling mobile product propositions.

As a fast-growing company, which constantly introduces new products and product variations, attacks new use cases, market segments, verticals and geographies, we need you to be an important addition to the Mobile Product Marketing team working alongside team members assuring full end-to-end alignment to best address strategic and market needs for the company.

Along with developing a thorough understanding of the consumer, as an Assistant Product Marketing Manager, you will need to utilize knowledge of the market, product technology and strategy to enable the Marketing and Sales teams to execute optimally in activities related to the product.

From a deliverables perspective, you will also be developing business cases, defining positioning messaging, competitive differentiation, go-to-market strategies. You will also continuously review and upgrade existing products and ensure that Management is aligned with these directives.

The position is measured on market success KPI’s of Market Share, Revenue Share and Customer Experience.

How you’ll contribute to MyRepublic’s success

  • Self-Starter with a Getting-Things-Done attitude
  • To be technical enough to understand how our underlying products are built and have a keen eye for design
  • Strong analytical skills, comfortable working with datasets to make data-driven decisions
  • Ability to analyse and breakdown complex mechanics into simple-to-understand points for internal and external stakeholders
  • Excellent communication skills with the ability to bring stakeholders together to drive towards a singular goal of making the Mobile Product successful
  • Strong project management and organizational skills
  • Be a reliable team player and maintain good working relations while simultaneously taking a confident stand to solve problems
  • Ability to work effectively under pressure, adhere to deadlines, deliver high-quality results and to manage multiple priorities

What we offer in return: 

 Exciting opportunities to create and grow in a rapidly growing organisation that is a disruptor in the telco-tech space.

Amazing colleagues and culture that encourages you to do your best work while staying authentic and true to yourself.

A workplace that puts your individual needs at the core: Remote, Hybrid or In-Office – choose a work rhythm that suits you and your team. We focus on outcomes and believe that you can deliver your best work, working anywhere, anytime.

Wellness first. We believe that wellness goes beyond team celebrations and birthday parties. Our holistic approach to wellness gives you opportunities to recharge, connect and explore, at and outside work. In addition to the standard leave entitlements, we offer.

1 day of wellness leave every quarter for you to take for your health and wellbeing, and explore your personal passions.

20 days to work from anywhere each year, allowing you more flexibility to explore and connect with your interests while delivering work you will be proud about.

Qualifications

We think you’ll fit in great with us if you:

  • Minimum: Bachelor’s Degree in a Business-related field
  • Experienced working in a fast-paced, start-up environment with minimum 3 years working experience
  • Previous Product Marketing/Product Management experience is preferred
  • Understanding of the Telecommunications industry is preferred
  • Proficiency in the Google Workplace, Microsoft Office, WordPress and Google Analytics
  • Proven record of ideation, development and execution of products or projects in a similar capacity
  • under pressure, adhere to deadlines, deliver high-quality result and to manage multiple priorities

Other Information

We believe that skills, knowledge and experience can come from a diverse range of life experiences. You may not have ALL the listed requirements for this role but this should not hold back! If you believe that you have what it takes for this position, are willing to learn, and you identify with the values and mission of MyRepublic, we would love to hear from you. We celebrate diversity and look forward to hearing from a diverse group of applicants. We do not discriminate on any factor in our hiring process.

column2: United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices.

column3: In 1935, amid the economic uncertainties following the Great Depression, UOB opened its doors to offer banking services for the merchant community in Singapore.

Since then, UOB has grown organically and through a series of strategic acquisitions. Today, UOB is rated among the world’s top banks: ‘Aa1’ by Moody’s and ‘AA-’ by Standard & Poor’s and Fitch Ratings.

Generations of UOB employees for the past 80 years have carried through the entrepreneurial spirit, focus on long-term value creation and an unwavering commitment to do what is right for our customers and our colleagues.
At UOB, we believe in being a responsible financial services provider and we are committed to making a difference in the lives of our stakeholders and in the communities in which we operate.

Just as we are dedicated to helping our customers manage their finances wisely and grow their businesses, UOB is steadfast in our support of social development, particularly in the areas of art, children and education.

column1:
","
About UOB
United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices. Our history spans more than 80 years. Over this time, we have been guided by our values — Honorable, Enterprising, United and Committed. This means we always strive to do what is right, build for the future, work as one team and pursue long-term success. It is how we work, consistently, be it towards the company, our colleagues or our customers.
About the Department
The Technology and Operations function is comprised of five teams of specialists with distinct capabilities: business partnership, technology, operations, risk governance and planning support and services. We work closely together to harness the power of technology to support our physical and digital banking services and operations. This includes developing, centralising and standardising technology systems as well as banking operations in Singapore and overseas branches.
Job Responsibilities
  • Influence multiple senior stakeholders to a common purpose, schedule and own progress in the data transformation effort across the organization.
  • Articulate project progress, dependencies and risks in a clear & crisp manner to business & technology leaders in the organization
  • Expertise in agile, backlog management for large work streams
  • Be accountable end-to-end accountability and Business Engagement, be responsible for preparing the organization to deliver the program in line within agreed scope and milestones
  • Manage all stakeholders required for the program (e.g., Business, Technology, Operations, Compliance, etc.)
  • Collaborate with Business Program Manager to create an Investment Proposal that covers all technology assumptions, solution aspects and cost considerations.
  • Participate in overall project governance with key stakeholders
  • Be jointly accountable for program plan, budget, risks and stakeholder management with Business Program Manager
Job Requirements
  • Minimum 12 years of relevant banking/project delivery experience
  • More than 5 years' experience in project delivery of two or more of the following areas - data management, digital marketing (adobe/salesforce campaigns), visualization/dashboards and cross-channel customer engagement projects.
  • Bachelor's degree in Engineering / Business / Finance or equivalent; PMP certification is desirable
  • Understanding of technology and operational processes across functions / departments in the bank/market.
  • Knowledge of the data and /or digital marketing (MarTech) domain - experience in delivery of multiple data and/or marketing tech development projects, or projects that had significant data dependency. Alternatively, experience in delivering complex IT projects in a banking / financial services
  • Experience in delivering large-scale programs
  • Experience in scoping and evaluation - defining overall considerations, including scalability, maintainability, cost, operations and technology principal risk to provide a recommendation
  • Excellent stakeholder management and communication skills
  • Strategic forward thinking approach to challenges with outstanding influencing, negotiating and persuasion skills
  • Strong quantitative, analytical, problem solving and process design skills that can translate analysis into actions that meet business objectives
  • Passionate, diligent individual with ability to thrive in ambiguity
  • Resourceful team player
Be a part of UOB Family
UOB is an equal opportunity employer. UOB does not discriminate on the basis of a candidate's age, race, gender, color, religion, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, or other non-merit factors. All employment decisions at UOB are based on business needs, job requirements and qualifications. If you require any assistance or accommodations to be made for the recruitment process, please inform us when you submit your online application.

Apply now and make a difference.

376,tech project manager,/en/job/avp-senior-associate-digital-service-delivery-%7C-quality-assurance-wd28641-9407890,9407890,"AVP / Senior Associate, Digital Service Delivery | Quality Assurance - (WD28641)",False,False,,,SGD,DBS Bank Limited,23-Mar-22,False,,,196800306E,,,More than 5000 Employees,,Singapore,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: DBS is a leading financial services group in Asia, with over 280 branches across 18 markets. Headquartered and listed in Singapore, DBS has a growing presence in the three key Asian axes of growth: Greater China, Southeast Asia and South Asia. The bank's ""AA-"" and ""Aa1"" credit ratings are among the highest in the world.

column3: DBS is at the forefront of leveraging digital technology to shape the future of banking, and has been named “World’s Best Digital Bank” by Euromoney in 2016 and 2018. The bank has also been recognised for its leadership in the region, having been named “Asia’s Best Bank” by several publications including The Banker, Global Finance, IFR Asia and Euromoney since 2012. In addition, the bank has been named “Safest Bank in Asia” by Global Finance for nine consecutive years from 2009 to 2017.

DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, and positively impacting communities through supporting social enterprises, as it banks the Asian way. It has also established a SGD 50 million foundation to strengthen its corporate social responsibility efforts in Singapore and across Asia.

With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. The bank acknowledges the passion, commitment and can-do spirit in all of its 26,000 staff, representing over 40 nationalities.

column1:
","
AVP / Senior Associate, Digital Service Delivery - Quality Assurance, Consumer Banking Group - (WD28641)
Business Function
As the leading bank in Asia, DBS Consumer Banking Group is in a unique position to help our customers realise their dreams and ambitions. As a market leader in the consumer banking business, DBS has a full spectrum of products and services, including deposits, investments, insurance, mortgages, credit cards and personal loans, to help our customers realise their dreams and aspirations at every life stage. Our financial solutions are not only the best in the business - they were made just right for you.
Job Purpose
  • DBS is a leading Asia bank servicing our clients for over 50 years in the 18 markets we operate in. Besides providing a comprehensive suite of financial solutions, our award-winning digital solutions are tailored for our clients as people are the heart of everything, we do in DBS.
  • We are committed to deliver banking that is simple and hassle free and embed our digital solutions in client's everyday life. In our team at regional product delivery, we collaborate with a cross functional team of experts from product managers, analytics, design, engineering, quality assurance to user enablement.
  • We provide insights with our strong domain knowledge, expertise in end to end project execution cycles and strength in quality assurance to turn requirements into output. Our digital product delivery execution cut across the different digital channels which include 
  • internet banking for both desktop browser and mobile app, secured web, Chatbot, Paylah! app, intelligent banking, SMS banking to Wealth services. We understand requirements from product managers, translate them to user story and acceptance criteria and slice them into executable scenarios using our behavioural driven design framework for execution post development by our technology team.
  • Post that we will execute the end to end user acceptance test to validate the quality via our manual or automation tools before release to market.The delivery of these highly complex and sophisticated banking solutions requires a capable and highly motivated individual who excel in stakeholder engagements and familiar with project management to deliver successful outcomes for the organisation.As the bank continue to grow and invest in digital platform and increasing our digital suite of services, testing scope have expanded, platform have become more complex thus there need to have more creative and sustainable way of ensuring that our services delivered , both old and new remain robust and make banking invisible and joyful to our customers. As a specialist in quality assurance delivery, you are part of a core team that focus on the end to end cycle of quality assurance in the user acceptance cycle, besides execution with our manual and automation tools, you will also work with team to identify opportunities to improve and drive efficiency in productivity and quality management in the projects that we execute.
Key Accountabilities 
  • Responsible for end to end execution of the overall test strategy developed collectively with the product owner from user story acceptance criteria, JBehave writing, execution of testing and defects management to live verification support. 
  • Expected to be an expert in banking domain and able to write test plan and testing summary documents. To write and execute end to end test scenarios with detailed steps as per requirements either via manual or automation testing.
  • Actively participate and collaborate in project meetings and discussions, keen attention to details and time management to ensure quality and timely output of project assigned.
  • Execute the assigned manual or automation testing, log defects and follow up on defects to ensure timely closure. Generate reports of testing, prepare training slides for touchpoints, and required update to delivery
Job Duties & Responsibilities     
  • Design, develop, execute, and maintain test scenarios and detailed end to end test cases for the assigned projects relating to the digital platform's user acceptance testing.
  • Able to write test cases in JBehave for agile projects.
  • Expert in using testing tools such as JIRA, HPALM, OCTANE, Confluence etc to execute and maintain project status.
  • Knowledge of web and mobile application testing in banking domain, with good time management and keen eye for details to ensure quality and timely output
  • Detect, report and track defects in the application tools and with various stakeholders to ensure proper closure of issues.
  • Collaborate with all stakeholders proactive to complete job assigned from clarification to issue closure.
  • Good with documentation as constant update to project changes will need to be updated timely
Required Experience 
  • Minimum 2 years' experience in web and mobile application testing in the banking industry is preferred.
  • Strong analytic skills to process complex requirement to come up with end to end scenarios and test cases
  • Familiar with Agile and waterfall methodology, and understand the life cycle of testing in both automated and manual testing
  • Have experience in running or being part of an agile project team in banking industry and have had hands on experience on automation tool like QTP, Selenium, JBehave or Appium and SOAP UI
  • Hands-on experience in Java and VB Scripting will be an advantage
  • Experience with Quality assurance processes and tools including HP ALM, JIRA is a must
  • Good stakeholder engagement skills with strong verbal and written communication is required as will need to collaborate closely across multiple teams during project execution
  • Good team player with strong organizational skills and can work independently with minimum guidance 
Tech Skills Preferred
  • Strong knowledge in automation testing and testing life cycle and methodologies.
  • Experience with Quality assurance processes and tools including HP ALM, OCTANE
  • Selenium, Appium, JBehave, QTP
  • VB Scripting and Java
Skills (Non-Technical)
  • Must have resilience and the ability to work well under pressure with minimum guidance
  • Quick learner, adaptable to changes on project needs and good team player who take initiative to help team to complete assigned task 
  • Strong working knowledge of SDLC and STLC practices and procedures.
  • Ability to handle multiple concurrent activities and projects
  • Strong communication skills as need to interaction closely with various stakeholders from product, delivery lead to technical counterparts across other applications and countries, read and speak Bahasa or Chinese is added advantage
Core Competencies 
  • Dependability — Staff can be trusted to work independently to fulfilled required task assigned.        
  • Adaptability/Flexibility — Need to display resiliency and work well under pressure due to possible evolving changes in requirements.        
  • Cooperation — Good people person is required as job require a lot of stakeholder's engagement cross team to collaborate closely to achieve the required results.         
  • Stress Tolerance — Selected staff need to work under stress due to timeline pressure so staff must be able to manage stress well        
  • Leadership & Initiative — Staff displayed willingness to lead, take charge, and offer opinions and willingness to assist when required.        
  • Persistence — Role requires staff to be persistence as changes may not happen overnight and candidate may be required to follow up closely with stakeholders to ensure closure.        
  • Analytical Thinking — Role requires analysing information and using logic to address work-related issues and problems.        
Apply Now
We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

ResponsibilitiesFounded in 2012, ByteDance is a technology company operating a range of content platforms that inform, educate, entertain and inspire people across languages, cultures and geographies. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Douyin and Toutiao.
The DBA (Database Administrator) team is committed to the construction and management of database services within ByteDance. Our team provides online storage service support for all types of products in ByteDance (TikTok, Douyin, Toutiao, etc) and manages the industry-leading database clusters that store data exceeding trillions of rows. At present, the DBA team focuses on the construction of ultra-large-scale database operation and maintenance systems as well as the landing of intelligent databases.
Responsibilities
  • Lead the DBA team to take the ownership of end-to-end availability and performance for the online database infrastructure;
  • Lead to design and develop automatic operation and maintenance platform to improve system administration and operation efficiency;
  • Play a key role in driving project objectives and execution management, architecture design and code reviews, define long term technical roadmap for the team, and demonstrate technical leadership;
  • Recruit and mentor engineers of various levels of experience into a performant team, build team culture and cohesion, help team members grow technical capabilities;
  • Work closely with stakeholder teams to identify business pain points, continuously optimize and improve customer experience, team reputation, and impact.

Qualifications
Qualifications
  • Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science or related fields;
  • 5+ years of Database development experience;
  • Experience in managing an engineering team and projects in-depth involvement of code, networking, operating systems and storage;
  • Experience in the design and development of software platforms and monitoring frameworks for service-oriented architecture (SOA) governance is preferred;
  • Good communication skills, able to lead and drive projects effectively. Familiar with team and project management methodologies and approaches.

Preferred Qualifications
  • Experience in technical management of a software engineering team;
  • In-depth industry experience in designing, analyzing, and supporting large-scale distributed storage systems, for example MySQL/PostgreSQL/Redis/MongoDB.

379,tech project manager,/en/job/electrical-design-manager-construction-9340428,9340428,Electrical Design Manager (Construction),False,False,6500,8000,SGD,Alfa Tech VestAsia Pte Ltd,18-Mar-22,False,,,201004553W,,,51 - 200 Employees,,,"
AlfaTech was established in California’s Silicon Valley in 1987 as a sole-source provider of mechanical and electrical engineering services. As the firm grew, and in response to changing markets, we expanded our capabilities adding project delivery to provide turnkey project management and a technology division focused exclusively on technology design and IT project management — our experience has shown us that these functions work best when delivered hand-in-hand.

Today, AlfaTech has offices throughout the United States, Europe and Asia and executes projects ranging from a few hundred thousand to several hundred million US dollars. Alfa Tech’s Singapore office acts as a lead overseas office with strong in country capabilities as well as reach to the rest of Asia Pacific.
","

Alfa Tech is hiring an electrical engineering subject matter expert to join our expanding team for design and build projects especially for Data Centre and Clean Room construction and maintenance as Electrical Design Manager.

A successful applicant will drives the overall execution of projects based on project requirements. He/She reviews mechanical and/or electrical system designs, specifications, calculations and other submittals. He oversees the project assessment phases. He ensures the mechanical and/or electrical systems designs and models developed are in accordance to project requirements. He leads the tendering processes and is responsible for the projects' costs and budgets. He manages a team of engineers and ensures continuous performance improvement.

He is meticulous, highly detail-oriented and is keen to drive new technologies adoptions. He is an expert in mechanical and/or electrical engineering fields, is analytical and possesses strong problem-solving and decision-making skills. He demonstrates leadership in leading project teams and is an effective communicator. He is required to work in office and at project sites.

Define project scope and requirements

  • Review the outcomes of feasibility studies
  • Review the proposed solutions
  • Develop risk management plans and risk controls
  • Review project scope and requirements in alignment with relevant stakeholder objectives
  • Oversee the coordination with utility providers and agencies on project progress
  • Drive design development
  • Review conceptual designs based on project requirements as well as sustainability and maintainability considerations
  • Review schematic designs for project viability
  • Review load analyses, calculations and equipment selection
  • Review detailed designs based on technical feasibility, alignment with project requirements and redundancy considerations
  • Review simulation modelling and analysis outcomes
  • Review submissions to authorities or agencies for all project stages
  • Oversee design changes and services coordination
  • Drive tendering processes
  • Review quantitative estimates for project costs and resources
  • Manage stakeholder buy-in on baseline budgets, schedules and project success metrics
  • Review tender terms, drawings and specifications for alignment with project requirements
  • Review contractors' and subcontractors' tender bids

Oversee project execution

  • Review shop drawings, installation methods, as well as equipment and materials schedules for relevant stakeholders' approval
  • Review contractors' and subcontractors' work against project requirements and quality standards
  • Review the results of testing and commissioning for successful project handovers
  •  Review the defect resolution
  • Review handover documents
  • Manage authorities' and agencies' close out inspections
  • Manage people and organizational functions
  • Identify recruitment needs and areas for technical and business management training and development
  • Monitor achievement of key project milestones
  • Monitor financial health of daily operations
  • Develop relationships with prospective clients for business development opportunities
  • Review resolution of variations and liquidated damages
  • Review engineering drawings and designs
  • Facilitate the use of technical engineering drawings and datasheets when supervising preparations for construction, operations or maintenance work activities

Minimum Qualifications:

  • Recognized Bachelor’s degree/Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering
  • Green Mark Manager Certification will be added value
  • Minimum 10 years’ in electrical engineering design (with minimum 5 years in Construction sector)
  • Good interpersonal skill with the ability to connect with and influence stakeholders with different objectives
  • Able to solve problems under pressure
  • Able to carry out works in critical environment requiring coordination across multi-disciplines for delivering a goal
  • Candidate with Green Mark Manager certification will be added value

The position holder is responsible for maintaining and servicing a range of well-known diesel generators ranging from 10KVA to 4MW and both HT and LT generators. Reporting to your team Senior Manager (Service).

  • Install or relocate equipment and perform start-up / check-out procedures
  • Determine corrective actions required and escalate for assistance and resolution

Requirements:

  • Physically fit with good eyesight
  • With minimum 5 yrs hands on experience with servicing of Industrial Generators or equivalent
  • Possess basic understanding of basic components and functions of mechanical engines or diesel engines
  • Able to use electrical tools such as Multimeter, Meggar Meter, clamp meter, transient meter etc
  • Able to read simple drawings and service reports
  • Possess man management experience for up to 5 technicians
  • Willing to work under outdoor environment on site
  • Basic working knowledge in MS Word and Excel for status and reporting purpose
  • Driving license is a MUST
  • Able to use own initiative as well as working as part of a team
  • Good customer service and communication skills

Brady Corporation is a NYSE listed American Multinational Company headquartered in Milwaukee. We identify and protect premises, products and people with:

•Facility identification, safety and complementary products which help companies comply with safety regulations We also deal with printers and software for safety and facility identification, education and presentation markets.
• Wire identification, including labeling materials and tools for wire and cable marking in the electrical and telecommunication markets.
• High-performance identification, including labels and signs that remain legible and highly-adhesive even in harsh environments as extreme temperatures or chemical exposures.
• Precision die-cut parts, including custom die-cut and silt materials for use in cellular phones, computer disk drives and automotive electronic components.

Brady is a global company with 6,500 employees and operations in 31 countries. Our products are distributed in more than 79 countries through more than 400 distributor partners. We are seeking highly motivated and suitably qualified candidates to join Brady Singapore.
","

Roles & Responsibilities

  • Have a thorough understanding of our software and printer products and be able to share knowledge with junior resources
  • Actively participate in Scrum teams, partner with engineers to automate testing
  • Create, update and execute manual tests

  • Manage test environments
  • Develop skills in test automation
  • Provides status updates to seniors on projects
  • Communicate test coverage, risks and defects to aid in decision making
  • Report and verify defects
  • Track issues on through to resolution
  • Identify risks
  • Troubleshoot complex issues
  • Mentor junior testers in conducting root cause analysis of software, firmware defects
  • Interface with product and development teams to address bugs, enhancements and features.
  • Assist in support of complex customer questions or issues
  • Build and maintain relationships with Technical Support technicians
  • Create test strategies that will help accelerate product development
  • Actively Participate in design reviews and provide feedback on features and usability
  • Learn to analyze and decompose software systems and assist in the development of strategies to test the system at all levels of the application stack

Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, or comparable previous experience
  • Minimum of 8 years experience plus additional SQA responsibility with software development projects
  • Some experience working in an Agile environment
  • Some experience with test automation tools including Selenium
  • Some experience with software development projects, preferably in distributed computing environments
  • Understanding of Test Driven Development
  • Some experience with various mobile test platforms (Android, iOS)
  • Ability to collaborate with engineers, project managers, product owners, and/or scrum masters
  • Ability to communicate clearly and effectively

column3: Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.

ResponsibilitiesFounded in 2012, ByteDance is a technology company operating a range of content platforms that inform, educate, entertain, and inspire people across languages, cultures, and geographies. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Douyin, Toutiao, Helo, and Resso.
We are looking for three Distributed Storage System Tech Leads who has an understanding of distributed storage systems, design skills, and experience in building and delivering large-scale storage systems to lead several software systems described below.
  • Object Storage Service: Store objects like pictures, videos, documents, etc. (Requires object storage design and development experience).
  • HDFS: As a traditional storage product in the BigData area, we re-design and implement HDFS with C++. So far, it's supporting not only Data Platform, but also Advertisement, Machine Learning, and Search services. (Requires a solid technical foundation in distributed storage systems. Big Data experience will be a plus.).
  • ByteStore: A shared storage system, the underlying platform of ByteDance's storage systems, supports applications such as object, block, table, file, etc.
Responsibilities
  • Lead the team to build new and innovative large-scale distributed storage systems, including but not limited to Object Storage, HDFS, ByteStore;
  • Play a key role in driving project objectives and execution management, architecture design and code reviews, define long term technical roadmap for the team, and demonstrate technical leadership;
  • Recruit, manage, mentor, and provide technical leadership for team of software engineers;
  • Work closely with stakeholder teams to identify business pain points, continuously optimize and improve customer experience, team reputation, and impact.

Qualifications
Qualifications
  • Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science or related fields;
  • 6+ years of professional software development experience;
  • Strong with C++/Golang/Java program development (at least one), pursue high-quality code and focused on code engineering quality;
  • Solid knowledge of Linux system, proficient in multi-threading, network programming, and distributed development in any programming language;
  • Good communication skills, able to lead and drive projects effectively. Familiar with team and project management methodologies and approaches.
Preferred Qualifications
  • Experience in technical management of a software engineering team;
  • In-depth research and industry experience in large-scale distributed storage system design and implementation, such as HDFS/Ceph/S3/OSS/EBS;
  • Contributor/Committer or PMC of the open-source community is a plus.

column2: TTSH is one of Singapore’s largest multi-disciplinary hospitals with more than 174 years of pioneering medical care and development. The hospital has 45 clinical and allied health departments, 16 specialist centres. It also has three institutes that are spearheading care, research and innovations in geriatric medicine, infectious diseases and ophthalmology. Powered by more than 8,000 healthcare staff, TTSH sees over 2,500 patients at its specialist clinics and some 460 patients at its emergency department every day. TTSH is part of the National Healthcare Group, providing holistic and integrated patient care.  With a strong quality culture steeped in patient safety, TTSH constantly challenges itself to provide faster, better, cheaper and safer care for patients. To achieve this, the hospital keeps abreast and believes in investing in its staff, facilities, medical technology and system improvements.

column1: <div>

column2:
More information is available at www.ttshhr.com","
TTSH Central Health is hiring!  The candidate will be part of a fast-paced and dynamic team in supporting the Central Health Integrated Care Office (ICO) in efforts towards value-driven transformation of the healthcare model towards Population Health. The Manager will support the Assistant Director to champion the interests of Central ICO and our network of community care partners' digitalisation efforts in Population Health. The Manager will also facilitate inter-provider coordination and drive digitally-enabled, value-based integrated care delivery to our residents.

Responsibilities

  • Represent the interests of Central ICO and our partners in the execution of NHG-run IT initiatives, ensuring that systems development and implementation by ITO are in line with the Central Health digitalisation strategy
  • To work closely within the Division, partners and other relevant stakeholders, to translate user requirements and ensure technical specifications of digital projects encapsulate essential care coordination needs, and are developed for feasible, sustainable use by providers
  • To actively participate in IT/digital projects relating to ICO development and partnerships strengthening, championing the positions of the ICO and our partners and maintaining clear documentation
  • Served as the primary liaison point between end users and NGEMR/Epic personnel and designing and/or building NGEMR programmes for collaborative care workflows to facilitate integrated care delivery among providers
  • To develop and implement efficient processes and/or dashboards for regular reporting and monitoring of utilisation and provider performance against care quality indicators, to support ongoing benchmarking, evaluation and management decision-making on value-based improvements
  • To keep NHGHQ, Management, partners and other stakeholders apprised of digitalisation project progress and achievements in areas relevant to Central ICO and partners.

Requirements
  • Bachelor Degree in health informatics, information systems, business analytics, computer science or relevant fields with 7 years of experience in a large organisation
  • Knowledge of/experience in healthcare is strongly preferred
  • Meticulous, keen eye for detail, strong IT/tech acumen, and ability to interpret and handle data sets
  • Ability to translate complex care workflows and user/provider needs into technical development specs; ability to communicate and translate technical terms into layman language and vice versa
  • Hands-on experience in project management/ product management, health tech and/or health informatics
  • Strong interpersonal, written and verbal communication skills

column3: GMP Technologies is a division of The GMP Group.

The group’s extensive network and comprehensive services affirm GMP’s role as one of the most dynamic staffing professionals in the region.

column1:
","
On behalf of our established Client is an emerging Global leader in the $100B+ cloud Communications Platform as a Service (CPaaS), we are sourcing for a Technical Accounts Manager aka Technical Customer Success Manager.
This is a Technical Enterprise Accounts Management role. Suitable candidates must have a technical development background, with experience in SaaS or CPaaS, up-selling and cross-selling.
The Technical Accounts/Technical Customer Success Manager will be responsible for fostering lasting relationships with the Enterprise Customers collaborating with sales, solutions architects and engineers at delivering innovative communication solutions.
As a main point of contact to Enterprise Customers, the Manager would be defining the onboarding success plans to drive customer outcomes, and keep engaging them on a regular basis to ensure they are leveraging the client’s solutions in the most effective way. Using a consultative and analytical approach, the Manager will be seen as a trusted advisor with industry expertise and identify new growth opportunities.
Ideal candidates will be building strong internal relationships and be exceptionally organized. You are a customer first advocate with engaging communication skills and experience working with customers in the SaaS/Communications industry.
Job Scope:
  • Technical Accounts Manager/Technical Customer Success Manager is responsible to key High Revenue Accounts for the Asia-Pacific region.
  • Project Management of new onboardings to ensure customer delight and ensure a smooth go-live as per the agreed timelines ensuring a faster time to revenue.
  • Point of contact for key customers for any service escalations or Technical advisory.
  • Responsible for Quarterly Business Review, new requirements, response to RFP’s and discussions on traffic ramp up, onboarding new projects etc.
  • Liaison and Technical & Communication bridge between customer’s new requirements and internal stakeholder teams e.g. Product, Engineering, Quality and Business Operations
  • Assist Sales Account Managers to handle customers facing any issues with the Client's service or query on products, billing, new features, additional service etc.
  • Managing custom solution projects for key customers and responsible for its service delivery role e.g. feature requirement, build, testing, deployment, go-live and Support.
  • Internal champion on SMS, Voice and Number Insight products from a Technical perspective.
Essential Traits of Suitable Candidates:
  • A robust customer-centric mindset and approach
  • Experience in CPaaS / SaaS or communication APIs
  • MUST HAVE a strong technical applications and/or systems development experience background
  • An understanding of how Professional Services/ Customer Success teams operate
  • Detail oriented with excellent account management, time management and problem solving skills
  • Ability to Up-Sell and Cross-Sell company's products and solutions to address 
  • Exceptional written and verbal communication skills with a high-level of professionalism
  • The ability to self-driven, maintain a high level of activity, manage multiple competing priorities, and work effectively in a results-driven culture
  • Pragmatic and realistic and can build strong internal working relationships to support customer delivery requirements
  • Confidence and patience in face to face customer engagement, ability to lead internal and external meetings
Job Requirements:
  • Bachelor's degree (or equivalent) or higher
  • MUST HAVE a strong technical applications and/or systems development experience background
  • Technical hands-on experience in Python/JavaScript scripting
  • More than 4 years of experience working in a customer relationship management or customer facing account management role with technical customer base and corporate IT projects and processes.
  • Experience in Project Management"" or ""Program Management"" with a track record of consistently driving successful customer projects and programs.
  • A tech savvy mind, with a good understanding of the trends driving innovation in technology, particularly in mobile, cloud and consumer areas
  • Previous experience in using CRM systems such as Gainsight or Strikedeck and familiarity using tools like Jira, Tableau and Salesforce.
  • A highly quantitative approach to understanding, measuring, and forecasting Customer behaviour and revenue.
  • Intellectual curiosity with a strong interest in evolving technology.
Visit GMP Job Portal at www.gmprecruit.com and search for Job Reference: 20349 for more job details.
If you are keen in this role, you may also send us your updated CV in MS Words format to Christopher Wong (R1104673) at christopher.wong@gmprecruit.com for review and we will arrange for a convenient time to speak more.
We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
GMP Technologies (S) Pte Ltd | EA Licence: 11C3793 | EA Personnel: Christopher Wong | Registration No: R1104673

column3: Shopee is the leading e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan. It is a platform tailored for the region, providing customers with an easy, secure and fast online shopping experience through strong payment and logistical support.

Shopee aims to continually enhance its platform and become the region’s e-commerce destination of choice via ongoing product optimisation and localised user-centered strategies. Shopee, a Sea company, was first launched in Singapore in 2015, and has since expanded its reach to Malaysia, Thailand, Taiwan, Indonesia, Vietnam and the Philippines. Sea is a leader in digital entertainment, e-commerce and digital financial services across Greater Southeast Asia. Sea's mission is to better the lives of consumers and small businesses with technology, and is listed on the NYSE under the symbol SE. The Shopee team comprises over 8,000 employees from across the region, and with our rapid expansion, we are constantly on the lookout for potential talents who have the passion and drive to become part of a fast-moving and dynamic team.

column1:
","

The Operation teams at Shopee covers the operational end-to-end process, from when the buyer searches for a product listed on the Shopee platform, to the moment the buyer receives the products. The team analyses and monitors operational KPIs across the region and conducts root cause analysis when operation performance fluctuates. The Operations team comprises Customer Service, Payment, Listings, Warehouse, Logistics, Seller Operations and Fraud. Browse our Operations team openings to see how you can make an impact with us.

About the Team:

At Shopee Express (SPX), we are committed to providing the best last mile customer experience and ensuring that millions of parcels are delivered safely and efficiently to our customers’ doorsteps. We consistently raise the bar in customer experience by utilising lean thinking and creative problem-solving to drive improvement initiatives and innovative delivery solutions.

We are looking for data-driven problem-solvers to be part of our regional team. Data is core to our work - we work with large data sets to draw insights into delivery performance, optimise network planning, and deep-dive into pain points to debottleneck our scaling efforts. 

Job Description:

  • Identify areas of process improvement, strategies, potential risks and technical issues, as well as opportunities to improve efficiencies and the overall business processes
  • Ideation of operational business initiatives leveraging on your ability in project management and consulting methodology framework
  • Develop and drive the implementation of best practices and policies across all markets for initiatives such as rider management and delivery operations
  • Propose new process or approach to structurally grow business and improve service quality
  • Act as point of contact as well as communicating strategies and objectives between departments within the company to drive project success
  • Work with function stakeholders to lead and drive projects that enable business improvement and transformation
  • Communicate and present findings and outcomes to senior management and stakeholders in a structured manner

Requirements:

  • At least 5 years experience in relevant industries (supply chain, e-commerce, tech) or management consulting in multinational corporations
  • Ability to apply analytical thinking towards business problems, work independently to deliver high-quality outcomes
  • Self-motivated, result-oriented and, able to work in a dynamic work environment
  • Data-driven, detail-oriented with good organization skills and sensitive to timelines 
  • Proven team player and ability to work independently while managing multiple projects/assignments
  • Highly proficient in Excel, knowledge of other MS office applications
  • Knowledge in SQL, Python or geospatial data analysis skills is a plus
  • Open to frequent travels and deployment to overseas markets

column3: GroupM, the world’s leading full service media investment management operation, was created by WPP to oversee its assets in this sector.  These assets include Mindshare, MediaCom, MEC and MAXUS.  The focus of GroupM is the intelligent application of volume and scale in trading, innovation and quality of services, in order to bring benefit to clients and the companies it operates.

WPPis the world leader in communications services.  It comprises of leading companies in all of these disciplines: advertising; media investment management; consumer insight; public relations & public affairs; branding & identity; direct, digital, promotion & relationship marketing; healthcare communications; and specialist communications.  There are more than 150 companies within the Group.  Between them, our companies work with 336 of the Fortune Global 500; 29 of the Dow Jones 30; 61 of the NASDAQ 100; and 35 of the Fortune e-50.  Collectively, over 146,000 people work for WPP companies out of almost 2,400 offices in 107 countries.

column1:
","

Overview of the Job

This is hybrid role that gives you exposure to both performance media and ecommerce strategies, which is a promising opportunity as APAC continues to make fast progress in this direction. You will be responsible for performance channel planning, lead implementation and help drive digital best practices for our clients. You will be the go-to digital person for clients and agency partners for your accounts and proactively lead presentations and meeting discussions.

You must possess excellent working knowledge of paid digital channels driving traffic to ecommerce marketplaces and familiar with paid search on marketplaces like Lazada and Shopee.

It is a multi-market regional role, where you will be leading regional strategies and execution, and work with global HQ and local markets.

At GroupM APAC, our people are our strength, which is why fostering a culture of diversity and inclusion is important to us.

Reporting of the role:

This role reports to the Regional Digital Director

3 Best Things About The Job:

  • Working with a high performing integrated media team to drive best in class digital channel planning and ROI
  • Hone leadership skills through building and leading operation excellence for the team
  • Work with counterparts across all of APAC

Measures of Success

In three months:

  • Fully up to speed with the platform analytics and strategy frameworks for existing clients at Wavemaker
  • Be the point person for clients’ ecommerce consultation
  • Take on maintenance of proprietary Wavemaker tool on marketplace competitive intelligence
  • Actively participating in agency updates, GroupM working group on analytics, data and tech

In six months:

  • Be seen as the go-to person for ecommerce on-platform tools from the Wavemaker local teams
  • Actively support APAC Ecommerce lead on tools and capabity developments for the region
  • Support in deployment of Wavemaker’s proprietary Wavemaker Illuminate with the business leads
  • Recommend processes and innovative ways to improve existing ways or working or streamline workflow

In twelve months:

  • Actively steering the ecommerce pitches and credentials to clients
  • Work with APAC Ecommerce lead to drive new projects and revenue on analytics and tech
  • Have the ability to lead client projects and meetings independently
  • Be an active member of Wavemaker’s consultancy hub offering

Key Areas of Responsibilities

  • Competent in planning all digital channels and managing digital integration within the bigger communication plan.
  • Own project management, ensure smooth workflow and get clients and team members up to speed on all tasks.
  • Formulate performance media plans based on campaign objectives and GMV targets, working with paid social, paid search and programmatic specialists
  • Responsible for planning and executing on-platform marketplace paid search campaigns with team support, including end to end setup, optimizations and reporting
  • Tracks performance in reporting and dashboards
  • Analysis and optimization of the campaigns
  • Works with global ecommerce client practice lead to update on regional performance and share best practices
  • Identifies long-term trends and insights, connecting it to the wider touchpoint planning approach
  • Leads WIPs and quarterly business review, providing analysis and recommendations
  • Main point of contact for regional clients, media partners and agency partners

Required Competencies

  • Experience in conversion-led campaigns for ecommerce
  • Understanding of digital platforms across paid search (Google Ads, Google Shopping, Google Shopping with Shopee), paid social (Facebook Collaborative Ads), programmatic (DV360) and other relevant digital channels
  • Experience in paid search for Lazada and Shopee. Will be an advantage if candidate has familiarity with other marketplaces and D2C ecommerce.
  • Knows know to use MSP and seller center for marketplaces
  • Be up to date with new and upcoming performance and ecommerce formats
  • Possesses strong analytical skills to analyze data and turn them into actionable insights
  • Proven ability to independently manage multiple priorities in a fast paced and deadline driven environment
  • Shows strategic ownership of key projects or topics and works across channels to find key points of success
  • At least 4-5 years of overall experience in managing performance campaigns, of which 1-2 years of experience in the ecommerce marketplace space

More about Wavemaker

We believe there always is a better way to grow. We positively provoke growth for our clients by reshaping consumer decision-making and experiences through media, content and technology. The Wavemaker way is globally consistent. Fueled by the world’s most powerful consumer data, we understand where and how marketing can intervene decisively to help brands win more sales.

Our name is our mission and our method. To make waves, you need to be provocative, even fearless. We do our best work for brave brands and people who want to be challenged to go further and faster. We know it’s not easy, but if it’s in you, we will get it out of you.

Our 7,600 people across 90 markets provoke growth for some of the world’s leading brands and businesses. Our attitude of Positive Provocation is enabled by:

• deep knowledge we have of our clients’ business

• confidence to challenge what’s gone before

• the support to go further than we thought possible

We are a part of GroupM, WPP’s global media investment management company. Discover more on wavemakerglobal.com, Twitter and LinkedIn

About Singapore

GroupM Singapore operates in one of the most dynamic and exciting environments in the world. Although it is a small domestic market, there is a vibrant media industry which is undergoing rapid evolution as digital technology reshapes the way marketing supports advertisers’ needs. Being at the crossroads of Asia means, that aside from the local clients and media owners, we also have a high proportion of multi-national clients, renowned brands and media owners. Making GroupM Singapore the Number One organisation to join and develop your career in media investment.

GroupM is an equal opportunity employer. We view everyone as an individual and we understand that inclusion is more than just diversity – it’s about belonging. We celebrate the fact that everyone is unique and that’s what makes us so good at what we do. We pride ourselves on being a company that embraces difference and truly represents the global clients we work with.

388,tech project manager,/en/job/hr-specialist-9367796,9367796,HR Specialist,False,False,,,SGD,ASML Singapore Pte Ltd,25-Mar-22,False,,,199405535E,,,51 - 200 Employees,,"Lor Chuan, New Tech Park","

ASML is the world's leading provider of lithography systems for the semiconductor industry, manufacturing complex machines that are critical to the production of integrated circuits or chips. Headquartered in Veldhoven, the Netherlands, ASML is traded on Euronext Amsterdam and NASDAQ under the symbol ASML.

ASML designs, develops, integrates, markets and services advanced systems used by customers – the major global semiconductor manufacturers – to create chips that power a wide array of electronic, communications and information technology products.

With every generation, the complexity of producing integrated circuits with more functionality increases. Semiconductor manufacturers need partners that provide technology and complete process solutions. ASML is committed to providing customers with leading edge technology that is production-ready at the earliest possible date. ASML technology is supported by process solutions, enabling customers to gain and sustain a competitive edge in the marketplace.

","Introduction to the job

The job provides you the opportunities to work in a global leading company of lithography technology. You would able to work, share, and grow together with global HR professionals as one team. In ASML, you would have the chance to experience our culture & values of Challenge, Collaborate, and Care that embedded in our work DNA, daily HR core activities & various HR projects. We’re endeavoring to make ASML a great place to work.

This position will provide HR support to the Singapore/Malaysia organization to implement strategic HR initiatives in support of business needs.

Responsibilities include the administration of HR programs, procedures and plans related to employee relations activities, including but not limited to compensation and benefits, work pass application processes, talent acquisition, and organization development.

Role and responsibilities
  • Responsible and execute HR Operations efficiently that includes Compensation and Benefits, People’s Development and Talent Acquisition.
  • Collaborate within HR and the business to create process improvements and increase client satisfaction and well as provide change management support.
  • Compensation & Benefits includes analysis on market trend and proposal with the benchmarking data.
  • People’s Development includes planning and coordinate on yearly soft skills training with external vendors.
  • Talent Acquisition includes jobs posting, resumes screening, interviews arrangement and creating offers.
  • Work with country HR team to define HR strategies, HR projects and priorities and act accordingly
  • Follow up on HR Calendar
  • Diverse ad-hoc requests depending on business needs and other HR support activities as required (ex. generating reports as needed, data analysis and provide summaries and recommendations)
Education and experience
  • Bachelor degree in Human Resource, Business Administration, Business Management or related field.
  • At least 5 years of working experience in HR, with knowledge of HR processes, systems and policies
  • Ability to consistently deliver high quality customer service in a professional and efficient manner.
  • Result and continuous improvement drive
  • Is flexible and can adapt easily to change
  • Can balance between working with an operational, tactical and strategic mind-set

Skills

Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.

To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

  • Know-how & experience of HR multi-expertise function (Ex. C&B , TA, or PD)
  • Ability to work as part of a team as well as independently.
  • Plans & aligns (effectively manage priorities and workload).
  • Ability to work in a changing environment to meet demanding deadlines and timescales.
  • Acts with integrity and instills trust.
  • Shows personal ownership.
  • Demonstrates Challenge, Collaborate and Care (3 C’s) in customer interfacing both towards employees, managers & HR colleagues.

389,tech project manager,/en/job/tech-lead-distributed-table-storage-cloud-infrastructure-9425788,9425788,"#Tech Lead(Distributed Table Storage), Cloud Infrastructure",False,False,,,SGD,BYTEDANCE PTE. LTD.,29-Mar-22,False,,,201923456H,,,501 - 1000 Employees,,,"<div>

column3: Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.

column1:
","
ResponsibilitiesFounded in 2012, ByteDance is a technology company operating a range of content platforms that inform, educate, entertain and inspire people across languages, cultures and geographies. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Douyin and Toutiao.
The Infrastructure NoSQL team supports all mid-platform and business lines in ByteDance, operating across tens of thousands of servers and dealing with data far beyond the PB level. We have self-developed distributed key-value/caching systems, globally distributed tables storage systems and massive graph database products. Combined with the industry's leading hardware and software stack technology, we strive for the continuous evolution of the next generation of NoSQL products.
You will be responsible for the technical research and development of ByteDance's self-developed global distributed table system (ByteTable) and open source HBase products. We are committed to building a globalized, high-performance, low-cost, and cloud native distributed table system to provide rich features for our applications.
Joining our team, you can expect to have a very structured and thorough training plan, as well as the opportunity to undertake a larger working scope whilst giving enough space to grow and develop your career. We look forward to your application.
Responsibilities
  • Lead the team to build a globalized, high-performance, low-cost, and cloud native distributed table system, including but not limited to ByteTable and HBase;
  • Play a key role in driving project objectives and execution management, architecture design and code reviews, define long term technical roadmap for the team, and demonstrate technical leadership;
  • Recruit, manage, mentor, and provide technical leadership for team of software engineers;
  • Work closely with stakeholder teams to identify business pain points, continuously optimize and improve customer experience, team reputation, and impact.

Qualifications
Qualifications
  • Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science or related fields;
  • 6+ years of professional software development experience;
  • Strong with C++/Golang/Java/Python program development (at least one), pursue high-quality code and focused on code engineering quality;
  • Solid knowledge of Linux system, proficient in multi-threading, network programming, and distributed development in any programming language;
  • In-depth understanding of storage principles, proficient in key technologies of distributed storage and computing, and have practical experience with them;
  • Good communication skills, able to lead and drive projects effectively. Familiar with team and project management methodologies and approaches.
Preferred Qualifications
  • Experience in technical management of a software engineering team;
  • In-depth research and industry experience in large-scale distributed storage systems, such as HBase/Cassandra/TiDB/ScyllaDB/Aerospike, and storage engine design and deplementation, such as Rocksdb/Leveldb;
  • Contributor/Committer or PMC of the open-source community is a plus.
