column3: Shopee is the leading e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan. It is a platform tailored for the region, providing customers with an easy, secure and fast online shopping experience through strong payment and logistical support.

Shopee aims to continually enhance its platform and become the region’s e-commerce destination of choice via ongoing product optimisation and localised user-centered strategies. Shopee, a Sea company, was first launched in Singapore in 2015, and has since expanded its reach to Malaysia, Thailand, Taiwan, Indonesia, Vietnam and the Philippines. Sea is a leader in digital entertainment, e-commerce and digital financial services across Greater Southeast Asia. Sea's mission is to better the lives of consumers and small businesses with technology, and is listed on the NYSE under the symbol SE. The Shopee team comprises over 8,000 employees from across the region, and with our rapid expansion, we are constantly on the lookout for potential talents who have the passion and drive to become part of a fast-moving and dynamic team.

column1:
","

The Marketing team at Shopee is responsible for conceptualising and implementing go-to-market activities to achieve increased usage and visibility. The team covers areas including Campaigns Management, Community, Public Relations, Partnerships, Offline Marketing and Design. The Regional Marketing team is responsible for strategising and implementing go-to-market activities and working with local teams to localise marketing for the specific markets. The Brand and Growth Marketing team covers all aspects of online and performance marketing for the region. This team is responsible for data-driven solutions, tracking and measuring data to reach the targeted customers. Browse our Marketing team openings to see how you can make an impact with us.

About the Team:

We are looking for a passionate and self-driven CRM expert to lead CRM product and activation campaign strategy globally. You are expected to initiate, manage, and optimize multi-channel CRM strategies for regional CRM activation campaigns with the goal of maximizing customer lifetime value across all markets. You will be working closely with the CRM product team to implement advanced algorithms to personalise the CRM experience for customers and with the Marketing Analytics team to deliver and drive business impact.

Job Description:

  • Drive user acquisition and grow sales by developing world class CRM campaign strategies and consistent optimisation
  • Work with external CRM channel partners to co-develop integrated product features and campaigns to drive business KPI
  • Collaborate with regional and local CRM teams to translate their campaign/customer needs into scalable personalized CRM activation campaigns through our product. This would require a deep understanding of user behavior to maximise product capability
  • Partner with Marketing Analytics to develop a deep understanding of what resonates with our customers in order to create and implement cross-channel, end-to-end CRM activation strategies
  • Build and monitor testing scenarios tied back to customer success KPIs to regularly surface business analytics, to provide timely and accurate insights to improve campaign responsiveness

Requirements:

  • Bachelor degree in a quantitative field required, Masters degree, MBA/MSc or related programs preferred
  • Minimum 3-5 years of direct CRM experience, mobile CRM, internet industry experience preferred
  • Experience in conceptualising and implementing CRM strategies through product, previously worked with product/tech to translate business requirements to technical requirements
  • Strong Excel and data analytics skills. Knowledge in SQL is a strong plus
  • Excellent project management skills with an ability to set and achieve goals, meet deadlines, and multitask in a fast paced environment
  • Passion for continuous improvement, creative and is a self-starter
  • Enjoy the challenges of a fast-paced, dynamic ecommerce environment

391,tech project manager,/en/job/software-engineer-senior-software-engineer-for-ai-singapore-ai-technology-9406868,9406868,Software Engineer/Senior Software Engineer for AI Singapore (AI Technology),False,False,,,,National University of Singapore,23-Mar-22,False,,30 days,200604346E,,,More than 5000 Employees,,Singapore,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2:
A leading global university centred in Asia, the National University of Singapore (NUS) offers a global approach to education and research, with a focus on Asian perspectives and expertise. It is driven by its mission to transform the way people think and do things through education, research and service. The NUS community is distinctively global with talented students and faculty from more than 100 countries. We invite dynamic and motivated individuals to be part of this vibrant hub which is dedicated to delivering quality education and undertaking research for the betterment of society.","
Job Description

AI Singapore (AISG) is a national AI programme launched by the National Research Foundation (NRF) to anchor deep national capabilities in Artificial Intelligence (AI). 

The programme office is hosted by the National University of Singapore (NUS) and brings together all Singapore-based research institutions and the vibrant ecosystem of AI start-ups and companies developing AI products to perform use-inspired research, grow the knowledge, create the tools, and develop the talent to power Singapore's AI efforts. 

The Software Engineer will be responsible for guiding and mentoring the AI Technology software engineering team.

Duties & Responsibilities 
-    Work with AI Singapore management as well as the project managers to define long-term priorities and resources for software engineering and data management.
-    Work with other Senior Engineers to organise the software engineering team most effectively to fulfil the priorities.
-    Develop and implement industry-standard best practices and processes for software development and data/document management 
-    Analyze technology and resource needs to plan and assess the feasibility of projects
-    Supervise data access policies and operations of related software/AI infrastructure
-    Lead and coordinate the architecture, design, planning and execution of software projects of the AI Technology team.
-    Provide guidance, training, and mentoring to junior software engineering staff.
 

Qualifications


-    A Bachelor's or Master's degree in computer science, computer engineering, or related discipline.
-    At least 3 years' experience in enterprise architecture, design patterns and implementation of AI, analytics, data management and/or cloud services.
-    Hands-on programming/implementation ability in Java, Python3, JavaScript (ReactJS).
-    Knowledge of professional software engineering practices & best practices for the full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations.
-    Knowledge of professional data management practices & best practices for the data life cycle.
-    Experience communicating with users, other technical teams, and senior management to collect requirements, describe software product features, technical designs, and product strategy.
-    Proven experience leading and mentoring software engineering teams.
-    Proven experience of managing multiple projects simultaneously.
-    Meticulous, strong coordination and organisation skills with an eye for detail.
-    Strong system-building skills and keen interests in working with emerging technologies and frameworks.
-    Must be a self-starter and able to work independently with minimum supervision.

Covid-19 Message

At NUS, the health and safety of our staff and students are one of our utmost priorities, and COVID-vaccination supports our commitment to ensure the safety of our community and to make NUS as safe and welcoming as possible. Many of our roles require a significant amount of physical interactions with students/staff/public members. Even for job roles that may be performed remotely, there will be instances where on-campus presences are required. 

In accordance with Singapore's legal requirements, unvaccinated workers will not be able to work on the NUS premises with effect from 15 January 2022. As such, job applicants will need to be fully COVID-19 vaccinated to secure successful employment with NUS.

More Information

Location: Kent Ridge Campus

Organization: Office of the Deputy President(Res&Tech)

Department : AI Singapore

Employee Referral Eligible: No

Job requisition ID : 13630

TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy.

TikTok is a global short-form mobile video platform that allows you to express yourself by creating content. It gives rise to engaging, interactive challenges and trending topics in which anyone can participate. ","

TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.

The Infrastructure NoSQL team supports all mid-platform and business lines in Tiktok, operating across tens of thousands of servers and dealing with data far beyond the PB level. We have self-developed distributed key-value/caching systems, globally distributed tables storage systems and massive graph database products. Combined with the industry's leading hardware and software stack technology, we strive for the continuous evolution of the next generation of NoSQL products.

You will be responsible for the technical research and development of our self-developed global distributed table system and open source HBase products. We are committed to building a globalized, high-performance, low-cost, and cloud native distributed table system to provide rich features for our applications.

Joining our team, you can expect to have a very structured and thorough training plan, as well as the opportunity to undertake a larger working scope whilst giving enough space to grow and develop your career. We look forward to your application.

Responsibilities

- Lead the team to build a globalized, high-performance, low-cost, and cloud native distributed table system, including but not limited to distributed table systemand HBase;

- Play a key role in driving project objectives and execution management, architecture design and code reviews, define long term technical roadmap for the team, and demonstrate technical leadership;

- Recruit, manage, mentor, and provide technical leadership for team of software engineers;

- Work closely with stakeholder teams to identify business pain points, continuously optimize and improve customer experience, team reputation, and impact.

Qualifications

Qualifications

- Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science or related fields;

- 6+ years of professional software development experience;

- Strong with C++/Golang/Java/Python program development (at least one), pursue high-quality code and focused on code engineering quality;

- Solid knowledge of Linux system, proficient in multi-threading, network programming, and distributed development in any programming language;

- In-depth understanding of storage principles, proficient in key technologies of distributed storage and computing, and have practical experience with them;

- Good communication skills, able to lead and drive projects effectively. Familiar with team and project management methodologies and approaches.

Preferred Qualifications

- Experience in technical management of a software engineering team;

- In-depth research and industry experience in large-scale distributed storage systems, such as HBase/Cassandra/TiDB/ScyllaDB/Aerospike, and storage engine design and deplementation, such as Rocksdb/Leveldb;

- Contributor/Committer or PMC of the open-source community is a plus.

Responsibilities
About TikTokTikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.
The TikTok Creator Marketplace is the official platform for brand and creator collaborations on TikTok under TikTok Creator Marketing Solutions. This role is part of the regional Growth Strategy function which drives overall health of the business as it scales product/services with GTM operations in the region, involving growth marketing, performance management, budgeting, strategic initiatives, and overall program management.
Responsibilities
  • Cultivate APAC content marketing strategy, across demand and supply on TikTok Creator Marketplace to champion acquisition, conversion and retention on-platform.
  • Drive localization with nuanced and contextualized original content: newsletters, case studies, and partner marketing material to drive client & creator enablement.
  • Define & roll-out channel specific measurement metrics to monitor content performance, and translate into clear and actionable insights to improve ROI on growth campaigns.
  • Program manage the narrative of global content strategy initiatives for APAC region for better go-to-market fit and maximized impact.
  • Articulate complex products and features into simple, compelling, easy-to-understand local narratives for client success; working closely with UX/Marketing/PR teams.
  • Manage APAC content calendar and coordinate posting schedule across 9 markets with alignment on TikTok's overall brand strategy.

Qualifications
  • Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Marketing, Journalism or similar discipline.
  • 3-5 years of copywriting experience in B2B and/or Digital Advertising environments with focus on content/social marketing.
  • Some experience working in Operations/Tech company across APAC markets will be preferred.
  • Editorial mindset with an ability to predict audience preferences across SEA, Korea and Japan markets while thriving amidst a certain degree of ambiguity.
  • Demonstrated ability to adapt writing to different formats such as web, mobile, email, social media (paid and organic), blog posts, video and help center articles.
  • Comfortable in leading and collaborating with cross-functional teams with effective communication to define goals, channel strategies, and key messaging.
  • Passion for creator economy, marketplace platforms, and project management to scale businesses.
  • Language proficiency in one or more Asian languages would be preferred.

Responsibilities

TikTok is the leading destination for short-form video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy.

Our Trust & Safety team's commitment is to keep our online community safe. We have invested heavily in human and machine-based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community.

The Trust & Safety Policy team develops and reviews our community policies to promote a positive and safe environment for all of our Users and Content Creators to enjoy and express themselves.

What will I be doing?

  • Identify safety risks in product feature domains, e.g. livestream, search, account, comment etc., and leverage policy solution to effectively address the risks
  • Collaborate with Product Policy, Global Public Policy, Product, Operations, Legal, and Public Relations teams to build consensus on global feature policies and processes
  • Streamline cross-functional workflow to optimize policy implementation
  • Provide prompt and professional input from the user safety perspective to support new product feature launches

Qualifications

What should I bring?

  • 2-5 years of experience in policy development, specifically regarding technology/internet/social media/content
  • Bachelors degree in public policy, politics, law, economics, communications, behavioral sciences or related field
  • Excellent oral and written communications with the ability to translate complex challenges into simple and clear language and persuade between multiple levels
  • Strong analytical reasoning, execution, project management and stakeholders management skills
  • Experience working with international partners across different time zones and cultures

Preferred Qualifications

  • Advanced degree in a related field
  • Experience working in the trust and safety industry for tech companies
  • Experience working on live-streaming, accounts, comments, or search related safety issues

TikTok is committed to the wellbeing of all our employees. Our promise is to provide comprehensive and evidence-based programs, to promote and support physical and mental wellbeing throughout each employee's journey with us. We believe that wellbeing is a relationship and that everyone has a part to play, so we work in collaboration and consultation with our employees and across our functions in order to ensure a truly person-centred, innovative and integrated approach.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

Good Doctor Technology(GDT) - a joint venture health-tech company between Ping An Health, Grab and Softbank which is on a mission to build the #1 digital health-tech ecosystem across Southeast Asia.

As part of our goal to deliver affordable healthcare to the masses, we provide AI assisted medical consultations, medication delivery and appointment bookings via an online platform, amongst other services.

We currently operate across Indonesia and Thailand, and are on track to expand into our 3rd country. Find out more about us at https://www.gooddoctor.health/.

*Ping An Health is China's largest digital health platform and is a subsidiary of Ping An, the world's largest insurer.

","

The Role:

Responsible of leading regional and local ops team to plan, architecture, design and monitor the network infrastructure topology and support all business critical IT support systems, ensure the system stability, scalability, performance, backup and disaster recovery.

Duties and Responsibilities:

  •  Regional network engineer – in charge of GDT Enterprise Network (Indonesia Office, Thailand Office, Alicloud, Huawei Cloud) and IDC network infrastructure topology (CDN/DNS/VPN/Routing) design, setup, implementation, coaching the local network infra team members and implement best traffic routing to gain the best speed for the daily core operation systems including doctor clinic network
  • IDC regional PIC – to be involved security projects includes ISO27001 & DLP, able to work with China infra and cloud ops team to analyse & review the IDC & office network security related requirements, translate (from Chinese to English) any existing documentations, consolidate the missing security points, and propose and lead the action plan and implementation across the platform dev, infra and IT ops team
  • Experienced IDC ops engineer, who can assist Tech manager, GDT management team, GDT financial team and China platform Infra team to work on the Alibaba cloud, Huawei cloud procurement process, including contract evaluation, tier pricing model estimation, pricing, and discount negotiation, help company to choose the best pricing model to support the core platform operation efficiently
  • Monitor, diagnose, and resolve complex network and computer system issues
  • Manage and administer servers, networks, and applications such as DNS, FTP and Web
  • Maintain internal network structure of a data centre by managing routers and keeping them running
  • Install, configure, and maintain switches, servers, firewalls, and hard drives
  • Troubleshoot network systems to identify and fix performance issues
  • Provide solutions to complex problems on the integration of various technologies
  • Design plans as well as lead initiatives for the optimization and restructuring of network architecture
  • Maintain an up-to-date knowledge of network administration and firmware integration
  • Monitor the environmental conditions of a data centre to ensure they are optimum for servers, routers, and other devices
  • Perform system repairs and update software/operating systems
  • Calibrate and monitor data centre servers to ensure efficient performance
  • Collaborate with IT handlers, sales, and data centre managers to develop action plan for improved operations
  • Conduct inspections on power and cooling systems to ensure they are operational and efficient
  • Organize the floor space that harbour data centre equipment to allow for easy accessibility
  • Resolve operational, infrastructure or hardware incidents in a data centre

Requirements:

  •  Bachelor / Master’s degree in information technology, computer science, computer systems engineering, electronic engineering or equivalent, with 5 – 8 years of experience in a Data Centre Operations / Data Centre Facilities Management role
  • Certification from IT companies e.g. Microsoft and Cisco Technologies preferred
  • Have proven track record in planning for Business Continuity Plans (BCP) and Disaster Recovery (DR) recovery processes
  • Capable to conduct tests to identify faults in server hardware and network systems
  • Work well with data centre support and sales managers to ensure smooth work operations
  • Efficient in completing job tasks within set time constraints

column1:
","
About ByteDance
Founded in 2012, ByteDance is a technology company operating a range of content platforms that inform, educate, entertain and inspire people across languages, cultures and geographies. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Douyin, Toutiao, Helo and Resso, ByteDance now has a portfolio of applications available in over 150 markets and 75 languages.
Join the Innovative BytePlus Team
As part of BytePlus, you'll help enterprise customers build what's next for their business. Leveraging Bytedance's cutting-edge technologies, we are devoted to developing innovative products and solutions to shape the future. We help our clients to focus on what truly matters. Centering on innovation and excellence, we create gamechanging solutions that help businesses to unleash their potential. You can help us to achieve our mission.
Key Requirements
We're looking for an enthusiastic digital marketing specialist with B2B experience. You'll support the marketing team in strengthening our digital capabilities, developing our annual strategy, and executing campaigns. The role requires a detail oriented, strategic thinker capable of developing solutions for complex problems. You'll be comfortable collaborating within a large team, identifying and connecting with the stakeholders that can help you to reach your goals.
Responsibilities
  • Develop and optimize our digital channels including SEO, SEM, and social media.
  • Contribute to the ongoing development of our website and all other digital properties.
  • Work with the broader marketing team to develop our annual strategy, providing suggestions for budget application and prioritization of channels.
  • Help to determine the tactical mix between email, digital advertising, SEO, social, and webinars.
  • Develop reports and dashboards to demonstrate the effectiveness and return from our campaigns.
  • Work with the web development team on landing pages to support acquisition and engagement marketing programs to successfully reach new customers and expand revenue growth within existing customer base
  • Oversee the execution of marketing automation, including the optimization of Salesforce. In conjunction with the broader marketing team, develop lead nurture programs using email and rich content to engage consumers.
  • Manage email deliveries, database hygiene, subscription management and compliance with data protection laws.

Qualifications
To be successful in this role, you have
  • 3+ years of experience in a digital marketing role within a tech and enterprise business.
  • Familiarity with common marketing platforms including Google Analytics, Google Ads, LinkedIn
  • Strong agility to adapt to and be effective in new situations in a highly dynamic environment.
  • Excellent communication skills, able to articulate digital marketing principles in a clear fashion.
  • Strong organizational, project management and communication skills, with demonstrable experience working cross-functionally with internal and external stakeholders
  • Demonstrable experience in leading end-to-end marketing campaign and programs. From planning to implementation, optimization, measurement and reporting;
  • Experience developing lead nurture campaigns, using marketing automation software.

Our client one of the world’s high-tech firm headquartered in Singapore. With their current expansion in APAC, they are looking for high calibre Compensation and Rewards Manager to join their fast-growing business who will be the key member of their APAC Compensation and Rewards team, responsible for supporting the design and delivery of compensation programs and policies for the region. This role will report into the Head of Total Rewards, APAC

Key responsibilities:

  • Serve as expert and provide advisory on all compensation matters for the region
  • Support the annual compensation review process including rewards modeling, administration, communications, and post-cycle analysis
  • Analyze our compensation data and create Tableau dashboards to come up with actionable insights to shape our compensation programs
  • Manage ongoing rewards activities including complex offers and relocations
  • Participate in annual rewards surveys, analyze and utilize the survey data to identify gaps and risks, and propose recommendations to address them
  • Support job grading and salary range structures in alignment with market benchmarks
  • Own and drive any compensation projects where required

Key requirements:

  • At least 5 years’ total rewards experience, with strong understanding of compensation market practices in technology industry across APAC
  • Strong collaboration and business partnering capabilities combined with demonstrated ability to influence
  • Familiarity with Tableau preferred
  • Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written
  • Excellent project management skills
  • Analytical mindset, data driven, a keen eye for detail

  • Innovative and creative problem solving and decision making

Next Steps

Apply today or contact us to discuss this exciting opportunity.

Do note that we will only be in touch if your application is shortlisted.

TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy.

TikTok is a global short-form mobile video platform that allows you to express yourself by creating content. It gives rise to engaging, interactive challenges and trending topics in which anyone can participate. TikTok aims to capture and showcase the world's creativity, knowledge, and moments that matter, directly from your mobile phone. TikTok has global offices in many cities, including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.

","

TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.

TikTok is looking around the world for the best and most dedicated employees. The C&B team works on a lot of interesting problems. Whether it is developing new world-class compensation policies, diving deep into market research, analyzing big data and benchmarking. The C&B team work on a lot of cool and exciting projects to come up with the best ways to serve our organization. Given the nature of our work, it also creates huge opportunities for collaboration with departments in and outside of the HR organization. We are seeking a CBP (Compensation, Benefits & Performance) Lead to cover the Asia Pacific Region for Tiktok, E-Commerce, R&D/AI and Corporate functions. Depending on the candidate's location, this role could be based in Singapore, India, or Indonesia.

- Partner with HR Business Partners & TAs to provide solutions for compensation and broader HR initiatives.

- Provide strategic and operational leadership in the design, implementation, administration, and communication of all compensation programs.

- Design and iterate compensation policies for all job families to ensure external competitiveness and internal equity, through research on compensation policies and practices of leading Tech companies, as well as internal data analysis.

- Monitor local regulations & legislation, and work closely with legal to make sure C&B policies comply with applicable local laws.

- Manage Performance Review and Promotion/Salary review projects for local teams: work closely with the central CBP team to create Performance Review and Promotion/Salary review policies; communicate policies to local HRBPs and coordinate with them to ensure smooth progress; collect local feedback, analyze actual data and work with the central CBP team to enhance policies, online portal functions and project management.

- Provide recommendations to business key stakeholders in tackling difficult cases in the area of compensation, incentive plans, benefits for employees motivation in order to achieve their business goals.

Qualifications

- 7 years+ of experience in Compensation, Benefits and Performance function as a COE

- BA/BS degree or equivalent years of HR-related experience is preferred.

- Strong analytical capabilities: Analyze trends, surveys, and spreadsheets to determine C&B strategies.

- Excellent communication skill: Be able to communicate effectively with employees, the broad HR team and business leads in the region

- Be adept in presenting programs and plans to employee groups, HR and leadership teams.

- Strong Ethics and Discretion: Deal with confidential information and therefore, must be ethical and discrete when it comes to handling sensitive information.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals should not be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too

ResponsibilitiesAbout ByteDanceFounded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.
About the team
Lark Suite is on a mission to deliver innovative and intuitive tools for workplace collaboration and creation. Our team is focused on going beyond standard workplace tools and creating new and innovative experiences to build a more seamless, delightful future of work.
We believe your work is shaped by the tools you use. Lark is the next-gen collaboration suite that integrates messaging, video conferencing, schedule management, collaborative documents, cloud storage, email, and workflow applications to provide a seamless collaboration experience on all your devices. This is a unique opportunity to be at the forefront of creating the foundation for our best-in-class enterprise collaboration suite and influence the make-up of the next generation of leaders that will shape the continued success of the team and company as a whole.
Responsibilities
  • Partner with your assigned business unit and ensure a deep understanding of business strategy and implement high-quality HR practices within the team.
  • Partner with the Talent Acquisition team to grow the Lark business through interviewing, onboarding, and evaluating candidates.
  • Coach and mentor business team-leaders to help build a strong community that will improve the development of the business.
  • Collaborate with stakeholders and leadership and provide HR guidance when appropriate; including staffing, talent development, performance management, and employee relations.
  • Be the ambassador for the Lark organizational culture as well as plan and implement activities to continue driving employee engagement.
  • Manage employee disciplinary issues and provide advice to business leaders on ways to manage each case.

Qualifications
Requirements
The ideal candidate will possess at least 8+ years of experience in HR, have proven track of record working with multi-cultural teams and being able to navigate globally.
  • 8+ years of HRBP experience in hi-tech or SaaS industry is preferred.
  • Bachelor's degree or above is required.
  • Experience of helping global organizations scale.
  • Experience in project management, change management, culture transformations and independent program driving.
  • Comprehensive HR knowledge, especially hands-on experience in employee relations, performance management and employee development.
  • Candidate should have expertise in local labor law and regulations.
  • Ability to multi-task and to work through complexities in an ever changing and high growth business environment.
  • Self-driven and highly motivated for original thinking as well as continuous improvement.

ByteDance is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At ByteDance, our mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

About the Client
South Asia's leading Ecommerce platform operating an ecosystem of ~70,000 sellers serving 30 million active users (MAU) with more than 50 million listed products.

Job Description:
 
We are looking for a Regional Ops Strategy & Planning – Project Manager with prior experience in logistics and/or supply chain operations. You should be a subject matter expert in strategic development and performance analysis and utilize your specialized skills to maintain and improve regional Daraz Operations’ performance as the business scales. You should be able to thrive in a fast-paced environment, have a strong process improvement aptitude, and be willing to dive into any problem to independently find a solution.
 
Responsibilities:
  • Work cross-functionally with operations, commercial, and marketing and logistics teams, to identify new business drivers and opportunities. Conduct feasibility analyses on these channels, and determine alignment with overall business strategic goals
  • Perform targeted analyses to identify issue root causes when performance targets are not met, including lead-times, gross to net margins, shipping recovery rates, etc.
  • Devise strategies and develop tools to assist business teams in reaching performance goals and agreed targets
  • Work with business teams to implement these tools and strategies via end-to-end projects with clear scope, milestones, and success criteria
  • Design a framework for assessing the viability and monitoring the success of technology improvement projects
  • Liaise with a team of business analysts, report to the Regional Head of Strategy and Planning for Operations
Qualifications:
  • BA/BSc degree with outstanding results from a top university in Business, Economics or STEM subjects
  • 3+ years in ecommerce, consulting or logistics industries, with 2-3 years of data analytics experience
  • Proven track record of consulting, project management, operations management or change management
  • Problem solving attitude and ability to manage tasks independently, know how to manage priorities and work with short times
  • Demonstrated ability and dynamic personality to handle changing environments, multiple tasks, to prioritize those tasks and meet deadlines
  • Self-driven and able to work in a team, proactive on the job with full commitment to timeline
  • Adaptive to changing scope and evolving business environments
  • Mature and able to learn and grow continuously, especially within a fast-paced environment
What we offer:
  • International working environment in a start-up setting, and a unique opportunity to learn from the best in e-commerce (Alibaba Group) and business growth.
  • A platform to learn from Alibaba’s world-leading ecosystem
  • Rigorous training and exposure in team management, leadership, business analytics, and operations.
  • An opportunity to train the next generation of business leaders in the ‘tech’ industry.
  • Competitive salary and incentive package
  • Health & life insurance
  • Relocation support (if applicable)
Interested to Apply?
If you are keen to hear more about this role, please send your updated word format resume to Cavan Quah via ''Apply Now''.

<div>
What do we do

Coda Payments (https://www.codapay.com/) helps Google, Tencent, and other leading digital content providers monetise their products in places where credit and debit cards aren’t widely used. We establish partnerships with a wide range of alternative payment channel operators who make it possible for customers to pay in other ways: paying cash at retail, using a mobile wallet, making a bank transfer, or redeeming a prepaid card.
Coda also allows publishers to accept payments through these various methods on their own website or at our gaming e-commerce site - codashop.com.

","Requirements:
  • Support the Group Privacy Officer in developing and maintaining global privacy policies and procedures and ensure data protection by design and default
  • Together with the Group Privacy Officer, review and strengthen the data privacy control framework and scale up the data privacy compliance program
  • Coordinate and build relationships with privacy champions in all business functions (Marketing, Business Development, Customer Support, Data Analytics, HR, Product, etc.) across multiple jurisdictions to make sure business line privacy concerns are addressed and required support is provided in a timely manner
  • Manage multiple data privacy and protection related projects and ensure timely and smooth execution
  • Carry out Transfer Impact Assessments (TIAs), manage multiple Data Protection Impact Assessments (DPIAs) and product privacy reviews
  • Coordinate the registrations and compliance with various national data protection authorities and take responsibility for assigned region/countries as the designated Data Protection Officer (DPO)
  • Work to ensure that data protection and relevant best practices are fully integrated into the compliance framework of the business
Requirements:

It gives rise to engaging, interactive challenges and trending topics in which anyone can participate. TikTok aims to capture and showcase the world's creativity, knowledge, and moments that matter, directly from your mobile phone. TikTok has global offices in many cities, including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.

","

Responsibilities

TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, Dublin, London Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.

The global Monetization Integrity team ensures TikTok users have a safe experience while viewing advertisements. They work closely with advertisers to create ad policies, manage content review processes, and more. As we continue to add advertising on TikTok, this team is critical in assuring a joyful and creative ads experience for the community.

Workforce Management (WFM) 's primary task is to provide the human capacity solution to support Monetization Integrity development requirements, ensure business success with contingent labor, and deliver committed Service Level Agreement with whole lifecycle management including forecasting, planning, scheduling, and real-time analysis. This is a regional leadership role, managing a team of EMEA Workforce Management RTAs, Schedulers and Capacity Planners.

Main Responsibilities

  • Lead and manage a team of Workforce Management Specialists and Analysts, providing ongoing development and management of the team.
  • Administer workforce management; encompassing all the processes that Monetization Integrity Operations sites undertake.
  • Ensure teams have prepared for the right number of staff available at the right time.
  • Create data models to forecast long/short term business volume, set up multi-dimension capacity models & plans and determine the optimum one by balancing customer experience, employee experience and cost effectiveness, contributing to consistently achieved SLA goals.
  • Design different shifts for the sites and make schedule plan ensuring no violation of local labor laws and regulations; manage day-to-day production of sites, closely coordinate with operation team and adjust shift plan quickly and effectively, in case of unexpected rises in moderation volumes or absenteeism.
  • Be responsible for monitoring operational performance for sites to ensure optimum productivity and results, evaluate schedules to meet incoming volumes, and evaluate potential productivity, quality and customer-service standards by analyzing performance statistics and financial results.
  • Set objectives with team members that enable achievement of department and functional goals.
  • Drive continuous improvement of WFM processes/tool/system including, streamlining & optimizing forecast & adjustment processes cross departments, supporting system/tool development & improvement, updating relevant databases, assuring data integrity, etc.
  • Work as the Point of Contact to provide ad-hoc and regular support to stakeholders such as Policy team, Product team, Operation team and etc.

Qualifications

  • Experience leading a WFM (workforce management) team.
  • Extensive experience in workforce management or capacity planning in a multi-channel & multi-site tech or media company. Ads or content moderation industry experience is a plus.
  • Deep understanding of workforce management, including volume & headcount forecasting, shift plans scheduling, performance monitoring and processes/system optimizing and etc.
  • Proficient skills on EXCEL and good at data analyzing, familiar with formulas and Pivot Tables. Experience utilizing SQL, HQL and WFM systems is a plus.
  • Good communication skills, information analysis & capability to interpret data (able to succinctly present detailed technical analysis, assumptions, and recommendations).
  • Excellent problem-solving, task prioritization, follow-up, and quick learning skills. Able to work in a fast-paced, high-pressure environment with dedication, passion and motivation.
  • Expertise in project management and coordination.
  • Fluent written and spoken English. Additional language is a plus.
  • Bachelor's Degree or equivalent education/experience. Advanced degree is preferred.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals should not be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

column1:
","
Job Description

AVP, Data Translator, IBG Data Centre of Excellence, Institutional Banking Group - (WD30549)

Business Function
The Institutional Banking Group’s (IBG) Data Centre of Excellence (Data CoE) team is committed to building a data driven organization and maximising the key data capabilities to transform how IBG does business. Data impacts IBG’s businesses every day, and a culture of relentlessly using data and business intelligence will enable IBG to achieve exponential growth.
Responsibilities
  • Serve as the subject matter expert in data analytics including predictive analytics, descriptive analytics, data visualization, and offering the full spectrum of fit-for-purpose solutions to solve business problems
  • Understand the job to be done, propose suitable solutions, and where required to challenge status quo of what analytics can do to deliver value. Work closely with cross functional teams involving relationship managers, technology teams, data scientists and product managers.
  • Drive projects and experiments to completion with little supervision in ambiguous and frequently- changing environment.
  • Assist in identification & exploration of requisite data – evaluating feasibility, extracting knowledge and actionable insights from massive datasets
  • Planning, developing, and implementing the data analytics models by working closely with Data scientists, technology teams, business users and product teams
  • Anticipating problems before they occur; defining the problem; identifying possible causes; working with team to identify solutions; selecting and implementing most appropriate solution
  • Developing and executing on project plans; identifying schedules, specifications, risks, and contingency plan.
  • Keeping up to date with analytics techniques and technologies
Requirements
  • Team player with good business analysis skills, i.e., interpreting business needs and translating that into analytics requirements
  • Experience working with technology teams, data scientists, managing development and deployment of data analytics projects into production environment
  • Keen understanding of data science and machine learning techniques
  • Storytelling with data: ability to clearly deliver data findings to non tech audiences
  • Self-motivated with can-do attitude and the fortitude to be comfortable in ambiguous and  complex situations
  • Competencies in data manipulation tools (e.g. SQL, python etc) and reporting tools (e.g. QlikView, Tableau etc)
Apply Now
We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

column3: At ST Engineering, our purpose is to apply our technology and innovation to solve real-world problems and improve lives. Our dedication to excellence and our strong track record have earned us a distinctive reputation for quality and trust as a global technology, defence and engineering group. Our diverse portfolio of businesses spans the aerospace, smart city, defence and public security segments.

We succeed because of our ability to deliver what our partners and customers need. Together, we transform and future-proof cities to make them more mobile, more secure and more liveable for communities. With our expertise and facilities around the world, we keep aircraft flying safely and seagoing vessels operating efficiently.

We help nations protect their citizens by meeting their air, land and sea defence needs and equipping their fighting forces to perform on the battlefield. Our cybersecurity and critical systems help our customers enforce public and homeland security in an increasingly digital world. And our satellite communications equipment contribute to much of the world’s network connectivity.

column1:
","
The Advisory team within the Group Engineering Centre in ST Engineering provides analytics consulting services to our internal customers and also assists in projects with external customers.
We are looking for a data analyst with keen data analysis skills and ability to build rapport with customers. The analyst will primarily be involved in fundamental data warehousing and Business Intelligence projects, with the chance to work with data scientists on predictive and prescriptive analytics projects.
The candidate must be able to work in a fast paced environment and have a passion for identifying analytics business value, surfacing out insights from data and relating them to business operations and KPIs. He/She will work with data scientists, data engineers, project managers, and business stakeholders as part of every analytics engagement.
The ideal candidate will thrive in a work environment that requires strong problem-solving skills, self-motivation, and an aptitude for team collaboration and open communication.
Requirements
- Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in computer science, computer engineering, information systems or even related quantitative fields like economics & statistics.
- Good understanding of end-to-end analytics process – ideation/value elicitation, requirements definition, data profiling, analytical modelling, testing, validation, visualization, and deployment
- Good understanding of Data Warehousing, Business Intelligence, Visualization tech & concepts
- Familiar with SQL (any flavour), Python, Spark, Java, or C
- Able to design ETL pipelines and create visually intuitive dashboards
- Familiarity with visualization tools like Tableau, Qlikview, QlikSense, PowerBI, Microstrategy
- Willing and enthusiastic about continuous learning of new technologies and data science techniques/breakthroughs
- Effective oral and written communication with strong analytical, problem solving, multitasking, time management, and project management skills
- Candidates with no experience but with the relevant discipline may apply

column1:
","

Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.

Summary

You will be part of Digital and Data (DDDOM) team in the DBS Corporate Real Estate unit (CRESA). This role will support the Data Lead in a deputy role, to oversee and guide the wider team, supporting the team in driving key analytical projects and outcomes. This is a role that span four domains of skills: business knowledge/acumen, statistical/mathematical reasoning, programming and managerial skills.

Responsibilities:

  • Lead a team of Data Analysts and Tableau Developer to work in a cross-functional AGILE manner with stakeholders in defining problem statements, collecting data and building analytical models to make suitable recommendations to drive business targets

  • Overseeing team's data applications, infrastructure and pipeline

  • Partnering working teams closely to design experiments through use of data and iterate towards the targeted business outcomes

  • Effectively bridge the gap between business needs and data science capabilities - to identify areas of opportunities, leveraging on real-time analytics to shape stronger intervention strategies in achieving our digital outcomes

  • Provide thought leadership based on current business and industry trends in advanced analytics, and to scale the team's data science and modelling capabilities

  • Lead the team to apply statistical approaches and proactively identify meaningful insights through exploratory data analysis, and to present/share results of the data analysis with the squad members in an easily digestible format

  • Work with stakeholders to measure and report on business outcomes; routinely communicate findings, trends, recommendations and other key indicators to leadership

  • Design and build automated reporting dashboards on our data visualization platforms

  • Elevate data literacy within CRESA, and data science knowledge within DDDOM

  • Champion for responsible use of data (RDU) within CRESA

  • Collaborate and support with finance team on annual finance budgeting exercise 

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Business Analytics, or equivalent quantitative fields preferred

  • Strong mathematical and statistics background

  • Preferably with minimum 6-8 years of experience in a business/data analyst function or in building statistical data model sets

  • End to end data science workflow experience, starting from data extraction, wrangling, modelling and deployment in production environment

  • Proficient in Talend, Tableau with strong working experience in Python, SQL, Hadoop eco-system (Hive, HDFS, Pig etc.)

  • Good to have related experience in process improvements, AGILE methodologies, project management and leading change management

  • Business knowledge or prior experience in banking and/or real estate industry would be advantageous

  • Experience in delivering complex initiatives working with both cross functional stakeholders across business and tech team

  • Self-starter, good communication and presentation skill

Apply Now

We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

column1:
","
Associate / Analyst, Digital Service Delivery - Quality Assurance, Consumer Banking Group - (WD27163)
Business Function
  • Digital revolutions are set to change the way we live, work and play. That’s why we’ve spared no effort in ensuring we are at the forefront of this new generation.
  • Our new digital banking initiative will focus on creating innovative products and services to integrate banking into our customers' digital lifestyle.
  • In our team at regional product delivery, we collaborate with a cross functional team of experts from product managers, analytics, design, engineering, quality assurance to user enablement.
  • We provide insights with our strong domain knowledge, expertise in end to end project execution cycles and strength in quality assurance to turn requirements into output.
  • Our digital product delivery execution cut across the different digital channels which include internet banking for both desktop browser and mobile app, secured web, Chatbot, Paylah! app, intelligent banking, SMS banking to Wealth services.
  • We understand requirements from product managers, translate them to user story and acceptance criteria and slice them into executable scenarios using our behavioural driven design framework for execution post development by our technology team. Post that we will execute the end to end user acceptance test to validate the quality via our manual or automation tools before release to market.
  • The delivery of these highly complex and sophisticated banking solutions requires a capable and highly motivated individual who excel in stakeholder engagements and familiar with project management to deliver successful outcomes for the organisation.
  • As the bank continue to grow and invest in digital platform and increasing our digital suite of services, testing scope have expanded, platform have become more complex thus there need to have more creative and sustainable way of ensuring that our services delivered , both old and new remain robust and make banking invisible and joyful to our customers.
  • As a specialist in quality assurance delivery, you are part of a core team that focus on the end to end cycle of quality assurance in the user acceptance cycle, besides execution with our manual and automation tools, you will also work with team to identify opportunities to improve and drive efficiency in productivity and quality management in the projects that we execute
Responsibilities
  • Responsible for end to end execution of the overall test strategy developed collectively with the product owner from user story acceptance criteria, JBehave writing, execution of testing and defects management to live verification support.
  • Expected to be an expert in banking domain and able to write test plan and testing summary documents. To write and execute end to end test scenarios with detailed steps as per requirements either via manual or automation testing.
  • Actively participate and collaborate in project meetings and discussions, keen attention to details and time management to ensure quality and timely output of project assigned.
  • Execute the assigned manual or automation testing, log defects and follow up on defects to ensure timely closure. Generate reports of testing, prepare training slides for touchpoints, and required update to delivery
  • Design, develop, execute, and maintain test scenarios and detailed end to end test cases for the assigned projects relating to the digital platform’s user acceptance testing.
  • Able to write test cases in JBehave for agile projects.
  • Expert in using testing tools such as JIRA, Confluence etc to execute and maintain project status.
  • Knowledge of web and mobile application testing in banking domain, with good time management and keen eye for details to ensure quality and timely output
  • Detect, report and track defects in the application tools and with various stakeholders to ensure proper closure of issues.
  • Collaborate with all stakeholders proactive to complete job assigned from clarification to issue closure.
  • Good with documentation as constant update to project changes will need to be updated timely
Requirements
  • Minimum 1 years’ experience in web and mobile application testing in the banking industry is preferred.
  • Strong analytic skills to process complex requirement to come up with end to end scenarios and test cases
  • Familiar with Agile and waterfall methodology, and understand the life cycle of testing in both automated and manual testing
  • Have experience in running or being part of an agile project team in banking industry and have had hands on experience on JBehave
  • Understanding Java and VB Scripting will be an advantage
  • Experience with Quality assurance processes and tools including HP ALM, JIRA is a must
  • Good stakeholder engagement skills with strong verbal and written communication is required as will need to collaborate closely across multiple teams during project execution
  • Good team player with strong organizational skills and can work independently with minimum guidance
  • Tech Skills Preferred
  • Strong knowledge in automation testing and testing life cycle and methodologies.
  • Experience with Quality assurance processes and tools including HP ALM, JIRA and JBehave
  • Skills (Non-Technical)
  • Must have resilience and the ability to work well under pressure with minimum guidance
  • Quick learner, adaptable to changes on project needs and good team player who take initiative to help team to complete assigned task
  • Strong working knowledge of SDLC practices and procedures.
  • Ability to handle multiple concurrent activities and projects
  • Strong communication skills as need to interaction closely with various stakeholders from product, delivery lead to technical counterparts across other applications and countries.
Apply Now
We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

","
The Senior Electrical Engineer assists and reports to the Head, Technical / Mechanical / Manager in the day to day product development research and testing activities including document its processes documentation.
Design electronic components, software, products, or systems for commercial, FMCG products and its applications. The person will design, plan, test and develop applications, modifications for electronic properties used in parts and systems to improve technical performance as well as supervising production process in ensuring its performance and quality.
Incumbent assist and responsible for the planning and coordination of the entire production process from managing staffing, coaching and training, scheduling production runs, ensure adequate materials are available, and ensuring electrical components are in good working condition in supporting of demand/delivery schedules.
Responsibilities and Duties
• Develop state of the art products for current and new market segments.
• Electronics engineering to translate product requirements into hardware design.
• Seamless transition of products from design to manufacturing.
• Sound knowledge on EE Hardware and Software design and development process.
o Hardware (PCBA)
 Schematic/PCBA design verification
 Gerber release, PCB fabrication, PCBA build
 Board bring up, test, debug, and fixes
 Safety and regulatory agencies certification
 BOM, reports, documentation, and files releases
 Familiar with Altium Designer will be added advantage
 
o Software (Firmware)
 Development of embedded software development and real time control systems.
 Engage in test driven firmware development.
 Create, design, and develop test specifications for new systems software.
 Conduct testing, including testing firmware/hardware interactions on the device system level.
 Familiar with firmware development for embedded hardware platforms (Arduino, ESP-IDF, ARM32/64) will be added advantage.
• Develops manufacturing processes by designing and modifying equipment and components
• Building and assembling electrical components; soliciting observations during production
• Assures product quality by designing electrical testing methods, testing finished products and products capabilities and customers users experience
• Prepares product reports by collecting, analysing, and summarizing information and trends
• Provides engineering information and solutions for devices.
• Maintains product and company reputation by complying with federal and state regulations
• Established procedures; to end user for requesting repair services
• Completes projects by providing training and guidance to technicians
• Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
• Able to adopt a philosophy of continual improvement and constantly identify/propose higher efficiency and increase the quality of the finished product.
• Ability to troubleshoot any problems that occur in the production process.
Qualifications & Requirements
• Minimum Bachelor of Science in Electrical / Electronic Engineering, or an equivalent Diploma with relevant experience.
• Minimum 3 years of schematic design and PCB layout.
• Experience in designing electronic components, integrated circuitry and algorithms. Board design in R&D environment will    be added advantages.
• Experience with electromechanical, thermal and power management is preferred.
• Experience with software/firmware programming, design specification and requirements and verification and validation.
• Project Management, Quality Focus, Database Design, analysing information etc.
• Efficiency in reporting research results, attentive to detail, emphasizing excellence in Innovation.
• Strong Analytical and problem-solving skills.

414,tech project manager,/en/job/sg-product-manager-investment-focused-9360318,9360318,SG - Product Manager (Investment Focused),False,False,,,SGD,Stashaway,23-Mar-22,False,,,201624878Z,,,201 - 500 Employees,,,"<div>
<div>

column2: With a strong team of over 200 employees, we’re here to empower people to build long-term wealth.

column1: <div>

column2: We pride on having a rewarding, diverse, and cooperative growth environment. Some of the perks that our employees enjoy include flexible working hours, medical insurance coverage and an unlimited annual leave policy.

column1: <div>

column2:
We’re more than just another investment app. With over 50 years of combined experience in the finance and tech industries, our founders came together and built a team, now more than 200 employees strong, to make curated, cost-efficient investments possible across the region.","

Responsibilities

  • Understand customer needs and industry trends, plan StashAway’s investment product strategy and roadmap, and manage the prioritization and delivery of new investment products in different markets.
  • Transform business requirements into feasible product offerings and priorities.
  • Lead project management, focusing on resource and timeline management. Establish clear milestones with visible progress regularly, with emphasis on quick iterations.
  • Balance business impact, technical feasibility, user experience, and implementation schedules.
  • Analyze product performance data and collect user feedback to optimize user experience.
REQUIREMENTS

Must-haves

  • Tertiary education with a strong academic track record in the related disciplines of Banking and Finance, Economics, Mathematics and Accounting.
  • 2-5 years of working experience in product management, or a related role, preferably in a tech startup.
  • Knowledge across both traditional asset classes in investing such as equities, fixed income, real estate, as well as alternative/emerging assets classes such PE, VC, crypto, art and other collectables.
  • Self-driven, highly motivated and able to work as a team player.
  • Strong organizational / business evaluation and problem solving skills.
  • Accuracy and attention to detail.
  • Excellent interpersonal skills and ability to develop strong working relationships across functional and geographical teams.

Good-to-haves

  • Some understanding of various backend and frontend technologies.
  • A financial planning background and/or CFA and FRM certificates are bonus points.

Benefits

  • Employee financial and physical well-being
  • Compensation package: you will receive a competitive total compensation package that includes employee stock options if you are a full-time employee.
  • Personalized insurance and comprehensive health coverage: full or partial subsidy of your personal hospitalization and surgical insurance premium and access to panel outpatient GP, specialist, dental, wellness, and health screening partners.
  • Expatriate Pension Fund (ExPF): this employer-matching plan is made available via Stash Away Work Place if you are a full-time or intern expatriate employed with our Singapore office.
  • Management fee discount: you will receive an employee discount on your asset management fees when you invest with Stash Away. 

  • Flexible work arrangements and policies
  • Work-from-home policy: you may choose to work from home or the office depending on what works best for you and your team.
  • Work-from-anywhere policy: you may request to work remotely for up to eight weeks in another country.
  • Unlimited paid annual leave: it should be simple for you to decide if you would like to take more or fewer days off. We trust that you are accountable for your work and know best if you need 10 or 30 days of paid annual leave that year.
  • Personal work equipment budget: it’s important that you have a workstation that’s optimal for you wherever you are. 
  • Learning and development opportunities
  • Annual L&D budget: you will be given a SGD 1,000 budget to help you continuously learn in your pursuit of your professional and personal development. You may use the budget for resources and tools that may help you perform better at work. 
  • Team bonding budget and initiatives
  • Quarterly team bonding budget: we encourage you to socialize with colleagues across job functions, departments, and entities to know them better as individuals beyond what they professionally do.
  • Bi-annual off-sites (once in Apr and Oct): each off-site gathers all employees for a full day of company-wide team bonding activities and challenges.

column1: 415,tech project manager,/en/job/svp-vp-enterprise-agile-coach-%7C-transformation-group-wd20174-%7C-9412390,9412390,"SVP / VP, Enterprise Agile Coach | Transformation Group (WD20174) |",False,False,,,SGD,DBS Bank Limited,25-Mar-22,False,,,196800306E,,,More than 5000 Employees,,singapore,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: DBS is a leading financial services group in Asia, with over 280 branches across 18 markets. Headquartered and listed in Singapore, DBS has a growing presence in the three key Asian axes of growth: Greater China, Southeast Asia and South Asia. The bank's ""AA-"" and ""Aa1"" credit ratings are among the highest in the world.

column3: DBS is at the forefront of leveraging digital technology to shape the future of banking, and has been named “World’s Best Digital Bank” by Euromoney in 2016 and 2018. The bank has also been recognised for its leadership in the region, having been named “Asia’s Best Bank” by several publications including The Banker, Global Finance, IFR Asia and Euromoney since 2012. In addition, the bank has been named “Safest Bank in Asia” by Global Finance for nine consecutive years from 2009 to 2017.

DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, and positively impacting communities through supporting social enterprises, as it banks the Asian way. It has also established a SGD 50 million foundation to strengthen its corporate social responsibility efforts in Singapore and across Asia.

With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. The bank acknowledges the passion, commitment and can-do spirit in all of its 26,000 staff, representing over 40 nationalities.

column1:
","
About the Transformation Group
Here at the DBS Transformation Group, we focus on nurturing the culture of the 'World's Best Bank' (Euromoney 2018, 2019 and 2020). Our approach is a combination of both science and art. We immerse our stakeholders in the world of design thinking and experimentation, drive rigorous creativity along our innovation pipeline, and build connections between corporate entrepreneurs and start-ups. We are a cross-disciplinary team focused on the invention of solutions that will radically improve the way people live, work and play.  We are passionate and committed to making banking joyful (while having lots of fun)!
Job Purpose
As the Enterprise Agile Coach, you will have a proven track-record of transforming large enterprises (both Business and IT) to adopt Agile and enable a continuous flow of value by embedding Agile friendly operating models and supporting enablers (e.g. Agile demand management & funding).You will be comfortable with dealing with C-level stakeholders to articulate, influence and coach how we build, and the way we build to address organisational challenges and pain points.In an effort to help deliver business value faster through expert timely intervention and capability development, the role is to enable teams to high performance across the platforms and solve problems using DBS Agile Way of Working by removing systemic blockers.
Key Accountabilities
The position is accountable for driving enterprise agility through org design, the uplifting capability of the DBS group teams in Agile values, principles and practices for the planning and execution of business value in relation to coaching, mentoring & educating and has the following accountabilities:Being a trusted advisor to senior management:
  • Coach and develop all levels of staff on how to implement and sustain the Agile principles & practices
  • Lead by example and seen as a role model of Agile values, principles and practices
  • Establish a position as an expert in delivery that cultivates business value & risk mitigation
  • Engage senior management and promote business strategies and solutions which drive an Agile culture and make value visible
  • Leverage DBS Group resources to develop a robust-closed-loop policy / strategy deployment process that will strengthen the understanding of strategic direction and provide the goals required to cultivate a business value driven culture
Execute the Divisional execution of Platform (IT & Business) strategy for customer  & employee benefit
  • Plan an approach to incorporate Agile WoW the strategic oversight of the customers' technology investment and assets
  • Collaborate to ensure engagement and support for Agile strategy
  • Work closely with other divisions (e.g. Technology, Finance, Risk etc,) to deliver quality outcomes
  • Demonstrate a high level of strategic and tactical business acumen and industry knowledge in order to facilitate solution development taking into account expertise in Agile and other related disciplines.
  • Cultivate 'how' to be value-driven and flexible in the way we think and behave - not just 'do' such us stand ups  and iterations
Implement the Divisional strategy
  • Provide thought leadership to ensure successful design and implementation of delivery strategies that align with business unit, corporate goals and strategies
  • Provide coaching advice to leaders at all levels in analysing business value and delivering well considered solutions
  • Act as a trusted adviser to the business by driving innovative thinking with uncertainty & complex bodies of work
  • Collaborate with other Divisions to ensure long term alignment to enterprise strategy
Planning and Monitoring
  • Collaborate with internal business customers and IT departments to ensure engagement and support for strategies
  • Illustrate why Agile is in line with the nature of knowledge work by highlighting day to day inefficiencies that result from applying traditional mind-set to knowledge work
  • Support the business in identification of business benefit and value, tangible and intangible, for initiatives raised.
  • Work with leadership teams to gather business data, perform business analysis and identify key drivers for success
  • Drive efficiencies within DBS through proactive sponsorship of improvement initiatives
  • Balance between the needs of classical project management like answering the question 'What will I get, when and for how much 'without jeopardising the agility of the project and its ability to welcome change
Develop the capability of others through effective mentoring, coaching, professional development
  • Develop a culture that supports team engagement and high performance
  • Deliver Just In Time training on Agile to DBS employees at all levels
  • Develop and deliver Job Instruction Training (using the Tell - Show - Do method) to other Agile practitioners within DBS (including partners)
  • Provide coaching, mentoring and professional development opportunities for those being coached and mentored on Agile WoW
  • Teach organisation to understand the difference between the Agile mindset ('Being Agile) and Agile Practices ('Doing Agile') and the characteristics needed in individuals, teams and organisations to embrace, promote & manifest the mindset of agility
  • Create a team environment which is seen as an attractive career destination for internal and external candidates
  • Support internal Guilds/Community of Practices
Job Duties & Responsibilities
  • Develop and define enterprise business agility roadmap, set the business agility agenda and implementation plan with clear business outcomes, e.g., business value delivery and time to market
  • Define and implement metrics and performance indicators around business agility that will drive the success of the initiative
  • Engage senior management and stakeholders to secure buy-in and support for business agility agenda and participate in forums to propagate and promote business agility
  • Bridge business and technology by building a business agility culture that unifies, manages and resolves conflicts
  • Understand enterprise technology landscape and drive business agility agenda that leverages on tech partnership
  • Provide insight and guidance on enterprise/portfolio/project tech strategy that will support business agility agenda
  • Identify and manage issues and risks, escalate issues as needed, and provide regular progress updates to senior management
Required Experience
  • You will have a track-record of establishing the models for commercials, governance, funding, organisational change and underlying delivery organisation, necessary to achieve an effective Agile enterprise;
  • Proven hands on experience working with Agile & Lean Software development practices, and change management are essential i.e. able to do what you teach/coach others;
  • At least  years' experience in Agile Coaching roles, where you have transformed from traditional ways-of-working, and/ or recovered a troubled Agile transformation at the enterprise level;
  • At least 7 years' experience in Agile software development methodologies, values, principles and practices;
  • At least 7 years' experience in coaching, team building and group facilitation
  • At least 7 years' experience in Scrum, SAFE, DevOps, Kanban, Lean and of Systems Thinking;
  • Strong customer focus: skilled ability to interpret and analyse customer requirements; influence design solutions in-line with Corporate and IT strategy; utilise established internal and external networks to promote innovative solutions for customers;
  • Strong people leadership experience and a proven track record in leading high performing teams;
  • Excellent presentation and written communication skills;
  • Expert relationship management skills; ability to communicate well with diverse stakeholder groups through internal consultation & facilitation;
  • Ability to work independently;
  • Skilled ability to contribute to and understand strategic perspectives, and translate to tactical actions;
  • Flexibility and resilience in responding to multiple changing priorities, and comfortable handling complexity and uncertainty;
  • Systematic and disciplined approach to planning, organising, decision making and delegation;
  • Skilled ability to work in a dynamic leadership team, contributing to the overall goals of the group;
  • Skilled ability to perform synthesis and analysis working at the conceptual level for problem solving.
Essential Qualifications:
  • University degree in Business, Information Technology or related discipline (Mandatory) or equivalent industry related experience
  • Certified Scrum Master (CSM)
Desired Qualifications:
  • Industry Association or Discipline Association Membership well regarded.
  • ICAgile certification
Apply Now
We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognizes your achievements
