column2: We’re JLL. We’re a professional services and investment management firm specializing in real estate. We help organizations around the world achieve their ambitions by owning, occupying and investing in real estate.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: We’re a Fortune 500 company. We work across 80 countries, in 280 different offices, with a team of over 77,000 individuals. And we look after a property portfolio of over 4bn square feet, all on behalf of our clients.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2:
If you’re looking to step up your career, JLL is the perfect professional home. At JLL, you’ll have a chance to innovate with the world’s leading businesses, put that expertise into action on landmark projects, and work on game-changing real estate initiatives. You’ll also make long-lasting professional connections through sharing different perspectives, and you’ll be inspired by the best. We’re focused on opportunity and want to help you make the most of yours. Achieve your ambitions – join us at JLL!","
Responsibilities:
  • Reporting to site lead
  • Build relation with client
  • Lead a team of technicians and provides technical support to operations team in solving equipment maintenance related issues.
  • Ensures that all facility equipment is well maintained, no overdue PM and calibration, equipment down time is minimized, equipment utilization is optimized and appropriate safety procedures are carried out.
  • Conducts root cause analysis on process and equipment maintenance related issues and ensures that corrective and preventive actions are successfully implemented within the given timeframe.
  • Involves in plant assets management, calibration supplier control, calibration and preventive maintenance scheduling, job plans and work order tracking.
  • Ensures that all equipment spares and consumable parts are adequate to support manufacturing operations.
  • Lead and drives Lean, Six Sigma, Total Productive Maintenance, Business Excellent projects to minimize waste, reduce product defects, cost reductions and equipment maintenance enhancement.
  • Manages projects and supports equipment installation qualification and revalidation activities.
  • Ensures that technicians are trained and proficiently supporting manufacturing according to updated SOPs and adhere to GMP, GDP and safety requirements.
  • Adhere to all EHS rules, regulations and risk assessments and take adequate control measures in preventing injuries to themselves and others as well as prevention of pollution to the environment
  • Strong technical background on equipment maintenance, equipment enhancement and troubleshooting
  • Experience in equipment and instrumentation
  • Familiar with Clean room requirements
  • Experience in HVAC system
  • Substantial understanding of processes and equipment used in assigned work. Knowledge in continuous improvement to improve/streamline process and equipment
  • Basic understanding of statistical techniques
  • Experience in project management
  • Strong problem-solving, organizational, analytical and critical thinking skills
  • Strong documentation, communication (e.g., written and verbal) and interpersonal relationship skills including consultative and relationship management skills
  • Good leadership skills and ability to influence change
  • Proven expertise in usage of MS Office Suite including MS Project; CAD experience preferred (if applicable)
  • Substantial understanding and knowledge of principles, theories, and concepts relevant to Engineering
  • Ability to manage competing priorities in a fast paced environment
  • Must be able to work in a team environment, including inter-departmental teams and key contact representing the organization on contracts or project.
  • Ability to interact with senior internal and external personnel on significant matters often requiring coordination between organizations
Quality Management System
  • Adherence to cGMPs is required at all times when working on site.
  • Practice good sanitation and health habits.
  • Ensuring adherence to governing SOPs and quality policies (JLL or Client) where relevant
  • Proactively ensure any quality issues, incidents or best practices are reported and shared
  • Ensure timely completion of all quality training as plan
  • Support GMP incident root cause investigations and CAPA creation / completion as necessary
  • Ensure all infrastructure and compliance documentation for the systems is up-to-date (e.g. maintenance logs, drawings and single-line diagrams)
  • Ensure all Work Order activities are documented in time achieved  periodically
  • Ensure those subcontractors under supervision understand compliance requirements such as GxP requirements and Change Control
Requirements:
  • Candidate must possess at least a Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Engineering (Electrical/Electronic), Engineering (Mechanical), Engineering (Mechatronic/Electromechanical) or equivalent.
  • At least 2 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Preferably Non-Executives specializing in Maintenance/Repair (Facilities & Machinery) or equivalent.
  • Full-Time position(s) available.

column1: 417,tech project manager,/en/job/business-operations-assistant-manager-9402587,9402587,"Business Operations, Assistant Manager",False,False,,,SGD,ECLOUDVALLEY TECHNOLOGY PTE. LTD.,22-Mar-22,False,,5 days,201911448G,,,201 - 500 Employees,,Clarke Quay,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">
<div>

Founded in 2014 as a born-in-the-cloud partner focused entirely on AWS services, eCloudvalley has grown to 380+ employees with geographic footprints across APAC region, in Taiwan, Hong Kong, China, Philippines, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, and United States. eCloudvalley is the notable vendor in the Asia Pacific regional contextualization of the Magic Quadrant for Public Cloud infrastructure MSP on Gartner.

With a mission to evolve the customer’s business with cloud technology, eCloudvalley has built a professional technical team with over 500 AWS certifications and has served 1,000 enterprises to perform any digital transformation. Our core competencies include Cloud Migration, Managed Services Provider, Data Solution, SAP, DB Freedom, Cloud Training, DevOps, Serverless, and Containers.

Our business has been growing and expanding rapidly and we are looking for new talents to join us. If you are a person with entrepreneur mindset and would like to be a part to disrupt the market, you may be one of the people that we need!
","

Job Description

Do you like helping enterprise clients implement innovative cloud solutions and solve technical problems? Do you want to be a leader and demonstrate how emerging technologies (such as A.I., Big Data, Cloud, DevOps) can be applied to businesses?

With business growth and global expansion opportunities, we are looking for a highly motivated Business Operations, Assistant Manager to help accelerate our growing team. This is an excellent opportunity to join a world-class team, working with some of the best and brightest engineers and account managers while also developing your skills and furthering your career within one of the most innovative and progressive technology companies.

Responsibilities:

  • Understand company workflows, develop and design strategies, and deliver transformation projects to improve on operational processes
  • Conduct deployment activities and measure achievement of desired outcomes
  • Evaluate compliance against existing standards, guidelines, methodologies, policies, and procedures
  • Identify and propose the necessary modifications to reduce risks and enhance control
  • Prepare and present findings and recommendations to the senior management team in the regular business review
  • To engage stakeholders in headquarter to obtain buy-in and quickly replicate proven solution into different regions across ASEAN

Requirements:

  • Bachelor degree or above preferred in business or accounting
  • Tech Savvy and strong Office 365 skills are advantageous
  • Logical thinking and analytical skills, multi-tasker and passionate for processes and systems
  • Meticulous, organized, excellent analytical, strong verbal and written communication skills especially narrative writing
  • Independent and a team player with good interpersonal skills
  • High levels of integrity and discretion in handling confidential information, and efficient worker that can follow through and complete tasks on tight deadlines

What is in it for you?

  • Attractive remuneration package, benefit & year-end bonus
  • Excellent career development
  • 5-day work with flexible work schedule

Interested candidates are invited to apply online. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Thank you for applying

","['100% on AWS', 'Working in most Innovative Cloud Technology', 'Excellent career development']",Manager,,5 years,"Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree",,Full-Time,,"['Medical', 'Regular hours, Mondays - Fridays', 'Leaves', 'Smart Casual']",https://myjobstreet.jobstreet.com.sg/application/online-apply.php?job_id=9402587&advertisement_id=9400958&s=20&AdvertisementSource=1,701799,Central - Others,sg

column2: DBS is a leading financial services group in Asia, with over 280 branches across 18 markets. Headquartered and listed in Singapore, DBS has a growing presence in the three key Asian axes of growth: Greater China, Southeast Asia and South Asia. The bank's ""AA-"" and ""Aa1"" credit ratings are among the highest in the world.

column3: DBS is at the forefront of leveraging digital technology to shape the future of banking, and has been named “World’s Best Digital Bank” by Euromoney in 2016 and 2018. The bank has also been recognised for its leadership in the region, having been named “Asia’s Best Bank” by several publications including The Banker, Global Finance, IFR Asia and Euromoney since 2012. In addition, the bank has been named “Safest Bank in Asia” by Global Finance for nine consecutive years from 2009 to 2017.

DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, and positively impacting communities through supporting social enterprises, as it banks the Asian way. It has also established a SGD 50 million foundation to strengthen its corporate social responsibility efforts in Singapore and across Asia.

With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. The bank acknowledges the passion, commitment and can-do spirit in all of its 26,000 staff, representing over 40 nationalities.

column1:
","
Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels. 
What we are looking for

To manage the delivery of complex multi-disciplinary projects within agreed time and budget constraints. To work with users and stakeholders as well as cross-function teams, to determine and manage effective solutions to facilitate the delivery of IT Delivery projects.
Key Accountabilities
  • Deliver initiatives and/or projects in DBS across all countries
  • Strategic Project Governance
  • Work closely with and manage indirect teams from each domain, team members, tech, and stakeholders to monitoring, develop and execute project plans and associated project content. 
  • Track project milestones and deliverables. Implement and track key milestones & relevant KPIs to measure success of projects.
  • Keep management and project sponsors abreast of project developments - set up periodic reviews and prepare relevant documents to communicate progress.
  • Drive project and program delivery
  • Responsible for ensuring project delivery on time on schedule and with quality
  • Effectively communicate with team members and stakeholders in a timely and clear fashion.
  • Identify and resolve issues and conflicts within the program, projects and project management community and with other stakeholders if necessary. 
  • Resolve issues at the project or line level and escalate issues which cannot be resolved in a timely and accurate manner.
  • Manage key stakeholders and business and technology leads
  • Manage and communicate effectively with domain leads at senior level and working level teams. 
  • Responsible for ensuring project steering committee meetings, cross function meetings and other key project meetings are effective and achieve objectives on a consistent manner.
  • Change management
  • Ability to drive the adoption of agile methodology across teams 
  • Able to work with users to drive changes within the organization for projects implementation
  • Develop best practices and tools for project execution and management. Ensure utilization of standards and practices across all projects.Job Duties & responsibilities: 
  • Work closely with stakeholders and manage both internal and external relations through the project timeline;
  • Analyse requirements and define scope of project as well as objectives to ensure that they are technically feasible;
  • Negotiate with users and stakeholders as necessary;
  • Perform financial management and budgeting for projects;
  • Allocate resources including internal manpower and external vendors for the delivery of the project;
  • Track project progress according to milestones and goals, and manage possible risks;
  • Ensure quality assurance in the software engineering process;
Requirements:
  • At least 5 years of Technical Project Manager experience with gradually increasing responsibilities and a demonstrated understanding of Project Management processes, artifacts and tools
  • A track record as a coach, mentor, and developer of talent
  • Ability to independently manage the operational aspects of ongoing projects and serves as liaison between project management and project team
  • An ability to drive to big picture goals and milestones while valuing and maintaining a strong attention to detail
  • An ability to quickly identify and drive to the optimal solution when presented with a series of constraints
  • Demonstrated ability in people management, strategic planning, risk management, change management, project management
  • Excellent judgment, analytical thinking, and problem-solving skills
  • Experience in business process mapping or operational redesign / improvement
  • Experience working with quality management approaches, techniques, and principles to ensure quality
  • Full understanding of software development lifecycle best practices
  • Knowledge of both theoretical and practical aspects of project management
  • Self-motivated individual that possesses excellent time management and organizational skills
  • Strong cross-functional collaboration skills, relationship building skills and ability to achieve results without direct reporting relationships
  • Strong oral and written communication skills and the ability to present a polished, professional, and diplomatic image to all stakeholders
  • Strong sense of personal responsibility and accountability for delivering high quality work.
Apply Now​
  • We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

column3: DBS is at the forefront of leveraging digital technology to shape the future of banking, and has been named “World’s Best Digital Bank” by Euromoney in 2016 and 2018. The bank has also been recognised for its leadership in the region, having been named “Asia’s Best Bank” by several publications including The Banker, Global Finance, IFR Asia and Euromoney since 2012. In addition, the bank has been named “Safest Bank in Asia” by Global Finance for nine consecutive years from 2009 to 2017.

DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, and positively impacting communities through supporting social enterprises, as it banks the Asian way. It has also established a SGD 50 million foundation to strengthen its corporate social responsibility efforts in Singapore and across Asia.

With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. The bank acknowledges the passion, commitment and can-do spirit in all of its 26,000 staff, representing over 40 nationalities.

column1:
","
Business Function
Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels. 
What we are looking for
To manage the delivery of complex multi-disciplinary projects within agreed time and budget constraints. To work with users and stakeholders as well as cross-function teams, to determine and manage effective solutions to facilitate the delivery of IT Delivery projects.
Key Accountabilities
  • Deliver initiatives and/or projects in DBS across all countries
  • Strategic Project Governance
  • Work closely with and manage indirect teams from each domain, team members, tech, and stakeholders to monitoring, develop and execute project plans and associated project content. 
  • Track project milestones and deliverables. Implement and track key milestones & relevant KPIs to measure success of projects.
  • Keep management and project sponsors abreast of project developments - set up periodic reviews and prepare relevant documents to communicate progress.
  • Drive project and program delivery
  • Responsible for ensuring project delivery on time on schedule and with quality
  • Effectively communicate with team members and stakeholders in a timely and clear fashion.
  • Identify and resolve issues and conflicts within the program, projects and project management community and with other stakeholders if necessary. 
  • Resolve issues at the project or line level and escalate issues which cannot be resolved in a timely and accurate manner.
  • Manage key stakeholders and business and technology leads
  • Manage and communicate effectively with domain leads at senior level and working level teams. 
  • Responsible for ensuring project steering committee meetings, cross function meetings and other key project meetings are effective and achieve objectives on a consistent manner. Change management
  • Ability to drive the adoption of agile methodology across teams 
  • Able to work with users to drive changes within the organization for projects implementation
  • Develop best practices and tools for project execution and management. Ensure utilization of standards and practices across all projects.
Job Duties & responsibilities: 
  • Work closely with stakeholders and manage both internal and external relations through the project timeline;
  • - Analyse requirements and define scope of project as well as objectives to ensure that they are technically feasible;
  • Negotiate with users and stakeholders as necessary;
  • Perform financial management and budgeting for projects;
  • Allocate resources including internal manpower and external vendors for the delivery of the project;
  • Track project progress according to milestones and goals, and manage possible risks;
  • Ensure quality assurance in the software engineering process;
Requirements:
  • At least 5 years of Technical Project Manager experience with gradually increasing responsibilities and a demonstrated understanding of Project Management processes, artifacts and tools
  • A track record as a coach, mentor, and developer of talent
  • Ability to independently manage the operational aspects of ongoing projects and serves as liaison between project management and project team
  • An ability to drive to big picture goals and milestones while valuing and maintaining a strong attention to detail
  • An ability to quickly identify and drive to the optimal solution when presented with a series of constraints
  • Demonstrated ability in people management, strategic planning, risk management, change management, project management
  • Excellent judgment, analytical thinking, and problem-solving skills
  • Experience in business process mapping or operational redesign / improvement
  • Experience working with quality management approaches, techniques, and principles to ensure quality
  • Full understanding of software development lifecycle best practices
  • Knowledge of both theoretical and practical aspects of project management
  • Self-motivated individual that possesses excellent time management and organizational skills
  • Strong cross-functional collaboration skills, relationship building skills and ability to achieve results without direct reporting relationships
  • Strong oral and written communication skills and the ability to present a polished, professional, and diplomatic image to all stakeholders
  • Strong sense of personal responsibility and accountability for delivering high quality work.
Apply Now​
We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

Responsibilities
  • Work together with Client Solutions Managers, Sales and internal teams to drive eCom vertical strategy, hypotheses testings for eCommerce clients
  • Project owner of key initiatives for eCommerce team. Formulate, own and execute these initiatives to drive incremental growth
  • Translate eCom insights into actionable growth & marketing recommendations
  • Monitor and communicate eCom trends, research and results to internal and external stakeholders.
  • Partner with Vertical Lead, sales, and other client solutions managers to identify opportunities for new features, products, and partnerships to drive client engagement and marketing efficiency

DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. column1:
","
Business Function
As the leading bank in Asia, DBS Consumer Banking Group is in a unique position to help our customers realise their dreams and ambitions. As a market leader in the consumer banking business, DBS has a full spectrum of products and services, including deposits, investments, insurance, mortgages, credit cards and personal loans, to help our customers realise their dreams and aspirations at every life stage. Our financial solutions are not only the best in the business - they were made just right for you.
Job Purpose 
  • DBS is a leading Asia bank servicing our clients for over 50 years in the 18 markets we operate in. Besides providing a comprehensive suite of financial solutions, our award-winning digital solutions are tailored for our clients as people are the heart of everything, we do in DBS.
  • We are committed to deliver banking that is simple and hassle free and embed our digital solutions in client's everyday life. In our team at regional product delivery, we collaborate with a cross functional team of experts from product managers, analytics, design, engineering, quality assurance to user enablement. 
  • We provide insights with our strong domain knowledge, expertise in end to end project execution cycles and strength in quality assurance to turn requirements into output. 
  • Our digital product delivery execution cut across the different digital channels which include internet banking for both desktop browser and mobile app, secured web, Chatbot, Paylah! app, intelligent banking, SMS banking to Wealth services. We understand requirements from product managers, translate them to user story and acceptance criteria and slice them into executable scenarios using our behavioural driven design framework for execution post development by our technology team.
  • Post that we will execute the end to end user acceptance test to validate the quality via our manual or automation tools before release to market.The delivery of these highly complex and sophisticated banking solutions requires a capable and highly motivated individual who excel in stakeholder engagements and familiar with project management to deliver successful outcomes for the organisation.
  • As the bank continue to grow and invest in digital platform and increasing our digital suite of services, testing scope have expanded, platform have become more complex thus there need to have more creative and sustainable way of ensuring that our services delivered , both old and new remain robust and make banking invisible and joyful to our customers. 
  • As a specialist in quality assurance delivery, you are part of a core team that focus on the end to end cycle of quality assurance in the user acceptance cycle, besides execution with our manual and automation tools, you will also work with team to identify opportunities to improve and drive efficiency in productivity and quality management in the projects that we execute.
Key Accountabilities
  • Responsible for end to end execution of the overall test strategy developed collectively with the product owner from user story acceptance criteria, JBehave writing, execution of testing and defects management to live verification support. 
  • Expected to be an expert in banking domain and able to write test plan and testing summary documents. To write and execute end to end test scenarios with detailed steps as per requirements either via manual or automation testing.
  • Actively participate and collaborate in project meetings and discussions, keen attention to details and time management to ensure quality and timely output of project assigned.
  • Execute the assigned manual or automation testing, log defects and follow up on defects to ensure timely closure. Generate reports of testing, prepare training slides for touchpoints, and required update to delivery
Job Duties & Responsibilities 
  • Design, develop, execute, and maintain test scenarios and detailed end to end test cases for the assigned projects relating to the digital platform's user acceptance testing.
  • Able to write test cases in JBehave for agile projects.
  • Expert in using testing tools such as JIRA, Confluence etc to execute and maintain project status.
  • Knowledge of web and mobile application testing in banking domain, with good time management and keen eye for details to ensure quality and timely output
  • Detect, report and track defects in the application tools and with various stakeholders to ensure proper closure of issues.
  • Collaborate with all stakeholders proactive to complete job assigned from clarification to issue closure.
  • Good with documentation as constant update to project changes will need to be updated timely
Required Experience 
  • Minimum 1 years' experience in web and mobile application testing in the banking industry is preferred.
  • Strong analytic skills to process complex requirement to come up with end to end scenarios and test cases
  • Familiar with Agile and waterfall methodology, and understand the life cycle of testing in both automated and manual testing
  • Have experience in running or being part of an agile project team in banking industry and have had hands on experience on JBehave
  • Understanding Java and VB Scripting will be an advantage
  • Experience with Quality assurance processes and tools including HP ALM, JIRA is a must
  • Good stakeholder engagement skills with strong verbal and written communication is required as will need to collaborate closely across multiple teams during project execution
  • Good team player with strong organizational skills and can work independently with minimum guidance 
Tech Skills Preferred
  • Strong knowledge in automation testing and testing life cycle and methodologies.
  • Experience with Quality assurance processes and tools including HP ALM, JIRA and JBehave
Skills (Non-Technical):
  • Must have resilience and the ability to work well under pressure with minimum guidance
  • Quick learner, adaptable to changes on project needs and good team player who take initiative to help team to complete assigned task 
  • Strong working knowledge of SDLC practices and procedures.
  • Ability to handle multiple concurrent activities and projects
Core Competencies 
  • Dependability — Staff can be trusted to work independently to fulfilled required task assigned.        
  • Adaptability/Flexibility — Need to display resiliency and work well under pressure due to possible evolving changes in requirements.        
  • Cooperation — Good people person is required as job require a lot of stakeholder's engagement cross team to collaborate closely to achieve the required results.         
  • Stress Tolerance — Selected staff need to work under stress due to timeline pressure so staff must be able to manage stress well        
  • Leadership & Initiative — Staff displayed willingness to lead, take charge, and offer opinions and willingness to assist when required.        
  • Persistence — Role requires staff to be persistence as changes may not happen overnight and candidate may be required to follow up closely with stakeholders to ensure closure.        
  • Analytical Thinking — Role requires analysing information and using logic to address work-related issues and problems.        
Apply Now
We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.
",[],Junior Executive,,1 year,"Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree",,Full-Time,,"['Medical', 'Business (e.g. Shirts)']",https://ars2.equest.com/?response_id=914a39e26ee3e0061ce59faec89ede97,70000,Singapore,sg

425,tech project manager,/en/job/tech-lead-backend-systems-bytehouse-9421958,9421958,"#Tech Lead (Backend Systems), ByteHouse",False,False,,,SGD,BYTEDANCE PTE. LTD.,28-Mar-22,False,,,201923456H,,,501 - 1000 Employees,,,"<div>

column3: Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.

column1:
","
Responsibilities
About ByteDanceFounded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.
Team IntroductionByteHouse is the next-generation high-performance analytical database that was developed by ByteDance, with a mission to enable efficient and real-time data-driven decision-making on PB-level data sets. The initial ByteHouse was forked from Clickhouse, after which large re-architecture had been taken place. ByteHouse now not only improves the efficiency of Clickhouse but also fits into the elastic cloud-native infrastructure with better scalability and resource utilization. With years of polishment in the internal EB-level scenarios, ByteHouse is now ready to serve our business partners via various cloud vendors
What you will be doing:
  • Be responsible for the core functional development of ByteDance's next-generation analytic database
  • Lead a team of talented engineers to build performant and robust cloud-native services
  • Continuously work with the product team to model product requirements into backend concepts
  • Apply industrial best practices in microservice architecture and governance
  • Ensure service quality through the whole software development lifecycle

Qualifications
  • Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or relevant major
  • 5+ years of backend experience, 1+ year of tech leadership experience
  • In-depth understanding of Golang or Java-based backend systems
  • Experienced in building and maintaining mission-critical, large-scale backend systems
  • Good knowledge of server-side technologies: RPC frameworks, MQ, Cache, Config server, Connection Pool, DB sharding, etc
  • Good knowledge of DDD and microservices architecture
  • Knowledge of big data processing systems and OLAP databases is a plus
  • Knowledge of agile project management style is a plus
  • Good communication and interpersonal skills

column2: United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices.

column3: In 1935, amid the economic uncertainties following the Great Depression, UOB opened its doors to offer banking services for the merchant community in Singapore.

Since then, UOB has grown organically and through a series of strategic acquisitions. Today, UOB is rated among the world’s top banks: ‘Aa1’ by Moody’s and ‘AA-’ by Standard & Poor’s and Fitch Ratings.

Generations of UOB employees for the past 80 years have carried through the entrepreneurial spirit, focus on long-term value creation and an unwavering commitment to do what is right for our customers and our colleagues.
At UOB, we believe in being a responsible financial services provider and we are committed to making a difference in the lives of our stakeholders and in the communities in which we operate.

Just as we are dedicated to helping our customers manage their finances wisely and grow their businesses, UOB is steadfast in our support of social development, particularly in the areas of art, children and education.

column1:
","
About UOB
United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices. Our history spans more than 80 . Over this time, we have been guided by our values — Honorable, Enterprising, United and Committed. column2: TTSH is one of Singapore’s largest multi-disciplinary hospitals with more than 174 years of pioneering medical care and development. The hospital has 45 clinical and allied health departments, 16 specialist centres. It also has three institutes that are spearheading care, research and innovations in geriatric medicine, infectious diseases and ophthalmology. Powered by more than 8,000 healthcare staff, TTSH sees over 2,500 patients at its specialist clinics and some 460 patients at its emergency department every day. TTSH is part of the National Healthcare Group, providing holistic and integrated patient care.  With a strong quality culture steeped in patient safety, TTSH constantly challenges itself to provide faster, better, cheaper and safer care for patients. To achieve this, the hospital keeps abreast and believes in investing in its staff, facilities, medical technology and system improvements.

TTSH Central Health is hiring!  The candidate will be part of a fast-paced and dynamic team in supporting the Central Health Integrated Care Office (ICO) in efforts towards value-driven transformation of the healthcare model towards Population Health. The Manager will support the Assistant Director to champion the interests of Central ICO and our network of community care partners' digitalisation efforts in Population Health. The Manager will also facilitate inter-provider coordination and drive digitally-enabled, value-based integrated care delivery to our residents.

Responsibilities

  • Represent the interests of Central ICO and our partners in the execution of NHG-run IT initiatives, ensuring that systems development and implementation by ITO are in line with the Central Health digitalisation strategy
  • To work closely within the Division, partners and other relevant stakeholders, to translate user requirements and ensure technical specifications of digital projects encapsulate essential care coordination needs, and are developed for feasible, sustainable use by providers
  • To actively participate in IT/digital projects relating to ICO development and partnerships strengthening, championing the positions of the ICO and our partners and maintaining clear documentation
  • Served as the primary liaison point between end users and NGEMR/Epic personnel and designing and/or building NGEMR programmes for collaborative care workflows to facilitate integrated care delivery among providers
  • To develop and implement efficient processes and/or dashboards for regular reporting and monitoring of utilisation and provider performance against care quality indicators, to support ongoing benchmarking, evaluation and management decision-making on value-based improvements
  • To keep NHGHQ, Management, partners and other stakeholders apprised of digitalisation project progress and achievements in areas relevant to Central ICO and partners.

Requirements
  • Bachelor Degree in health informatics, information systems, business analytics, computer science or relevant fields with 7 years of experience in a large organisation
  • Knowledge of/experience in healthcare is strongly preferred
  • Meticulous, keen eye for detail, strong IT/tech acumen, and ability to interpret and handle data sets
  • Ability to translate complex care workflows and user/provider needs into technical development specs; ability to communicate and translate technical terms into layman language and vice versa
  • Hands-on experience in project management/ product management, health tech and/or health informatics
  • Strong interpersonal, written and verbal communication skills

column1: 428,tech project manager,/en/job/workforce-development-engineer-9405487,9405487,Workforce Development Engineer,False,False,,,SGD,MICRON SEMICONDUCTOR ASIA OPERATIONS PTE LTD,22-Mar-22,False,,29 days,201815216Z,,,More than 5000 Employees,,,"<div>

column2: MICRON SEMICONDUCTOR ASIA OPERATIONS PTE LTD is a subsidiary of Micron Technology, Inc.  (‘Micron’).

column3: Micron is a global leader in the semiconductor industry. For more than 35 years, Micron has dedicated itself to collaborating with customers and partners to engineer technology that drives innovation and transforms what’s possible.  Micron offers the industry’s broadest portfolio of silicon-to-semiconductor memory solutions—starting with foundational DRAM, NAND, and NOR Flash memory, and extending to SSDs, modules, MCPs, HMC, and other semiconductor systems. This best-in-class technology powers leading-edge computing, consumer, enterprise server and storage, networking, embedded, automotive, industrial, and mobile products.

Micron is strategically located in Singapore to efficiently and effectively accommodate its global customers, while also serving as the base of the company’s worldwide operations. Singapore is home to Micron’s largest manufacturing footprint with three fabrication facilities, an upcoming fabrication facility expansion, and a test and assembly facility. Its presence in Singapore also includes a technology center supporting innovation across the company and a sales and marketing office that offers all Micron memory products to our regional customers.

Micron provides opportunities for team members’ personal and career development through challenging work assignments, training and educational programs. We hire, train, develop, and educate a workforce that is competent in performing job expectations by providing orientation, job specific training, professional certifications, external training and various continuous learning opportunities.
As Micron enters into a new era of growth, its presence in Singapore plays an important role in its worldwide operations and overall success.

column1:
","
As a Workforce Development Engineer at Micron, you will be responsible for collaborating with management, engineering, and production team members to develop and deploy department technical training programs and resources. In this position, you will establish a line of communication with department leadership to determine current and future technical training opportunities; conduct needs assessments and analyses to support both short-term and long-term technical training needs for engineering and production team members; and work with subject matter experts to design and develop technical training support materials for engineers, technicians, and operators. Additionally, you will develop and instruct technical classes on processes, equipment, and software applications; assist department team members with continuing education questions and provide career development and mentorship; monitor the efficiency of technical development programs; and work with department personnel to evaluate and improve existing training. You will collaborate with team members across the global Micron organization to develop and successfully transfer training materials for use at other sites. Some limited travel may be involved.

Responsibilities include, but not limited to:
  • Understand technical issues and partner with team members at all levels of the organization
  • Convey technical concepts and information in a meaningful way to audiences with a wide range of technical backgrounds
  • Skills in course design and development, and have strong analytical, critical thinking, and problem solving abilities
  • Effective project management background with proven ability to prioritize and balance multiple projects and meet established deadlines
  • Excellent writing, facilitation, and interpersonal skills
  • Self motivation and direction with a high level of initiative; and advanced computer skills
  • You are proactive and collaborate effectively in a rapidly changing environment

429,tech project manager,/en/job/events-community-associate-9420857,9420857,Events & Community Associate,False,False,,,SGD,Monk's Hill Ventures Pte. Ltd.,28-Mar-22,False,,,201326374E,,,1 - 50 Employees,,,"
Monk’s Hill Ventures invests in top entrepreneurs in both early-stage companies in Asia as well as those running leading global growth-stage technology companies looking to enter Asia. Think of us as your trusted partner in Asia.
<div style=""text-align:justify"">

We are entrepreneurs. We believe that, above everything else in the startup world, it is the entrepreneur who creates value. The right entrepreneurs have the smarts to correct mis-defined products, the charisma to bring onboard expertise they themselves do not have, and the mental strength to stick through the tough times. With our operating background, we contribute more than just capital. Having built companies ourselves, we collaborate with founders as fellow entrepreneurs to make their vision a reality. Entrepreneurs backing entrepreneurs.

We are technologists. We believe deeply in the positive and increasing impact of technology on our world. Investing in technology companies has never been more attractive, as technology adoption reaches an inflection point. There are now nearly 5 billion mobile subscribers and more than 3 billion internet users globally. With quantum improvement in computing, building and scaling a technology company costs less than 10% of what it took 15 years ago. Leveraging technologies like big data, mobile, and cloud to build significant business is not only possible, but well within economic reach, especially in emerging markets. Innovation is now global.

Monk’s Hill Ventures invests in top entrepreneurs in both early-stage companies in Asia as well as those running leading global growth-stage technology companies looking to enter Asia. Think of us as your trusted partner in Asia.","

Roles & Responsibilities

Monk’s Hill Ventures, an early-stage tech venture capital firm who invest in founders and companies who will transform millions of lives, has an immediate opening for an Events and Community Associate.

The Events and Community Associate will be part of the Communications and Marketing team and will work closely with the team to build brand and community engagement programs across the different markets we operate in. This is an opportunity for a self-driven communications and marketing professional at a leading venture capital firm investing in the best entrepreneurs building the next iconic companies in their industries.

In this role, you’ll work closely with our Partners, the investment team and portfolio companies. Looking for someone who is proactive and willing to roll their sleeves up. We are also looking for someone with a passion for tech.

This role will report to our Head of Communications. It is based ideally in Singapore; we are open to remote work out of other parts of Southeast Asia.

Key Responsibilities
  • Work with the communications and marketing team on strategy, planning and execution of events and campaigns
  • Drive marketing events – design, produce and manage events including community events, media events, portfolio workshops, and networking receptions; ensure good feedback loop backed by data and insight
  • Drive speaking engagements – pitch for events, vet event requests, and respond to external speaking inquiries, support on speaker prep, and invite speakers as needed
  • Community building – building new relationships with startup ecosystem and deepening existing relationships
  • Community content - developing and deliver content for community engagement including event write-ups, blogs, newsletters and other updates
  • Support on website updates, content development, media program
  • Manage database, reporting and lists – this includes portfolio, media and other relevant networks
Ideal Candidate Background
  • Bachelor’s degree at a minimum
  • At least 3-5 years of experience in agency or startup
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Project management experience including campaigns, large events and key programs
  • Self-motivated, autonomous, a team player, mature, ability to mono-task, planning and organization
  • Proven media relations experience and existing relationships with key media a plus
  • Strong experience working with Illustrator, Photoshop, Final Cut Pro, PowerPoint and/or Keynote a plus

column2: United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices.

column3: In 1935, amid the economic uncertainties following the Great Depression, UOB opened its doors to offer banking services for the merchant community in Singapore.

Since then, UOB has grown organically and through a series of strategic acquisitions. Today, UOB is rated among the world’s top banks: ‘Aa1’ by Moody’s and ‘AA-’ by Standard & Poor’s and Fitch Ratings.

Generations of UOB employees for the past 80 years have carried through the entrepreneurial spirit, focus on long-term value creation and an unwavering commitment to do what is right for our customers and our colleagues.
At UOB, we believe in being a responsible financial services provider and we are committed to making a difference in the lives of our stakeholders and in the communities in which we operate.

Just as we are dedicated to helping our customers manage their finances wisely and grow their businesses, UOB is steadfast in our support of social development, particularly in the areas of art, children and education.

column1:
","
About UOB

United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices.

Our history spans more than 80 years. Over this time, we have been guided by our values — Honorable, Enterprising, United and Committed. This means we always strive to do what is right, build for the future, work as one team and pursue long-term success. It is how we work, consistently, be it towards the company, our colleagues or our customers.

About the Department

The Technology and Operations function is comprised of five teams of specialists with distinct capabilities: business partnership, technology, operations, risk governance and planning support and services. We work closely together to harness the power of technology to support our physical and digital banking services and operations. This includes developing, centralising and standardising technology systems as well as banking operations in Singapore and overseas branches.

Job Responsibilities
  • Lead on-shore team to fulfill end-to-end software development and support for all approved initiatives (projects, change requests, Level 3 production fixes). This includes analysis and design to development, implementation, testing and support
  • Partner with off-shore Delivery Manager to plan and manage deliverables
  • Collaborate with Enterprise and Domain architects to align application design to the overall architectural guidelines and direction
  • Work with subject matter experts, business analysts, architects, software developers and business stakeholder to establish best or alternative solutions that are feasible within the technology and timeline constraints 
  • Provide leadership and guidance on application architecture and design
  • Provide quality assurance of the team delivery in conformance to the Bank-defined software delivery methodology and tools. This includes delivery of source codes in compliance to the Bank's defined security, coding and change management standards (eg. Veracode, SonarQube, Aldon, BitBucket)
  • Drive adoption of methods (E.g. Agile / Waterfall) and industry practices to improve quality and productivity outcomes
  • Anticipate and resolve development issues or risks either independently or together with the relevant stakeholders and provide timely escalation of issues that impacts development schedule with proposed options for resolution
  • Lead multi-vendor and development teams and manage vendor relationship to ensure deliverables are timely and of quality
  • Partner with Test Managers to formulate comprehensive SIT test documents and build test automation
  • Ensure completion of Unit Test, System Integration Testing (SIT), User Acceptance Testing (UAT), performance / load testing and application security testing with quality results
  • Provide regular, timely updates and escalation to Core Banking Head of Tech Delivery & Development.
  • Manage team demand and capacity, partner with on-shore / off-shore HR on the hiring and on-boarding of staff.
  • Manage people development aspects for the Core Banking delivery team
  • Ensure team compliance to UOB Code of Conduct, applicable policies and Group / Local regulatory requirements 
Job Requirements
  • Bachelor Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or similar domain
  • Related professional / technical qualification (e.g. PMP) will be advantageous although not mandatory 
  • Good business knowledge and experiences in multiple domains of Core Banking Payments, Channel Host and Middleware (eg. Channel ID management & transaction interfaces, e-Payment & e-Commerce transaction processing, Proxy registration & processing, Enterprise Application Integration, MQ management)
  • More than 15 years proven track record in developing and delivering global / regional IT capabilities for a multi-national / regional company with annual budgetary responsibility
  • More than 10 years leadership experience in managing IT teams (>30 people)
  • Proven experience in a leader-of-leaders role
  • Proven result-oriented career with a focus on development and support
  • Good problem solving, analytical, synthesis, system thinking and solutioning skills
  • Highly effective communicating with technical stakeholders, proficient communicating with non-technical stakeholders
  • Good understanding and experience in waterfall and agile software development methodologies
  • Knowledge and experiences on IBM AS400, Oracle Solaris / Tuxedo, MQ, API, RPG / COBOL / C++ / Javascript / Python / Unix Korn Shell programming, DevOps tools is an added advantage
     
Be a part of UOB Family

UOB is an equal opportunity employer. UOB does not discriminate on the basis of a candidate's age, race, gender, color, religion, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, or other non-merit factors. All employment decisions at UOB are based on business needs, job requirements and qualifications. If you require any assistance or accommodations to be made for the recruitment process, please inform us when you submit your online application.

column3: Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. ResponsibilitiesFounded in 2012, ByteDance is a technology company operating a range of content platforms that inform, educate, entertain and inspire people across languages, cultures and geographies. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Douyin and Toutiao.
The Infrastructure NoSQL team supports all mid-platform and business lines in ByteDance, operating across tens of thousands of servers and dealing with data far beyond the PB level. We have self-developed distributed key-value/caching systems, globally distributed tables storage systems and massive graph database products. Combined with the industry's leading hardware and software stack technology, we strive for the continuous evolution of the next generation of NoSQL products.
Joining our team, you can expect to have a very structured and thorough training plan, as well as the opportunity to undertake a larger working scope whilst giving enough space to grow and develop your career. We look forward to your application.
Responsibilities
  • Lead the team to build large-scale graph processing/mining systems to support graph computing related application scenarios at ByteDance, including but not limited to recommendation, search, advertising, risk control, etc.;
  • Play a key role in driving project objectives and execution management, architecture design and code reviews, define long term technical roadmap for the team, and demonstrate technical leadership;
  • Recruit and mentor engineers of various levels of experience into a performant team, build team culture and cohesion, help team members grow technical capabilities;
  • Work closely with stakeholder teams to identify business pain points, continuously optimize and improve customer experience, team reputation, and impact.

Qualifications
Qualifications
  • Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science or related fields;
  • 6+ years of professional software development experience;
  • Strong with C++/Golang/Java/Python program development (at least one), pursue high-quality codes and focused on code engineering quality;
  • Solid knowledge of Linux system, proficient in multi-threading, network programming, and distributed development in any programming language;
  • Good communication skills, able to lead and drive projects effectively. Familiar with team and project management methodologies and approaches.

Preferred Qualifications
  • Experience in technical management of a software engineering team;
  • In-depth research and industry experience in large-scale graph computing mining systems design and implementation, or high performance computing, non-volatile memory storage, and relevant development experiences;
  • Contributor/Committer or PMC of the open-source community is a plus.

Job Title: Sales Excellence Program Manager
Candidate Requirement:

• At least 5 years of Program Management or Sales Operations experience in a Sales environment, articulating knowledge of managing Sales cycles, Sales Pipeline Hygiene, Accuracy vs Forecast or identifying and planning sales opportunities
• Well-versed in data management with the use of Power BI or Power Pivot would be a massive advantage (good to have)
• Prior Tech Sales experience would be an added advantage as well

Typical Day in the role:

• In a week, 1.5 days would be used to manage program operational matters such as ensuring program hygiene, pipeline are in place
• All other times would be used to drive strategic work, building program readiness, working closely with Sponsor and sellers to effectively land programs via Program Launches, unblocking challenges, identifying key stakeholders involved
Job Description:
Operationalize the sales fundamentals – 40%
• Establish weekly insights for sales managers and drive appropriate actions e.g., follow-up actions to close with seller
• Consolidate feedback/updates, collate insights for WW requests on behalf of sales managers (e.g., top slipped deals, on time renewals)
• Begin the journey to re-shape the pipeline to WW standards
1. Work to zero uncommitted upside in Q
2. Correct 20% Committed + C@R (Committed at Risk) to appropriate sales stage
3. Work to zero 80% Upside/U+UU (Upside, Uncommitted Upside)
4. Identify stalled pipeline and address
5. Identify sellers with < required pipeline and suggest sales actions (use case execution)
• Manage Renewal excellence (recapture, upsell, on time)
Drive local operations of prioritized use case execution – 20%
• Target list grooming
• Coordination between sales and marketing
• Campaign execution follow up with weekly report out incl. feedback to WW
Operationalize & drive pipeline accelerators – 20%
• Proactive drive to suggest and engage appropriate accelerators to more pipeline per WW guidance e.g., Deal Coaching clinics (facilitate prep), proactive partner offers, deal acceleration calls (facilitate prep)
• Act as point of contact for WW program owners on operations (registrations, questions/clarifications)
Drive local operations of the BA on MACC program – 20%
• Identify all area H2 MACC Deals and track PA+A pipeline within those accounts
• Flag MACCs with no PA+A (Azure Contracts with No Power Platform pipeline)
• Track progress to 10% PA+A in H2 MACCs
• Help accelerate days in stage by pointing to the relevant resources by stage
  • Candidate must possess at least a Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, any field.
  • At least 5 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Preferably Managers specializing in Marketing/Business Development, Sales - Engineering/Technical/IT or equivalent.
  • Contract position(s) available.

column3: Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.

column1:
","
ResponsibilitiesFounded in 2012, ByteDance is a technology company operating a range of content platforms that inform, educate, entertain and inspire people across languages, cultures and geographies. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Douyin and Toutiao.
ByteDance messaging middleware team is responsible for the research and development of ByteDance's messaging platform. We manage the Message Queue systems of all products such as Douyin, TikTok, Toutiao, Xigua Video and Hotsoon. We are industry-leading in the scale of data covered.
Because we are extremely sensitive to the stability and cost of external services, we have developed an in-house message queue BMQ. BMQ's architecture is based on the principle of segregation between storage and computing. It is also compatible with the kafka protocol. In addition to pursuing high levels of stability and optimized cost, we are also actively exploring and expanding supported business scenarios, leveraging the potential value of original log data, and accessing batch computing engines.
Responsibilities
  • Construct an efficient and stable messaging platform. Continuous optimization to improve stability, performance and cost optimization. Build the next generation computing and storage separation architecture on a trillion-level messaging platform;
  • Play a key role in driving project objectives and execution management, architecture design and code reviews, define long term technical roadmap for the team, and demonstrate technical leadership;
  • Recruit and mentor engineers of various levels of experience into a performant team, build team culture and cohesion, help team members grow technical capabilities;

Qualifications
Qualifications

  • Good communication skills, able to lead and drive projects effectively. Familiar with team and project management methodologies and approaches.

Preferred Qualifications
  • In-depth research and industry experience in large-scale messaging platform design and implementation, for example Kafka/RocketMQ/Pulsar/NSQ;

The Infrastructure NoSQL team supports all mid-platform and business lines in ByteDance, operating across tens of thousands of servers and dealing with data far beyond the PB level. We have self-developed distributed key-value/caching systems, globally distributed tables storage systems and massive graph database products. Combined with the industry's leading hardware and software stack technology, we strive for the continuous evolution of the next generation of NoSQL products.
Joining our team, you can expect to have a very structured and thorough training plan, as well as the opportunity to undertake a larger working scope whilst giving enough space to grow and develop your career. We look forward to your application.

  • Lead the team to build distributed Graph Neural Network (GNN) training/inference systems over a large-scale graph dataset. Serving and applying Graph Embedding/GNN into real-world application scenarios in ByteDance;

ResponsibilitiesFounded in 2012, ByteDance is a technology company operating a range of content platforms that inform, educate, entertain and inspire people across languages, cultures and geographies. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Douyin and Toutiao.
The Infrastructure NoSQL team supports all mid-platform and business lines in ByteDance, operating across tens of thousands of servers and dealing with data far beyond the PB level. We have self-developed distributed key-value/caching systems, globally distributed tables storage systems and massive graph database products. Combined with the industry's leading hardware and software stack technology, we strive for the continuous evolution of the next generation of NoSQL products.
You will be responsible for the technical research and development of ByteDance's self-developed graph database system (ByteGraph). We are committed to building a globalized, high-performance, low-cost, and cloud native distributed table system to provide rich features for our applications.
Joining our team, you can expect to have a very structured and thorough training plan, as well as the opportunity to undertake a larger working scope whilst giving enough space to grow and develop your career. We look forward to your application.
Responsibilities
  • Lead the team to build distributed graph-databases, distributed query engines and distributed storage engines. Combine with graph models to provide better solutions for social networking, recommendation, and knowledge graphs under massive concurrent query requests and data volume;
  • Play a key role in driving project objectives and execution management, architecture design and code reviews, define long term technical roadmap for the team, and demonstrate technical leadership;
  • Recruit, manage, mentor, and provide technical leadership for team of software engineers;
  • Work closely with stakeholder teams to identify business pain points, continuously optimize and improve customer experience, team reputation, and impact.

Qualifications
  • Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science or related fields;
  • 6+ years of professional software development experience;
  • Strong with C++/Golang/Java/Python program development (at least one), pursue high-quality code and focused on code engineering quality;
  • Solid knowledge of Linux system, proficient in multi-threading, network programming, and distributed development in any programming language;

  • In-depth research and industry experience in large-scale distributed graph storage systems and platforms, such as TAO/Dragon/Neo4j/TigerGraph/JanusGraph;
  • Contributor/Committer or PMC of the open-source community is a plus.

column2: DBS is a leading financial services group in Asia, with over 280 branches across 18 markets. Headquartered and listed in Singapore, DBS has a growing presence in the three key Asian axes of growth: Greater China, Southeast Asia and South Asia. The bank's ""AA-"" and ""Aa1"" credit ratings are among the highest in the world.

column3: DBS is at the forefront of leveraging digital technology to shape the future of banking, and has been named “World’s Best Digital Bank” by Euromoney in 2016 and 2018. The bank has also been recognised for its leadership in the region, having been named “Asia’s Best Bank” by several publications including The Banker, Global Finance, IFR Asia and Euromoney since 2012. In addition, the bank has been named “Safest Bank in Asia” by Global Finance for nine consecutive years from 2009 to 2017.

DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, and positively impacting communities through supporting social enterprises, as it banks the Asian way. It has also established a SGD 50 million foundation to strengthen its corporate social responsibility efforts in Singapore and across Asia.

With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. The bank acknowledges the passion, commitment and can-do spirit in all of its 26,000 staff, representing over 40 nationalities.

Business Function
As the leading bank in Asia, DBS Consumer Banking Group is in a unique position to help our customers realise their dreams and ambitions. As a market leader in the consumer banking business, DBS has a full spectrum of products and services, including deposits, investments, insurance, mortgages, credit cards and personal loans, to help our customers realise their dreams and aspirations at every life stage. Our financial solutions are not only the best in the business - they were made just right for you.
Job Description 
This is an exciting new function created to make DBS a publisher leveraging its digital properties. This candidate will be required to manage advertising sales and operations for DBS Marketing Services. The ideal candidate would be equipped with excellent knowledge in advertising and marketing technology to lead key integrations with DBS internal systems. 
Responsibilities
  • The ideal candidate will be accountable to leverage DBS digital properties to generate sales revenues 
  • Lead the strategy, development, execution, and optimization of DBS Marketing Services 
  • Design and manage digital media campaigns for DBS Marketing Services partners 
  • Work cross-functionally with various stream owners towards a common goal of making DBS a digital publisher
  • Own all aspects of Adtech include ad trafficking, ad optimization and troubleshooting with a sustained focus on efficiency and scalability
  • Leverage datasets to identify opportunities to improve ad performance, reach, and return on investment for DBS Marketing Services partners
Requirements
  • At least 7 years' experience in digital advertising, advertising technology or advertising sales role
  • Passionate about online advertising and driving sales revenue
  • Strong grasp of Ad Tech (Google Ad Manager - for publishers, DSP, Google CM, Search 360, Ad serving and more)
  • Ability to share/present complex results of analysis in a clear and compelling manner that inspires action
  • Fast Learner - Can achieve power-user status on multiple tools quickly 
  • Possess excellent verbal, presentation, and written communication skills
  • Passion for the digital space from gaming, mobile, social networking, online videos, digital sparks, and everything in-between
  • Strong team player with excellent analytical and project management skills
Apply Now
We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

column3: Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. column1:
","
Responsibilities
About ByteDance
Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo & Resso, as well as platforms specific to the Chinese market including Douyin, Toutiao & Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume & create content.
About the Team
ByteDance's Strategy & Investments Team is a very high-profile team working very closely with ByteDance's senior leadership team and interfacing with the overall Tech ecosystem incl. founders, investors & tech executives. ByteDance's Strategy & Investments Team is focused on developing ByteDance's long-term strategy and on identifying & executing investment & acquisition opportunities across ByteDance's different businesses including our content platforms (TikTok as well as Douyin, Toutiao & Xigua in China), eCommerce, B2B/SaaS, Gaming, Deep Tech & EdTech. ByteDance's Strategy & Investments Team continuously identifies, tracks & evaluates major market trends as well as internal & external opportunities.
Job Description:
  • Perform in-depth strategic research & analysis on different segments of the tech market including digital media, eCommerce, B2B/SaaS, Gaming, Deep Tech & EdTech across North & Latin America; focus on identifying fundamental drivers of change and formulate clear implications & recommendations for ByteDance.
  • Track industry developments on an ongoing basis across the tech landscape in North & Latin America and turn market & competitor insights into recommendations for ByteDance
  • Source & evaluate new investment & acquisition opportunities by building a deep network of founders, investors & tech executives; lead the investment & acquisition process end-to-end including the negotiation of key deal terms and the presentation of investment memos to ByteDance's Investment Committee.

Qualifications
Requirements:
  • Bachelor's Degree or above; MBA preferred
  • Minimum of 5+ years of combined experience including:
  • 3+ years of experience at a top strategy consulting firm (e.g., McKinsey, BCG, Bain), private equity fund, venture capital fund, hedge fund or investment bank - 2+ years of experience at a top fast-growing tech company (e.g., in Corporate Development, Corporate Strategy, Product Management)
  • Strong & rigorous analytical & problem solving skills; ability to research & dive deep to uncover the very fundamental drivers of a market change; knowledge of SQL is a plus
  • Strong interpersonal skills & proven track record in working cross-functionally & in building trusted relationships with both internal & external parties
  • Result-focused & output-driven with strong project management capabilities
  • Excellent written & oral communication skills with the ability to clearly communicate compelling messages to internal & external stakeholders; foreign languages are a plus
  • Strong understanding of the tech ecosystem in North America & Latin America across Consumer & Enterprise
  • Strong curiosity, high work ethics, self-motivation, ability to learn quickly, flexibility, willingness to step outside of her/his comfort zone, genuine interest in technology

Position Summary:

The Infrastructure Service Manager/ Assistant Manager will manage new infrastructure projects/Technical refresh, and assist Infrastructure Operation Lead in management, planning and process streamlining. He/She will work with Vendor to ensure the operation of IT infrastructure meets defined Service Level.

Roles And Responsibilities

  • Ensure smooth service delivery and provide service reporting related to infrastructure operations to management and stakeholders.
  • Orchestrate the service delivery to support healthcare users, while catering to various healthcare settings.
  • Manage infrastructure Projects and Tech Refresh.

Key Responsibilities

1.    Support infrastructure operations

  • Manage the update of the operation documentations such as process documentation, SOP, Operations checklist that are relevant for the infrastructure operation.
  • Support the review of the operation impact to infrastructure operation based on the change request, service request and technical refresh and ensure that it is compliance to the various performance SLAs, SOPs and policies that are stipulated.
  • Support the review of utilisation reports and work with vendor to update the capacity plan timely.
  • Support the tracking of the availability of the infrastructure against the performance SLA and work with vendor to ensure timely recovery for any disruption to the infrastructure availability
  • Support the regular reporting to the governance bodies on the progress against audit requirements, service improvement plans, issues and risks related to the infrastructure operation
  • Track and manage regular maintenance activities, such as system patching, review of system accounts, etc.
  • Support the review of all production changes related to infrastructure
  • Support annual audit activities conducted by internal and external parties, and ensure timely follow up as well as closure of the required action items
  • Participate and coordinate the annual Disaster Recovery (DR) and Business Continuity Plan (BCP) exercises from infrastructure operation perspective.
    • Ensure timely follow up and closure of required action items (if any) from the various above exercises.
    • Support the review and timely update to the BCP/DR Plan/DR run-book and seek for the necessary approval and endorsement.
  • Support the decommissioning of the hardware and devices to ensure compliance with the required process and policies.
  • Review the weekly and monthly operation report to ensure that the status and updates are accurate and complete

2.    Incident and Problem Management

  • Support Incident manager with incident and problem identification and resolution. Coordinate the activities with infrastructure counterparts across systems, data centres and vendors to ensure timely resolution within the service SLA.
  • Support incidents or root cause analysis to ensure that accurate and sufficient troubleshooting has taken place.
  • Ensure timely escalation of incidents and problems and timely recovery of the service for Sev 1 and Sev 2 incidents
  • Timely respond to infrastructure incident escalated from Incident Manager and vendor.

3.    Service and Asset Management

  • Support Infra Operation head to review infrastructure related contracts renewal including those with third party vendors.
  • Review and ensure timely update to the asset inventory of all hardware, hosts and software licenses
  • Review and ensure timely update to the end-of-support forecasts for all hardware, hosts and software and ensure refresh plans are in place
  • Monitor the service performance of the support vendor by ensuring adherence to performance SLA, reduce aging of Incidents, timely root cause analysis, IT policies and tracking of any plans to address deviations to policies or supplier / vendor contracts.
  • Coordinate with finance to support regular asset tagging activities to ensure that all assets are tracked.

Requirements / Qualifications

Educational Requirements:

  • Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field, although consideration will be given to experience and certifications in lieu of degree

Other requirements:

  • At least 10 years' experience with service delivery.
  • At least 5-10 years' experience with managing vendors with SLA negotiation and management
  • Process oriented with focus on achieving operational efficiency and productivity
  • Adopting proactive attitude with sense of urgency in management of operations
  • Good stakeholder management skills with ability to engage and gain key stakeholder buy-ins.
  • Experience or certification in ITIL Service Management.
  • Project Management experience with certification is desirable.
  • Experience with management of heterogeneous computing environments
  • Experience in managing CyberArk and other Security Appliances - Imperva, A10, F5

Good to have on one or more below.

  • Experience in Hypervisor and Cloud computing
  • Experience in Network Switching, NAC, DNS, DHCP, Firewalls, WAN, Load Balancing, DMZ and Network Monitoring
  • Experience in Datacenter Operation will be an advantage
